result.label: access_analyzer_data
result.title: access_analyzer_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_public_facing_queues": {
      "type": "splunk.pie",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_public_facing_queues"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "collapseThreshold": 0.05,
        "resultLimit": 6,
        "showDonutHole": true
      },
      "title": "Number of Public Facing Queues"
    },
    "viz_public_facing_lambda": {
      "type": "splunk.pie",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_public_facing_lambda"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "collapseThreshold": 0.05,
        "resultLimit": 6,
        "showDonutHole": true
      },
      "title": "Number of Public Facing AWS Lambda"
    },
    "viz_public_facing_s3_buckets": {
      "type": "splunk.pie",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_public_facing_s3_buckets"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "collapseThreshold": 0.05,
        "resultLimit": 6,
        "showDonutHole": true
      },
      "title": "Number of Public Facing S3 Buckets"
    },
    "viz_access_analyzer_trend": {
      "type": "splunk.line",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_access_analyzer_trend"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "markerDisplay": "outlined",
        "nullValueDisplay": "zero",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "xAxisTitleText": "time",
        "showYMinorGridLines": false,
        "dataValuesDisplay": "all",
        "legendDisplay": "bottom"
      },
      "title": "Access Analyzer Trend"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_region": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Regions",
      "options": {
        "query": "| inputlookup aws_regions",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_account_id": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Account",
      "options": {
        "query": "| inputlookup aws_all_account_ids | search account_id!=\"ANONYMOUS_PRINCIPAL\"",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_public_facing_queues": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "single public facing queues",
      "options": {
        "data": {},
        "query": "`aws-index` sourcetype=\"aws:accessanalyzer:finding\" resourceType=\"AWS::SQS::Queue\" isPublic=true $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions$ $ds_input_tokens:result.raw_status$ | dedup resource | stats count by resource"
      }
    },
    "ds_public_facing_lambda": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Aws lambda",
      "options": {
        "data": {},
        "query": "`aws-index` sourcetype=\"aws:accessanalyzer:finding\" resourceType=\"AWS::Lambda::*\" isPublic=true $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions$ $ds_input_tokens:result.raw_status$ | dedup resource | stats count by resource"
      }
    },
    "ds_public_facing_s3_buckets": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "S3 buckets",
      "options": {
        "data": {},
        "query": "`aws-index` sourcetype=\"aws:accessanalyzer:finding\" resourceType=\"AWS::S3::Bucket\" isPublic=true $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions$ $ds_input_tokens:result.raw_status$ | dedup resource | stats count by resource"
      }
    },
    "ds_access_analyzer_trend": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Access analyzer trend",
      "options": {
        "data": {},
        "query": "`aws-index` sourcetype=\"aws:accessanalyzer:finding\" isPublic=true $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions$ $ds_input_tokens:result.raw_status$ | dedup resource | timechart limit=20 count by resourceType"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval region=\"$region$\"\n| eval list=split(region,\",\")\n| eval filterlist=mvfilter(!list IN (\"*\"))\n| eval regions_fields_dm=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"vendor_region=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval regions_fields_tstats=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"All_Changes.vendor_region=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval regions_fields=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"region=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval regions=case(region==\"*\",\"(region=\\\"*\\\")\", true(), regions_fields)\n| eval regions_DM=case(region==\"*\",\"(vendor_region=\\\"*\\\")\", true(), regions_fields_dm)\n| eval regions_TSTATS=case(region==\"*\",\"(All_Changes.vendor_region=\\\"*\\\")\", true(), regions_fields_tstats)\n\n| eval raw_status=\"(status=\\\"$status$\\\")\"\n\n| eval accountID=\"(accountId=\\\"$account_id$\\\")\"",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_account_id": {
      "type": "input.multiselect",
      "title": "Account ID",
      "options": {
        "token": "account_id",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [
          {
            "value": "*",
            "label": "All"
          }
        ] 
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.account_id",
        "label": "primary.account_id"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_account_id"
      }
    },
    "input_region": {
      "type": "input.multiselect",
      "title": "Regions",
      "options": {
        "token": "region",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [
          {
            "value": "*",
            "label": "All"
          }
        ]     
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.region",
        "label": "primary.label"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_region"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-7d,now"
      }
    },
    "input_status": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Status",
      "options": {
        "token": "status",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [
          {
            "value": "*",
            "label": "All"
          },
          {
            "value": "ACTIVE",
            "label": "Active"
          }
        ] 
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
        "item": "viz_public_facing_queues",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 0,
          "y": 0,
          "w": 400,
          "h": 250
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_public_facing_lambda",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 400,
          "y": 0,
          "w": 400,
          "h": 250
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_public_facing_s3_buckets",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 800,
          "y": 0,
          "w": 400,
          "h": 250
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_access_analyzer_trend",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 0,
          "y": 250,
          "w": 1200,
          "h": 300
        }
      }
    ],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_account_id",
      "input_region",
      "input_status",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Access Analyzer"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

result.label: access_anomalies_data
result.title: access_anomalies_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_geographically_improbable_accesses": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_geographically_improbable_accesses"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.src.value",
              "key": "row.src.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.user.value",
              "key": "row.user.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Authentication\".\"Authentication\" | search (src=\"$payload:row.src.value|u$\" OR src=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\") user=\"$payload:row.user.value|u$\"&earliest=-24h%40h&latest=%2B0s&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "columnFormat": {
          "user": {
            "width": 150
          },
          "distance": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName(\"distance\") | formatByType(twoDecimalPrecisionConfig)"
          },
          "speed": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName(\"speed\") | formatByType(threeDecimalPrecisionConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "twoDecimalPrecisionConfig": {
          "number": {
            "precision": 2
          }
        },
        "threeDecimalPrecisionConfig": {
          "number": {
            "precision": 3
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Geographically Improbable Accesses"
    },
    "viz_map": {
      "type": "splunk.map",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_map"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
        "options": {
          "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=index=gia_summary source=\"Access - Geographically Improbable Access - Summary Gen\" $ds_input_tokens:result.app_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ | fields user,user_bunit,src_time,src_app,src,src_city,src_country,src_lat,src_long,dest_time,dest_app,dest,dest_city,dest_country,dest_lat,dest_long,distance,speed | appendpipe [| eval src_lat=dest_lat,src_long=dest_long] | search src_lat>=$row._geo_bounds_south.value$ src_lat<$row._geo_bounds_north.value$ src_long>=$row._geo_bounds_west.value$ src_long<$row._geo_bounds_east.value$&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$",
          "newTab": true
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "layers": [{
          "type": "bubble"
        }],
        "center": [
          24.85,
          26.02
        ],
        "zoom": 2
      },
      "title": "Access Anomalies by Geolocation"
    },
    "viz_concurrent_application_accesses_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### Concurrent Application Accesses"
      }
    },
    "viz_concurrent_application_accesses": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_concurrent_application_accesses"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.user.value",
              "key": "row.user.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/access_search?form.user=$payload:row.user.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "wrap": true,
        "rowNumbers": false,
        "dataOverlayMode": "none",
        "drilldown": "row",
        "count": 5,
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_cim_access_actions": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Cim Access Actions",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_access_actions`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_app": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "App",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `access_apps`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_geographically_improbable_accesses": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Geographically Improbable Accesses",
      "options": {
        "query": "index=gia_summary source=\"Access - Geographically Improbable Access - Summary Gen\" $ds_input_tokens:result.app_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ | fields user,user_bunit,src_time,src_app,src,src_city,src_country,src_lat,src_long,dest_time,dest_app,dest,dest_city,dest_country,dest_lat,dest_long,distance,speed | `uitime(src_time)` | `uitime(dest_time)` | table user,user_bunit,src_time,src_app,src,src_city,src_country,dest_time,dest_app,dest,dest_city,dest_country,distance,speed"
      }
    },
    "ds_map": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Map",
      "options": {
        "query": "index=gia_summary source=\"Access - Geographically Improbable Access - Summary Gen\" $ds_input_tokens:result.app_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ | fields user,user_bunit,src_time,src_app,src,src_city,src_country,src_lat,src_long,dest_time,dest_app,dest,dest_city,dest_country,dest_lat,dest_long,distance,speed | appendpipe [| eval src_lat=dest_lat,src_long=dest_long] | geostats latfield=src_lat longfield=src_long maxzoomlevel=18 count by user globallimit=5"
      }
    },
    "ds_concurrent_application_accesses": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Concurrent Application Accesses",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.app_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$  by _time,Authentication.app,Authentication.src,Authentication.user span=1s | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Authentication\")` | eventstats dc(src) as src_count by app,user | search src_count>1 | sort 0 + _time | streamstats current=t window=2 earliest(_time) as prev_time,earliest(src) as prev_src by app,user | where (src!=prev_src) | eval time_diff=abs(_time-prev_time) | where time_diff<300 | `uitime(prev_time)` | table user, app, src, _time, prev_src, prev_time, time_diff, count"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval app_raw=if($app|s$==\"*\" OR $app|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(src_app=\\\"$app$\\\" OR dest_app=\\\"$app$\\\")\")\n| eval app_dm=if($app|s$==\"*\" OR $app|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.app=\\\"$app$\\\")\")\n| eval user_raw=if($user|s$==\"*\" OR $user|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(user=\\\"$user$\\\")\")\n| eval user_dm=if($user|s$==\"*\" OR $user|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.user=\\\"$user$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_raw=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR dest_owner_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.src_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Authentication.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Authentication.src_user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Authentication.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval action=if($action|s$==\"*\" OR $action|s$==\"\", \" \", \"$action$\")\n| eval action_dm=if($action|s$==\"*\" OR $action|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.action=\\\"$action$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "tokens": {
      "default": {
        "action": {
          "value": "*"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_action": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Action",
      "options": {
        "token": "action",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.action",
        "label": "primary.action"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_cim_access_actions"
      }
    },
    "input_app": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "App",
      "options": {
        "token": "app",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.app",
        "label": "primary.app"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_app"
      }
    },
    "input_user": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "User",
      "options": {
        "token": "user",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_bunit_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "token": "bunit_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-60m@m,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_geographically_improbable_accesses",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_map",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_concurrent_application_accesses_markdown",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 500,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 40
      }
    },{
      "item": "input_action",
      "type": "input",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 540,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 83
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_concurrent_application_accesses",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 623,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 240
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_app",
      "input_user",
      "input_bunit_form",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Access Anomalies"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

result.label: access_center_data
result.title: access_center_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_keyIndicators": {
      "type": "custom.keyIndicators",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {},
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "groupName": "access_center"
      }
    },
    "viz_access_over_time_by_action": {
      "type": "splunk.area",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_access_over_time_by_action"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "accessCenterDrilldownHandler",
          "events": [
            "point.click",
            "legend.click"
          ],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "area"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "xAxisTitleText": "time",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "nullValueDisplay": "zero",
        "seriesColorsByField": {
          "success": "0x64A43D",
          "failure": "0xD25B3B",
          "unknown": "0x999999"
        }
      },
      "title": "Access Over Time By Action"
    },
    "viz_access_over_time_by_app": {
      "type": "splunk.area",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_access_over_time_by_app"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {

            }
          },
          "handlerName": "accessCenterDrilldownHandler",
          "events": [
            "point.click",
            "legend.click"
          ],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "area"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "xAxisTitleText": "time",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "nullValueDisplay": "zero"
      },
      "title": "Access Over Time By App"
    },
    "viz_top_access_by_source": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_top_access_by_source"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.src.value",
              "key": "row.src.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/access_search?form.src=$payload:row.src.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "sparkline": {
            "width": 95
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Top Access By Source"
    },
    "viz_top_access_by_unique_users": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_top_access_by_unique_users"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.src.value",
              "key": "row.src.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/access_search?form.src=$payload:row.src.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "sparkline": {
            "width": 95
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Top Access By Unique Users"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_action": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Action",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_access_actions`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_app": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "App",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `access_apps`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_category_form": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Category",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_access_over_time_by_action": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Access Over Time By Action",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.app_token$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.special_raw$ by _time,Authentication.action span=10m | timechart minspan=10m useother=`useother` count by Authentication.action | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Authentication\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_access_over_time_by_app": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Access Over Time By App",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.app_token$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.special_raw$ by _time,Authentication.app span=10m | timechart minspan=10m useother=`useother` count by Authentication.app"
      }
    },
    "ds_top_access_by_source": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Access By Source",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.app_token$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.special_raw$ by _time,Authentication.src span=1h | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Authentication\")` | stats sparkline(sum(count),1h) as sparkline,sum(count) as count by src | sort - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_top_access_by_unique_users": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Access By Unique Users",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` values(Authentication.user) as user,count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.app_token$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.special_raw$ by _time,Authentication.src span=1h | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Authentication\")` | stats sparkline(sum(count),1h) as sparkline,dc(user) as user_count by src | sort - user_count"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval action_dm=if($action|s$==\"*\" OR $action|s$==\"\", \" \", \"Authentication.action=\\\"$action$\\\"\")\n| eval bunit_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.src_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Authentication.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Authentication.src_user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Authentication.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.src_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Authentication.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Authentication.src_user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Authentication.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval special_raw=if($special|s$==\"*\" OR $special|s$==\"\", \" \", \"nodename=\\\"$special$\\\"\")\n| eval app=\"$app$\"\n| eval list=split(app,\",\")\n| eval filterlist=mvfilter(!list IN (\"*\"))\n| eval fields=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"Authentication.app=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval app_token=case(app==\"*\",\" \", true(), fields)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_action": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Action",
      "options": {
        "token": "action",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.action",
        "label": "primary.action"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_action"
      }
    },
    "input_app": {
      "type": "input.multiselect",
      "title": "App",
      "options": {
        "token": "app",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.app",
        "label": "primary.app"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_app"
      }
    },
    "input_bunit_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "token": "bunit_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_category_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Category",
      "options": {
        "token": "category_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.category",
        "label": "primary.category"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_category_form"
      }
    },
    "input_special": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Special Access",
      "options": {
        "token": "special",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        },{
          "value": "Authentication.Privileged_Authentication",
          "label": "Privileged"
        },{
          "value": "Authentication.Default_Authentication",
          "label": "Default"
        }]
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_keyIndicators",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 150
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_access_over_time_by_action",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 150,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_access_over_time_by_app",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 150,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_top_access_by_source",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 400,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_top_access_by_unique_users",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 400,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_action",
      "input_app",
      "input_bunit_form",
      "input_category_form",
      "input_special",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Access Center"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>

result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_access_search_table": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_access_search_table"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.src.value",
              "key": "row.src.value"
            },{
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            },{
              "token": "row.user.value",
              "key": "row.user.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
          "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Authentication\".\"Authentication\" | search src=\"$payload:row.src.value|u$\" dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\" user=\"$payload:row.user.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "columnFormat": {
          "dest": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('dest') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "src": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('src') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "user": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('user') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "src_user": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('src_user') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "action": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('action') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "app": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('app') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)",
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "alignPositionCol": [ "left" ],
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    },
    "viz_access_search_event": {
      "type": "splunk.events",
      "description": "",
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "footerFields": [
          "action",
          "app",
          "src",
          "src_user",
          "dest",
          "user"
        ],
        "highlightValuesByField": {
          "action": "$action$",
          "app": "$app$",
          "src": "$src$",
          "dest": "$dest$",
          "user": "$user$"
        }
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_access_search_event",
        "fieldsummary": "ds_access_search_event_fieldsummary"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
      {
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [
                {
                    "token": "tag_value",
                    "key": "value"
                },
                {
                    "token": "field",
                    "key": "name"
                }
              ]
          }
      },
      {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
              "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Authentication\".\"Authentication\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.app_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_raw$ | head 100 | search \"tag::$payload:field$\"=$payload:tag_value$",
              "newTab": true,
              "events": [
                  "tag.click"
              ]
          }
      },
      {
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Authentication\".\"Authentication\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.app_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_raw$ | head 100",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "eventViewerDrilldownHandler",
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "events"
        }
      }],
      "title": ""
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_action": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Action",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_access_actions`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_app": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "App",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `access_apps`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_access_search_table": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Access Search Table",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,values(Authentication.action) as action,values(Authentication.app) as app,count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.app_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_dm$ by Authentication.src,Authentication.src_user,Authentication.dest,Authentication.user | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Authentication\")` | eval src_user=if(src_user==\"unknown\",null(),src_user) | fields _time,action,app,src,src_user,dest,user,count | sort - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_access_search_event": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Access Search Event",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from datamodel:\"Authentication\".\"Authentication\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.app_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_raw$ | head 100"
      }
    },
    "ds_access_search_event_fieldsummary": {
      "type": "ds.chain",
      "name": "fieldsummary",
      "options": {
        "query": "fieldsummary maxvals=10",
        "extend": "ds_access_search_event"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1 \n| eval app_raw=if($app|s$==\"*\" OR $app|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(app=\\\"$app$\\\")\") \n| eval app_dm=if($app|s$==\"*\" OR $app|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.app=\\\"$app$\\\")\") \n| eval user_raw=if($user|s$==\"*\" OR $user|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(user=\\\"$user$\\\")\") \n| eval user_dm=if($user|s$==\"*\" OR $user|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.user=\\\"$user$\\\")\") \n| eval src_raw=if($src|s$==\"*\" OR $src|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(src=\\\"$src$\\\")\") \n| eval src_dm=if($src|s$==\"*\" OR $src|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.src=\\\"$src$\\\")\") \n| eval dest_raw=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\") \n| eval dest_dm=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\") \n| eval action_raw=if($action|s$==\"*\" OR $action|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(action=\\\"$action$\\\")\")\n| eval action_dm=if($action|s$==\"*\" OR $action|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.action=\\\"$action$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition] \n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "ds.chain": {
      "options": {
        "queryParameters": {
          "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
          "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_action": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Action",
      "options": {
        "token": "action",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_action"
      }
    },
    "input_app": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "App",
      "options": {
        "token": "app",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_app"
      }
    },
    "input_src": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Source",
      "options": {
        "token": "src",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_dest": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Destination",
      "options": {
        "token": "dest",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_user": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "User",
      "options": {
        "token": "user",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-60m@m,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_access_search_table",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 285
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_access_search_event",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 285,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 500
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_action",
      "input_app",
      "input_src",
      "input_dest",
      "input_user",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Access Search"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {

        {

      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",

            "newTab": true

      ],

    },
    "viz_account_usage_for_expired_identities_last_24_hours": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_account_usage_for_expired_identities_last_24_hours"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.user.value",
              "key": "row.user.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/access_search?form.user=$payload:row.user.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=-7d@d&form.global_time.latest=now",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)"
          },
          "dest": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName(\"dest\") | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        },
        "alignPositionCol": [ "left" ]
      },
      "title": "Account Usage For Expired Identities - Last 24 hours"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_category_form": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Category Form",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_first_time_access_last_7_days": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "First time access last 7 days",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `access_tracker(firstTime_user)` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ | stats min(firstTime) as firstTime,max(lastTime) as lastTime,values(dest) as dest by user | sort - firstTime | `uitime(firstTime)` | `uitime(lastTime)` | fields firstTime,lastTime,user,dest",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-7d@h",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_inactive_account_usage_last_90_days": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Inactive account usage last 90 days",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `inactive_account_usage(90,24)` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ | sort - lastTime | `uitime(firstTime)` | `uitime(second2lastTime)` | `uitime(lastTime)` | table firstTime,second2lastTime,lastTime,user,inactiveDays"
      }
    },
    "ds_completely_inactive_accounts_last_90_days": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Completely inactive accounts last 90 days",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `inactive_accounts(90)` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ | sort + lastTime | `uitime(firstTime)` | `uitime(lastTime)` | table firstTime,lastTime,user,inactiveDays"
      }
    },
    "ds_account_usage_for_expired_identities_last_24_hours": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Account usage for expired identities last 24 hours",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,values(Authentication.dest) as dest from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where * $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by Authentication.user | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Authentication\")` | `get_identity4events(user)` | where isnotnull(user_endDate) | where _time>user_endDate | `uitime(user_endDate,\"%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S\")` | fields _time,user,user_first,user_last,user_endDate,dest",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-24h@h",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval bunit_raw=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR dest_owner_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.src_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Authentication.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Authentication.src_user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Authentication.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_raw=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR dest_owner_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.src_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Authentication.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Authentication.src_user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Authentication.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")",
        "enableSmartSources": true
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "now",
            "earliest": "0"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_bunit_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "token": "bunit_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_category_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Category",
      "options": {
        "token": "category_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.category",
        "label": "primary.category"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_category_form"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_first_time_access_last_7_days",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_inactive_account_usage_last_90_days",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_completely_inactive_accounts_last_90_days",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 500,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_account_usage_for_expired_identities_last_24_hours",
      "type": "block",

      }
    }],

      "input_category_form"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Access Tracker"
}]]></definition>

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_account_management_over_time": {
      "type": "splunk.line",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_account_management_over_time"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Change\".\"Account_Management\" | search",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            },
            "autopause": "$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "searchKey": "action"
          },
          "handlerName": "searchDrilldownHandler",
          "events": [
            "point.click",
            "legend.click"
          ],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "line"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "markerDisplay": "off",
        "xAxisTitleText": "time",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "nullValueDisplay": "zero"
      },
      "title": "Account Management Over Time"
    },
    "viz_account_lockouts": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {

      },
      "eventHandlers": [{

            {

        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Change\".\"Account_Management\" | search action=\"lockout\" src=\"$payload:row.src.value|u$\" src_nt_domain=\"$payload:row.src_nt_domain.value|u$\" user=\"$payload:row.user.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true

            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Change\".\"Account_Management\" | search src_user=\"$payload:row.src_user.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",

              "key": "row.action.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Change\".\"Account_Management\" | search action=\"$payload:row.action.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {},
      "title": "Top Account Management Events"

  },
  "dataSources": {

      "type": "ds.search",

      "options": {
        "query": "| `categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_account_management_over_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",

      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Change.All_Changes where nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.special_dm$ by _time,All_Changes.action span=10m | timechart minspan=10m useother=`useother` count by All_Changes.action | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_account_lockouts": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Account Lockouts",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Change.All_Changes where nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management All_Changes.action=\"lockout\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.special_dm$ by All_Changes.src,All_Changes.Account_Management.src_nt_domain,All_Changes.user | sort 100 - count | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` |  `drop_dm_object_name(\"Account_Management\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_account_management_by_source_user": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Account Management By Source User",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Change.All_Changes where nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.special_dm$ by All_Changes.Account_Management.src_user| `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Account_Management\")` | sort 10 - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_top_account_management_events": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Account Management Events",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Change.All_Changes where nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.special_dm$ by _time,All_Changes.action span=1h | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | stats sparkline(sum(count),1h) as sparkline,sum(count) as count by action | sort 10 - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval bunit_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Changes.src_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.Account_Management.src_user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Changes.src_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.Account_Management.src_user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval special_dm=if($special_form|s$==\"*\" OR $special_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Changes.Account_Management.src_user_category=\\\"$special_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.user_category=\\\"$special_form$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {

          "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {

        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_bunit_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "token": "bunit_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_category_form": {

      "options": {

      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_account_management_over_time",

result.eai:data:
Search Heads Indexers dmc_group_search_head false | `dmc_get_groups_containing_role($role$)` | search search_group!="dmc_group_*" label search_group All true
`dmc_set_index_internal` search_group=$role$ search_group=$dmc_group$ sourcetype=wlm_* prefilter_action=filter | stats count by search_type -60m now stats sum(count) as total_prefiltered if(isnotnull('result.total_prefiltered'), 'result.total_prefiltered', 0) if(isnotnull('result.total_prefiltered'), 'result.total_prefiltered', 0) Total Searches Prefiltered (Last Hour) `dmc_event_local_search_dispatch` | stats dc(search_id) as total_dispatched | eval output_with_percentage = "$total_prefiltered$"." (".round($total_prefiltered$/($total_prefiltered$ + total_dispatched) * 100, 2)." %)" | fields output_with_percentage Adhoc Searches Prefiltered (Last Hour) | where search_type="adhoc" | fields count Scheduled Searches Prefiltered (Last Hour) | where search_type="scheduled" | fields count Historical Charts -4h@m now Count of Prefiltered Searches false Rule Rule User App Search Type Search Name Instance by $SplitByVariable$ `dmc_set_index_internal` search_group=$role$ search_group=$dmc_group$ sourcetype=wlm_* prefilter_action=filter | stats count by $SplitByVariable$ $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ stats sum(count) as total if(isnotnull('result.total'), 'result.total', 0) if(isnotnull('result.total'), 'result.total', 0) Total: $total_prefiltered_searches$ sort - count | eval percent = round(count / $total_prefiltered_searches$ * 100, 2)." %" | rename prefilter_rule as Rule, user as User, app as App, search_type as "Search Type", search_name as "Search Name", host as Instance, count as Count, percent as "Percent of Total"
Count of Prefiltered Searches Over Time false Rule Rule User App Search Type Search Name Instance by $TimechartSplitByVariable$ `dmc_set_index_internal` search_group=$role$ search_group=$dmc_group$ sourcetype=wlm_* prefilter_action=filter | `dmc_timechart` partial=f bins=200 count by $TimechartSplitByVariable$ $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Scheduled Searches Prefiltered `dmc_set_index_internal` search_group=$role$ search_group=$dmc_group$ sourcetype=wlm_* search_type="scheduled*" prefilter_action=filter | stats count as prefiltered_count by prefilter_rule, user, app, host, search_name | fields search_name, app, user, host, prefilter_rule, prefiltered_count | sort - prefiltered_count | rename search_name as "Search Name", app as App, user as User, host as Instance, prefilter_rule as "Prefiltering Rule Triggered", prefiltered_count as "Prefiltered Count" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ $row.Search Name$ $row.Instance$
Scheduled Searches Prefiltered Drilldown: $scheduled_search_drilldown$ | rest [inputlookup dmc_assets | where host = $scheduled_search_host_drilldown|s$ | rename serverName AS splunk_server | return splunk_server] "/servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches/$scheduled_search_drilldown$" earliest_time=`time_modifier(-0s@s)` latest_time=`time_modifier(+8d@d)` search="is_scheduled=1" search="disabled=0" | fields cron_schedule, next_scheduled_time, search | rename cron_schedule as "Cron Schedule", next_scheduled_time as "Next Scheduled Time", search as "Search" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

`dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ sourcetype=wlm_* prefilter_action=filter | stats count by search_type -60m now stats sum(count) as total_prefiltered if(isnotnull('result.total_prefiltered'), 'result.total_prefiltered', 0) if(isnotnull('result.total_prefiltered'), 'result.total_prefiltered', 0) Total Searches Prefiltered (Last Hour) `dmc_event_local_search_dispatch` | stats dc(search_id) as total_dispatched | eval output_with_percentage = "$total_prefiltered$"." (".round($total_prefiltered$/($total_prefiltered$ + total_dispatched) * 100, 2)." %)" | fields output_with_percentage Adhoc Searches Prefiltered (Last Hour) | where search_type="adhoc" | fields count Scheduled Searches Prefiltered (Last Hour) | where search_type="scheduled" | fields count Historical Charts -4h@m now Count of Prefiltered Searches false Rule Rule User App Search Type Search Name by $SplitByVariable$ `dmc_set_index_internal` sourcetype=wlm_* host=$host$ prefilter_action=filter | stats count by $SplitByVariable$ $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ stats sum(count) as total if(isnotnull('result.total'), 'result.total', 0) if(isnotnull('result.total'), 'result.total', 0) Total: $total_prefiltered_searches$ sort - count | eval percent = round(count / $total_prefiltered_searches$ * 100, 2)." %" | rename prefilter_rule as Rule, user as User, app as App, search_type as "Search Type", search_name as "Search Name", count as Count, percent as "Percent of Total"
Count of Prefiltered Searches Over Time false Rule Rule User App Search Type Search Name by $TimechartSplitByVariable$ `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ sourcetype=wlm_* prefilter_action=filter | `dmc_timechart` partial=f bins=200 count by $TimechartSplitByVariable$ $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Scheduled Searches Prefiltered `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ sourcetype=wlm_* search_type="scheduled*" prefilter_action=filter | stats count as prefiltered_count by prefilter_rule, user, app, search_name | fields search_name, app, user, prefilter_rule, prefiltered_count | sort - prefiltered_count | rename search_name as "Search Name", app as App, user as User, prefilter_rule as "Prefiltering Rule Triggered", prefiltered_count as "Prefiltered Count" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ $row.Search Name$

result.label: Analyze ES Risk Attributions
result.title: analyze_es_risk
result.eai:data:
| sseanalytics | search search_title!="" | multireport [| stats dc(search_title) as count | eval item="# of Detections"] [| stats dc(mitre_technique) as count | eval item="# of MITRE ATT&CK Techniques"] [| stats dc(mitre_tactic) as count | eval item="# of MITRE ATT&CK Tactics"] [| stats dc(mitre_technique) as count | appendcols [| mitremap | eval items =null | foreach * [| eval items=if("<<FIELD>>" != "items",mvappend(items, '<<FIELD>>'), items)] | fields items | stats values(items) as items | eval items=mvcount(items)] | eval count=round(100*count/items, 2), item="% of MITRE ATT&CK Coverage"] | stats sum(count) as count by item | table * -24h@h now index=risk $criteria$ | table * $timepicker.earliest$ $timepicker.latest$
* -24h@h now
System-wide Metrics # of Detections | search item="# of Detections" # of MITRE ATT&CK Techniques | search item="# of MITRE ATT&CK Techniques" # of MITRE ATT&CK Tactics | search item="# of MITRE ATT&CK Tactics" % of MITRE ATT&CK Techniques | search item="% of MITRE ATT&CK Coverage" Average Risk Object Score index=risk|stats avg(risk_score) as Score $timepicker.earliest$ $timepicker.latest$ 1 # Risk Objects index=risk|stats dc(risk_object) as count $timepicker.earliest$ $timepicker.latest$ 1 MITRE ATT&CK Tactics |rex field=mitre_tactic_combined "- (?<mitre_tactic_name>.*)"| stats count by mitre_tactic_name | `Init_All_MITRE_Rows(mitre_tactic_name, count)` | stats sum(count) as count by mitre_tactic_name| `Sort_MITRE_Rows(mitre_tactic_name)` | streamstats count as order | eval mitre_tactic_name = substr("0" . order, len("0" . order) - 1, 3) . ". " . mitre_tactic_name | fields - order | stats values(count) as count by mitre_tactic_name MITRE ATT&CK Matrix | mitremaplookup
Count of Risk Object Attributions by MITRE ATT&CK Tactic |rex field=mitre_tactic_combined "- (?<mitre_tactic_name>.*)"| timechart count by mitre_tactic_name Count of Risk Object Attributions by MITRE ATT&CK Technique |rex field=mitre_technique_combined "- (?<mitre_technique_name>.*)"| timechart count by mitre_technique_name Event Timeline for $criteria$ | rex field=mitre_tactic_combined "- (?<mitre_tactic_name>.*)" | rex field=mitre_technique_combined "- (?<mitre_technique_name>.*)" | eval tactic_technique_combined=mvzip(mitre_tactic_name,mitre_technique_name,"::") | mvexpand mitre_technique_name | eval mitre_tactic_name=if(mvcount(mitre_tactic_combined)=1,mitre_tactic_name, null()) | lookup mitre_enterprise_list Technique AS mitre_technique_name OUTPUTNEW Tactic AS mitre_tactic_name | eval c="If we have multiple Tactics linked to a Technique, just take the first one" | eval mitre_tactic_name=if(mvcount(mitre_tactic_combined)>1,mvindex(mitre_tactic_name,0), mitre_tactic_name) | stats count, values(search_name) AS search_name by _time, risk_object, mitre_tactic_name mitre_technique_name | eval label=mitre_technique_name | eval start=_time | eval group=risk_object | eval tooltip=search_name | eval colorScheme="Olaf" | lookup mitre_color_scheme.csv colorScheme mitre_tactic_name OUTPUT color | head 100 | table label, start, end, group, color, tooltip, data Count of Risk Object Attributions by Risk Object Type | timechart count by risk_object_type Aggregate Risk Attribution Scores by Analytic |rex field=mitre_tactic_combined "- (?<mitre_tactic_name>.*)"| chart sparkline sum(risk_score) as Score values(mitre_tactic_name) as "ATT&CK Tactics" by search_name|sort -Score|head 10
Aggregate Risk Attribution Scores by Risk Object | search NOT risk_object="unknown"|rex field=mitre_tactic_combined "- (?<mitre_tactic_name>.*)"| chart sparkline sum(risk_score) as Score values(mitre_tactic_name) as "ATT&CK Tactics" by risk_object|sort -Score|head 10 [#53A051,#006D9C,#F8BE34,#F1813F,#DC4E41] 25,50,75,100
Watch-listed Objects with Risk Attributions | search user_watchlist=true|eval Fullname=user_first+" "+user_last|rex field=mitre_tactic_combined "- (?<mitre_tactic_name>.*)"|rex field=mitre_technique_combined "- (?<mitre_technique_name>.*)"|stats count sum(risk_score) as Score values(user_managedBy) as Manager values(user_identity) as Identities values(user_identity_tag) as Roles values(user_bunit) as BU values(search_name) as Analytics values(mitre_tactic_name) as Tactics values(mitre_technique_name) as Techniques by Fullname

      }

        "query": "| inputlookup append=T asset_lookup_by_str where * $ds_input_tokens:result.asset_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.priority_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.owner_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.pci_domain_raw$ [makeresults | eval maxrow=if(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.asset$\".trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.priority$\",\" \").trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.bunit$\",\" \").trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.category$\",\" \").trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.owner$\",\" \").trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.pci_domain$\",\" \")==\"*\", \"max=1000\", \"\") | return $maxrow ] | inputlookup append=t asset_lookup_by_cidr where * $ds_input_tokens:result.asset_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.priority_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.owner_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.pci_domain_raw$ [makeresults | eval maxrow=if(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.asset$\".trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.priority$\",\" \").trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.bunit$\",\" \").trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.category$\",\" \").trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.owner$\",\" \").trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.pci_domain$\",\" \")==\"*\", \"max=1000\", \"\") | return $maxrow ] | rename _key as asset_id | stats values(*) as * by asset_id | fields ip,mac,nt_host,dns,owner,priority,lat,long,city,country,bunit,category,pci_domain,is_expected,should_timesync,should_update,requires_av"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval asset=if($asset|s$==\"\", \" \", \"$asset$\")\n| eval priority=if($priority|s$==\"*\" OR $priority|s$==\"\", \" \", \"$priority$\")\n| eval bunit=if($bunit|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit|s$==\"\", \" \", \"$bunit$\")\n| eval category=if($category|s$==\"*\" OR $category|s$==\"\", \" \", \"$category$\")\n| eval owner=if($owner|s$==\"*\" OR $owner|s$==\"\", \" \", \"$owner$\")\n| eval pci_domain=if($pci_domain|s$==\"*\" OR $pci_domain|s$==\"\", \" \", \"$pci_domain$\")\n| eval lowercase_asset=\"asset=\\\"\".lower(asset).\"\\\"\"\n| eval asset_raw=if(asset==\" \", \" \", lowercase_asset)\n| eval priority_raw=if(priority==\" \", \" \", \"priority=\\\"$priority$\\\"\")\n| eval lowercase_bunit=\"bunit=\\\"\".lower(bunit).\"\\\"\"\n| eval bunit_raw=if(bunit==\" \", \" \", lowercase_bunit)\n| eval category_raw=if(category==\" \", \" \", \"category=\\\"$category$\\\"\")\n| eval lowercase_owner=\"owner=\\\"\".lower(owner).\"\\\"\"\n| eval owner_raw=if(owner==\" \", \" \", lowercase_owner)\n| eval pci_domain_raw=if(pci_domain==\" \", \" \", \"pci_domain=\\\"$pci_domain$\\\"\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true

result.label: Knowledge Bundle Replication
result.title: bundle_replication
result.eai:data:
false | `dmc_get_groups_containing_role(dmc_group_search_head)` | search search_group!="dmc_group_*" label search_group All Search Heads dmc_group_search_head false | `dmc_get_instance_info($dmc_group$)` | where search_group="dmc_group_search_head" true $row.host$

"Replication Time" measures the elapsed time from the creation of a knowledge bundle on the search head until the bundle has been sent to all peers. This does not include any time spent indexing lookup files in the bundle.

 Snapshots | rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ /services/search/distributed/bundle/replication/config | fields replicationPolicy | eval replicationPolicy = upper(substr(replicationPolicy,1,1)).substr(replicationPolicy,2) | eval replicationThreads = case(isnull(replicationThreads), "N/A", isnotnull(replicationThreads), replicationThreads) | fields replicationThreads `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=bundles_uploads name=peer_dispatch bundle_type=full_bundle | eval repl_sec = replication_time_msec/1000 | stats avg(repl_sec) `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=bundles_uploads name=peer_dispatch bundle_type=delta_bundle | eval repl_sec = replication_time_msec/1000 | stats avg(repl_sec) `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=bundle_replication name=bundle_metadata bundle_type=full_bundle | eval size_mb = round(bundle_bytes /1024 / 1024, 2) | stats avg(size_mb) `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=bundle_replication name=bundle_metadata bundle_type=delta_bundle | eval size_mb = round(bundle_bytes /1024 / 1024, 2) | stats avg(size_mb) Latest Common Bundle Across All Peers | rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_indexer /services/admin/bundles/$splunk_server$ | fields bundle_name, checksum, id, splunk_server, upload_time | mvcombine splunk_server | sort upload_time desc | eval latest_common=case(mvcount(splunk_server)==[ | rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_indexer /services/admin/bundles/$splunk_server$ | stats dc(splunk_server) AS total_server_count | return $total_server_count], "found", mvcount(splunk_server)!=[ | rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_indexer /services/admin/bundles/$splunk_server$ | stats dc(splunk_server) AS total_server_count | return $total_server_count], "none") | where latest_common=="found" | head 1 | eval upload_time="Created at: ".(strftime(upload_time, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S %p")) | fields upload_time | rex field=id "(?<id>([^\/]+$))" | eval id = "Bundle Id: ".tostring(id) | fields id | eval checksum = "Checksum: ".tostring(checksum) | fields checksum true | appendpipe [ stats count | eval checksum="No common knowledge bundle found across all peers" | where count=0] | fields checksum Historical Charts -4h@m now

A bundle replication cycle corresponds to one round of replication initiated by the search head, which includes sending at least one bundle to a set of search peers.

 Replication Cycle Count `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=bundle_replication name=cycle_dispatch | stats count $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

The number of cycles dispatched from the search head.

 Replication Cycle Count by Peer Success Ratio `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=bundle_replication name=cycle_dispatch | eval ratio = round((peer_success_count/peer_count)*100, 2) | stats count by ratio | rename ratio as "Peer Success Ratio" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

Peer success ratio is the ratio of peers that received the bundles in a cycle successfully, to all intended peers.

 Average Bundle Replication Time by Bundle Type `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=bundles_uploads name=peer_dispatch | eval repl_sec = replication_time_msec/1000 | `dmc_timechart_for_metrics_log` avg(repl_sec) by bundle_type $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Average Bundle Size by Bundle Type `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=bundle_replication name=bundle_metadata | eval size_mb = round(bundle_bytes /1024 / 1024, 2) | `dmc_timechart_for_metrics_log` avg(size_mb) by bundle_type $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Bundle Replication Activity Split by peer `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=bundles_uploads name=peer_dispatch | eval repl_sec = replication_time_msec/1000 | `dmc_timechart_for_metrics_log` avg(repl_sec) AS avg_repl_time p90(repl_sec) AS 90th_perc_repl_time p10(repl_sec) AS 10th_perc_repl_time $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

Average, 90th percentile, and 10th percentile of bundle replication time, in seconds.

Bundle Replication Activity (Per-Peer) `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=bundles_uploads name=peer_dispatch | eval repl_sec = replication_time_msec/1000 | `dmc_timechart_for_metrics_log` limit=50 avg(repl_sec) AS avg_repl_time by peer_name $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

Average bundle replication time, in seconds, grouped by peer. Only 50 peers are visible.

 Average Bundle Replication Time and Size `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=bundles_uploads name=peer_dispatch | stats avg(replication_time_msec) AS avg_time by peer_name | eval avg_time=round(avg_time/1000, 2) | rename avg_time AS "Replication Time (sec)" | appendcols [ search `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=bundles_uploads name=peer_dispatch | join type=inner bundle_id [ search `dmc_set_index_internal` source=*metrics.log* group=bundle_replication name=bundle_metadata] | stats avg(bundle_bytes) AS avg_size by peer_name | eval avg_size = round(avg_size /1024 / 1024, 2) | rename avg_size AS "Bundle Size (MB)"] | rename peer_name AS "Peer" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$
