result.label: Cascading Replication
result.title: cascading_replication
result.eai:data:
Search Heads Indexers (Search Peers) dmc_group_search_head false | `dmc_get_groups_containing_role($role$)` | search search_group!="dmc_group_*" label search_group All * false | `dmc_get_instance_info($dmc_group$)` | where search_group="$role$" serverName serverName true $row.host$
| rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ /services/search/distributed/bundle/replication/config | fields replicationPolicy | eval replicationPolicy = upper(substr(replicationPolicy,1,1)).substr(replicationPolicy,2) true true | fields replicationThreads

Cascading Replication is disabled. Set replicationPolicy = cascading under the [replicationSettings] stanza in distsearch.conf to enable.

 Historical Charts -4h@m now

In cascading replication, the search head first creates a plan that specifies the replication relationships between peers; in other words, which peers send the payload to which other peers. The search head distributes this plan to all search peers. There can be multiple plans associated with a knowledge bundle replication cycle.

Each sender node, including the search head and any sender search peers, then sends the payload to its own set of receiver search peers. A payload is any packet of information exchanged by nodes during the cascading replication process. Payloads can include, but are not limited to, full or delta knowledge bundles.

 Plan Count by Number of Levels `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=cascading name=plan_metadata | dedup planid | stats count by num_levels $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

The search head is one level. Cascading replication occurs when there are at least three levels: The search head sends the payload to a subset of search peers, which in turn distribute the payload to their own set of search peers, and so on.

 Plan Count by Number of Peers `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=cascading name=plan_metadata | dedup planid | stats count by num_peers $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

Count of plans by number of peers involved.

 Plan Count by Replication Type `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=cascading name=plan_metadata | dedup planid | stats count by endpoint $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

Count of plans by replication type.

 Plan Count by Number of Receivers `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=cascading name=plan_replication | dedup planid | stats count by num_receivers $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

Count of plans by number of intended receivers.

 Payload Count by Number of Receivers `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=cascading name=payload_replication | dedup planid | stats count by num_receivers $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

Count of payloads by number of intended receivers.

 Plan and Payload Replication Status | multisearch [search `dmc_set_index_internal` source=*metrics.log group=cascading name=plan_replication] [search `dmc_set_index_internal` source=*metrics.log group=cascading name=payload_replication] | chart count over name by status | replace payload_replication WITH payload | replace plan_replication WITH plan | rename name as "Replication Type" | sort -"Replication Type" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

Count of plans and payloads by status; success indicates successful replication to all intended peers.

 Plan Replication Performance `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=cascading name=plan_replication | dedup planid | `dmc_timechart_for_metrics_log` avg(dispatch_time_ms) AS avg_plan_msec $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

"Time spent" is the average msec for the search head to send a plan to all search peers.

 Payload Replication Performance Split by peer `dmc_set_index_internal` search_group=dmc_group_indexer source=*metrics.log* group=cascading name=payload_replication | dedup planid | eval dispatch_time_sec=dispatch_time_ms/1000 | `dmc_timechart_for_metrics_log` avg(dispatch_time_sec) AS avg_payload_sec $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

"Time spent" is the average sec for a sender peer (the search head or any other sender peer) to send a payload to all of its receivers.

Payload Replication Performance (Per-Peer) `dmc_set_index_internal` search_group=dmc_group_indexer source=*metrics.log* group=cascading name=payload_replication | dedup planid | eval dispatch_time_sec=dispatch_time_ms/1000 | `dmc_timechart_for_metrics_log` avg(dispatch_time_sec) by peer_guid $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

Time spent is the average sec for the given peer (which may be the search head, or any other sender peer) to send a payload to all of its receivers.

 Average Peer Time to Receive Payload `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ source=*metrics.log* group=cascading name=per_peer_replication | dedup planid | stats avg(repl_time_ms) AS avg_time by peer_uri | eval avg_time=round(avg_time, 2) | rename avg_time AS "Time To Receive (msec)" | rename peer_uri AS "Peer URI" | sort 0 - "Time to Receive (msec)" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

"Time to receive" is the average time for a peer to receive a payload from its sender.

result.label: Correlation searches extraction
result.title: correlation_searches_extraction
result.eai:data:
Get all correlation searches from Enterprise Security | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 OR disabled=1 | eval data_source = "Enterprise Security" | table data_source eai:acl.app title search -24h@h now
Get all alerts that are saved under Splunk_Security_Essentials application | rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | search eai:acl.app = "Splunk_Security_Essentials" is_scheduled=1 | where disabled=0 OR disabled=1 | eval data_source = "Splunk_Security_Essentials" | table data_source eai:acl.app title search -24h@h now
Get all correlations searches from Enterprise Security and Security Essentials | v1 | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 OR disabled=1 | eval data_source = "Enterprise Security" | table data_source eai:acl.app title search | append [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | search eai:acl.app = "Splunk_Security_Essentials" is_scheduled=1 | where disabled=0 OR disabled=1 | eval data_source = "Splunk_Security_Essentials" | table data_source eai:acl.app title search] -24h@h now
Get all correlations searches from Enterprise Security and Security Essentials | v2 | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | search action.correlationsearch.enabled = "1" OR (eai:acl.app = "Splunk_Security_Essentials" AND is_scheduled=1) | where disabled=0 OR disabled=1 | table eai:acl.app title search -24h@h now

result.label: Dashboard example
result.title: dashboard_example
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="1.1" theme="light">
  <label>Dashboard example</label>
  <row>
    <panel>
      <title>Number of dashboards by user | Search app only</title>
      <chart>
        <search>
          <query>| rest /servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views 
| search eai:acl.app = "search" ```eai:acl.owner!="nobody"```
| stats count by eai:acl.owner</query>
          <earliest>-24h@h</earliest>
          <latest>now</latest>
        </search>
        <option name="charting.chart">pie</option>
        <option name="charting.drilldown">none</option>
        <option name="height">309</option>
      </chart>
    </panel>
    <panel>
      <title>Number of custom dashboards in Search app</title>
      <single>
        <search>
          <query>| rest /servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views 
| search eai:acl.app = "search" eai:acl.owner!="nobody"
| stats count</query>
          <earliest>-24h@h</earliest>
          <latest>now</latest>
        </search>
        <option name="drilldown">none</option>
        <option name="height">310</option>
      </single>
    </panel>
  </row>
  <row>
    <panel>
      <title>Number of dashboards by app</title>
      <chart>
        <search>
          <query>| rest /servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views 
```| search eai:acl.app = "search" ```
| stats count by eai:acl.app | sort - count</query>
          <earliest>-24h@h</earliest>
          <latest>now</latest>
        </search>
        <option name="charting.axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.rotation">-45</option>
        <option name="charting.chart">column</option>
        <option name="charting.drilldown">none</option>
        <option name="height">379</option>
        <option name="refresh.display">progressbar</option>
      </chart>
    </panel>
  </row>
</dashboard>

result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_data_integrity_control_by_index_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "### Data Integrity Control By Index\nThe Splunk platform provides data integrity controls to verify the integrity and security of data stored in indexes and buckets. Edit indexes.conf to set the enableDataIntegrityControl setting to true.",
        "learnMore": "ess_data_integrity"
      }
    },
    "viz_anonymizing_sensitive_data_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "### Anonymizing Sensitive Data\nLog data might contain sensitive data such as passwords, personally identifiable information (PII), credit cards, and other sensitive data. You can anonymize data so that sensitive data is removed when events are processed for indexing. The Splunk platform uses the Luhn algorithm to detect sensitive data.",
        "learnMore": "ess_anonymize_data"
      }
    },
    "viz_data_integrity_control_by_index": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_data_integrity_control_by_index"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "drilldown": "none"
      },
      "title": ""
    },
    "viz_anonymizing_sensitive_data": {
      "type": "splunk.singlevalue",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_anonymizing_sensitive_data"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
        "options": {
          "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/incident_review?form.source=Audit - Personally Identifiable Information Detection - Rule&earliest=-24h&latest=now",
          "newTab": true
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "majorValue": "> primary | seriesByName('label') | lastPoint()",
        "majorColor": "> primary | seriesByName('count') | lastPoint() | rangeValue(majorColorEditorConfig)"
      },
      "title": "",
      "context": {
        "majorColorEditorConfig": [{
          "value": "#53A051",
          "to": 1
        },{
          "value": "#DC4E41",
          "from": 1
        }]
      }
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_data_integrity_control_by_index": {
      "type": "ds.savedSearch",
      "name": "Data Integrity Control By Index",
      "options": {
        "query": "| savedsearch \"Data Protection - Data Integrity Control By Index\"",
        "ref": "Data Protection - Data Integrity Control By Index"
      }
    },
    "ds_anonymizing_sensitive_data": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Anonymizing Sensitive Data",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Incident_Management.Notable_Events_Meta where source=\"Audit - Personally Identifiable Information Detection - Rule\" | eval label=replace(\"Events with sensitive data %d\", \"%d\", count) | rangemap field=count low=0-0 default=severe"
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "now",
            "earliest": "-24h"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {},
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_data_integrity_control_by_index_markdown",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 100
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_anonymizing_sensitive_data_markdown",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 100
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_data_integrity_control_by_index",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 100,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_anonymizing_sensitive_data",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 100,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": []
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Data Protection"
}]]></definition>

result.label: Data Quality
result.title: data_quality
result.description:
This dashboard helps you assess the quality of your incoming data by revealing issues that
      occur when the data is being indexed. These issues appear as warnings and errors in your splunkd.log.
result.eai:data:
This dashboard helps you assess the quality of your incoming data by revealing issues that occur when the data is being indexed. These issues appear as warnings and errors in your splunkd.log.
-15m@m now $time.latest$ "" now false | `dmc_get_groups_containing_role(dmc_group_indexer)` | search search_group!="dmc_group_*" label search_group All indexers dmc_group_indexer false | `dmc_get_instance_info($dmc_group$)` | search search_group=dmc_group_indexer serverName serverName All indexers of selected group *
now (index=* OR index=_*) host=$host$ source=$source$ sourcetype=$sourcetype$ _index_earliest=$time.earliest$ _index_latest=$latest_time$ | search splunk_server=* | eval event_size = len(_raw) | eval time_disparity = (_indextime - _time) / 36000 | stats count by linecount, event_size, time_disparity $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Event Processing Issues by Source Type [^\|]*?)\|host(::|=)(?[^\|]*?)\|(?[^\|]*?)\|" | eval data_source = if(isnull(data_source) AND isnotnull(context_source), context_source, data_source) | eval data_host = if(isnull(data_host) AND isnotnull(context_host), context_host, data_host) | eval data_sourcetype = if(isnull(data_sourcetype) AND isnotnull(context_sourcetype), context_sourcetype, data_sourcetype) | stats count(eval(component=="LineBreakingProcessor" OR component=="DateParserVerbose" OR component=="AggregatorMiningProcessor" OR component=="MetricSchemaProcessor" OR component=="MetricsProcessor")) as total_issues dc(data_host) AS "Host Count" dc(data_source) AS "Source Count" count(eval(component=="LineBreakingProcessor")) AS "Line Breaking Issues" count(eval(component=="DateParserVerbose")) AS "Timestamp Parsing Issues" count(eval(component=="AggregatorMiningProcessor")) AS "Aggregation Issues" count(eval(component=="MetricSchemaProcessor")) AS "Metric Schema Issues" count(eval(component=="MetricsProcessor")) AS "Metrics Issues" by data_sourcetype | sort - total_issues | rename data_sourcetype as Sourcetype total_issues as "Total Issues" ]]> $job.eventSearch$ $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ $row.Sourcetype$ search?q=$sourcetype_search_string|u$ | search data_sourcetype=$row.Sourcetype$ component=LineBreakingProcessor &earliest=$time.earliest$&latest=$time.latest$ search?q=$sourcetype_search_string|u$ | search data_sourcetype=$row.Sourcetype$ component=DateParserVerbose &earliest=$time.earliest$&latest=$time.latest$ search?q=$sourcetype_search_string|u$ | search data_sourcetype=$row.Sourcetype$ component=AggregatorMiningProcessor &earliest=$time.earliest$&latest=$time.latest$ search?q=$sourcetype_search_string|u$ | search data_sourcetype=$row.Sourcetype$ component=MetricSchemaProcessor &earliest=$time.earliest$&latest=$time.latest$ search?q=$sourcetype_search_string|u$ | search data_sourcetype=$row.Sourcetype$ component=MetricsProcessor &earliest=$time.earliest$&latest=$time.latest$ search?q=$sourcetype_search_string|u$ | search data_sourcetype=$row.Sourcetype$ &earliest=$time.earliest$&latest=$time.latest$

This table shows errors and warnings emitted when the index-time settings in place do not allow for the proper processing of ingested data. Issues in this table indicate the presence of one or more of these scenarios:

  • Line Breaking Issues - Lines in the event are too long and exceed the TRUNCATE setting in props.conf. Learn More.
  • Timestamp Parsing Issues - The extraction of event time stamps was partially or completely unsuccessful. Learn More.
  • Aggregation Issues - The number of lines per event exceeds the MAX_EVENTS setting in props.conf. Learn More.
  • Metric Schema Issues - The conversion of log events to metric data was partially or completely unsuccessful. Learn More.
  • Metrics Issues - The collection of metric data was partially or completely unsuccessful. Learn More.
Issues for source type $sourcetype$ by host and source [^\|]*?)\|host(::|=)(?[^\|]*?)\|(?[^\|]*?)\|" | eval data_source = if(isnull(data_source) AND isnotnull(context_source), context_source, data_source) | eval data_host = if(isnull(data_host) AND isnotnull(context_host), context_host, data_host) | eval data_sourcetype = if(isnull(data_sourcetype) AND isnotnull(context_sourcetype), context_sourcetype, data_sourcetype) | search data_sourcetype=$sourcetype$ | stats count(eval(component=="LineBreakingProcessor" OR component=="DateParserVerbose" OR component=="AggregatorMiningProcessor" OR component=="MetricSchemaProcessor" OR component="MetricsProcessor")) as total_issues count(eval(component=="LineBreakingProcessor")) AS "Line Breaking Issues" count(eval(component=="DateParserVerbose")) AS "Timestamp Parsing Issues" count(eval(component=="AggregatorMiningProcessor")) AS "Aggregation Issues" count(eval(component=="MetricSchemaProcessor")) AS "Metric Schema Issues" count(eval(component=="MetricsProcessor")) AS "Metrics Issues" by data_host, data_source | sort - total_issues | rename data_host as Host data_source as Source total_issues as "Total Issues" ]]> $job.eventSearch$ $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ $row.Host$ $row.Source$ $row.Host$ $row.Source$ search?q=$host_and_source_search_string|u$ | search data_host=$row.Host$ data_source=$row.Source$ component=LineBreakingProcessor &earliest=$time.earliest$&latest=$time.latest$ search?q=$host_and_source_search_string|u$ | search data_host=$row.Host$ data_source=$row.Source$ component=DateParserVerbose &earliest=$time.earliest$&latest=$time.latest$ search?q=$host_and_source_search_string|u$ | search data_host=$row.Host$ data_source=$row.Source$ component=AggregatorMiningProcessor &earliest=$time.earliest$&latest=$time.latest$ search?q=$sourcetype_search_string|u$ | search data_sourcetype=$row.Sourcetype$ component=MetricSchemaProcessor &earliest=$time.earliest$&latest=$time.latest$ search?q=$sourcetype_search_string|u$ | search data_sourcetype=$row.Sourcetype$ component=MetricsProcessor &earliest=$time.earliest$&latest=$time.latest$ search?q=$host_and_source_search_string|u$ | search data_host=$row.Host$ data_source=$row.Source$ &earliest=$time.earliest$&latest=$time.latest$

This table shows errors and warnings emitted when the index-time settings in place do not allow for the proper processing of ingested data. Issues in this table indicate the presence of one or more of these scenarios:

  • Line Breaking Issues - Lines in the event are too long and exceed the TRUNCATE setting in props.conf. Learn More.
  • Timestamp Parsing Issues - The extraction of event time stamps was partially or completely unsuccessful. Learn More.
  • Aggregation Issues - The number of lines per event exceeds the MAX_EVENTS setting in props.conf. Learn More.
  • Metric Schema Issues - The conversion of log events to metric data was partially or completely unsuccessful. Learn More.
  • Metrics Issues - The collection of metric data was partially or completely unsuccessful. Learn More.

Event Time Disparity | bin time_disparity span=1 start=-24 end=-24 | stats sum(count) as "Event Count" by time_disparity | rename time_disparity as "Observed Latency (hours)"

Latency = _indextime - _time.

If the latency is off by multiples of approximately an hour, you might have a timezone configuration issue.

If the latency is suspiciously large, there is a possibility the timestamp is extracted incorrectly.

      "type": "splunk.line",

            "legend.click"
          ],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "line"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,

        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "nullValueDisplay": "zero"
      },
      "title": "Default Account Usage Over Time By App"
    },
    "viz_default_accounts_in_use": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
          "primary": "ds_default_accounts_in_use"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.user.value",
              "key": "row.user.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/access_search?form.user=$payload:row.user.value$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Default Accounts In Use"
    },
    "viz_default_local_accounts": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_default_local_accounts"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.user.value",
              "key": "row.user.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
          "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Compute_Inventory\".\"User\" | search user=\"$payload:row.user.value$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest$&latest=$global_time.latest$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Default Local Accounts"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_category_form": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Category Form",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_default_account_usage_over_time_by_app": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Default Account Usage Over Time By App",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where nodename=Authentication.Default_Authentication Authentication.action=success $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by _time,Authentication.app span=1h | timechart minspan=1h count by Authentication.app | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Authentication\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_default_accounts_in_use": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Default Accounts In Use",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,values(Authentication.user_category) as user_category,dc(Authentication.dest) as dc(dest) from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where Authentication.user_category=default $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by Authentication.user | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Authentication\")` | sort 100 - _time | fields _time,user,user_category,dc(dest)"
      }
    },
    "ds_default_local_accounts": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Default Local Accounts",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `useraccounts_tracker` | search user_category=default $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ | stats max(lastTime) as _time,values(user_category) as user_category,dc(dest) as dc(dest) by user | sort 100 - _time | fields _time,user,user_category,dc(dest)"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval category_raw=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR dest_owner_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.src_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Authentication.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Authentication.src_user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Authentication.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_raw=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR dest_owner_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Authentication.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Authentication.src_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Authentication.src_user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Authentication.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
      "visualizations": {
        "global": {
          "showProgressBar": true
        }
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "ds.search": {
          "options": {
            "queryParameters": {
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
            }
          }
        }
      }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_bunit_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "token": "bunit_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_category_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Category",
      "options": {
        "token": "category_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.category",
        "label": "primary.category"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_category_form"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_default_account_usage_over_time_by_app",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_default_accounts_in_use",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_default_local_accounts",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_bunit_form",
      "input_category_form",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Default Account Activity"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

Total $bundles_group_label$ size is the sum of all bundles sent by all search heads to all search peers.

Time spent is related to bundle size, larger bundles take more time to be replicated.

These panels account for the replication of both baseline (full bundle) and delta (incremental changes only) bundles.

The dispatch reaper clears expired search artifacts from the dispatch directory. Learn More

Long reap times can indicate storage performance issues or an excessive number of artifacts.

The Average reap time is averaged across all instances in scope.

The Maximum reap time is the highest reap time across all instances in scope.

Bundle Directory Reaper `dmc_set_index_internal` sourcetype=splunkd group=search_health_metrics name=bundle_directory_reaper search_group=$role|h$ search_group="$group$" | where bundle_dir_reaper_$reaper_agg$_ms > $bundle_dir_filter$ | `dmc_timechart_for_metrics_reaper_and_heartbeat` $reaper_agg$(bundle_dir_reaper_$reaper_agg$_ms) as bundle_dir_reaper_$reaper_agg$_ms by host $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

The knowledge bundle reaper clears expired knowledge bundles from a search peer's $SPLUNK_HOME/var/run/searchpeers directory.

Long reap times can indicate storage performance issues or an excessive number of bundles.

The Average reap time is averaged across all instances in scope.

The Maximum reap time is the highest reap time across all instances in scope.

 Time to Reap Dispatch Directory (in last 10 minutes) | rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ /services/server/introspection/search/dispatch/Dispatch_Directory_Reaper fields "Dispatch_Directory_Reaper_Average_Time(ms)" fields "Dispatch_Directory_Reaper_Max_Time(ms)"

The dispatch reaper clears expired search artifacts from the dispatch directory. Learn More

Long reap times can indicate storage performance issues or an excessive number of artifacts.

 Historical Charts -4h@m now Peer Heartbeat false Average Maximum max `dmc_set_index_internal` sourcetype=splunkd group=search_health_metrics name=distributed_peer_heartbeat host=$host$ | `dmc_timechart_for_metrics_reaper_and_heartbeat` $peer_heartbeat_agg$(Peer_Count) as peer_count, $peer_heartbeat_agg$(get_auth_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms) as get_auth_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms, $peer_heartbeat_agg$(get_bundleList_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms) as get_bundleList_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms, $peer_heartbeat_agg$(get_serverInfo_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms) as get_serverInfo_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms, | eval get_auth_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms = round(get_auth_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms) | eval get_bundleList_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms = round(get_bundleList_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms) | eval get_serverInfo_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms = round(get_serverInfo_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms) $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Time to Get Authentication, Bundle List, and Peer Info fields _time, get_auth_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms, get_bundleList_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms, get_serverInfo_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms | rename get_auth_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms as "Get Authentication", get_bundleList_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms as "Get Bundle List", get_serverInfo_$peer_heartbeat_agg$_ms as "Get Peer Info"

Authentication: the search head requests an authentication token from the peer's /services/admin/auth-tokens endpoint.

Get Bundle List: the search head requests a list of available knowledge bundles from the peer's /services/admin/bundles endpoint.

Get Peer Info: the search head requests instance information from the peer's /services/server/info endpoint.

Knowledge Bundle $bundles_group_label$ Activity $bundles_group_label$ Count fields _time, baseline_count, delta_count $bundles_group_label$ Size eval baseline_size_mb = round(baseline_bytes / 1024 / 1024, 2) | eval delta_size_mb = round(delta_bytes / 1024 / 1024, 2) | fields _time, baseline_size_mb, delta_size_mb $bundles_group_label$ Time eval baseline_sec_spent = round(baseline_msec_spent / 1000, 2) | eval delta_sec_spent = round(delta_msec_spent / 1000, 2) | fields _time, baseline_sec_spent, delta_sec_spent

$bundles_group_label$ Size is the total size of bundle pushes to all search peers. This is not bundle size.

$bundles_group_label$ Time is the total time of bundle pushes to all search peers. This is not the time spent to send one bundle.

Time spent is related to bundle size, larger bundles take more time to be replicated.

These panels account for the replication of both baseline (full bundle) and delta (incremental changes only) bundles.

 Time to Reap Dispatch Directory `dmc_set_index_internal` sourcetype=splunkd group=search_health_metrics name=dispatch_directory_reaper host=$host$ | `dmc_timechart_for_metrics_reaper_and_heartbeat` avg(dispatch_dir_reaper_mean_ms) as dispatch_dir_reaper_mean_ms, max(dispatch_dir_reaper_max_ms) as dispatch_dir_reaper_max_ms | eval dispatch_dir_reaper_mean_ms = round(dispatch_dir_reaper_mean_ms) | eval dispatch_dir_reaper_max_ms = round(dispatch_dir_reaper_max_ms) | rename dispatch_dir_reaper_mean_ms as Average, dispatch_dir_reaper_max_ms as Max $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

The dispatch reaper clears expired search artifacts from the dispatch directory. Learn More

Long reap times can indicate storage performance issues or an excessive number of artifacts.

Knowledge Bundle Directory `dmc_set_index_internal` sourcetype=splunkd group=search_health_metrics name=bundle_directory_reaper host=$host$ | `dmc_timechart_for_metrics_reaper_and_heartbeat` avg(bundle_dir_reaper_mean_ms) as bundle_dir_reaper_mean_ms, max(bundle_dir_reaper_max_ms) as bundle_dir_reaper_max_ms | eval bundle_dir_reaper_mean_ms = round(bundle_dir_reaper_mean_ms) | eval bundle_dir_reaper_max_ms = round(bundle_dir_reaper_max_ms) | rename bundle_dir_reaper_mean_ms as Average, bundle_dir_reaper_max_ms as Max $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

The knowledge bundle reaper clears expired knowledge bundles from a search peer's $SPLUNK_HOME/var/run/searchpeers directory.

Long reap times can indicate storage performance issues or an excessive number of bundles.

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_keyIndicators": {
      "type": "custom.keyIndicators",

    "viz_top_reply_codes_by_unique_sources": {
      "type": "splunk.bar",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_top_reply_codes_by_unique_sources"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",

              "token": "row.reply_code.value",

            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",

      ],
      "options": {

    },
    "viz_top_dns_query_sources": {

            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {

        "columnFormat": {
          "sparkline": {
            "width": 95
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Top DNS Query Sources"
    },
    "viz_top_dns_queries": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_top_dns_queries"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.query.value",
              "key": "row.query.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/dns_search?form.query=$payload:row.query.value$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "count": 10
      },
      "title": "Top DNS Queries"
    },
    "viz_queries_per_domain": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_queries_per_domain"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.domain.value",
              "key": "row.domain.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/dns_search?form.query=*$payload:row.domain.value$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "count": 10
      },
      "title": "Queries Per Domain"
    },
    "viz_recent_dns_queries": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_recent_dns_queries"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.query.value",
              "key": "row.query.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/dns_search?form.query=$payload:row.query.value$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "count": 10,
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "width": 170,
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(_timeConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "_timeConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Recent DNS Queries"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_top_reply_codes_by_unique_sources": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Reply Codes By Unique Sources",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` dc(DNS.src) as dc(src) from datamodel=Network_Resolution.DNS where DNS.message_type=\"RESPONSE\" by DNS.reply_code | `drop_dm_object_name(\"DNS\")` | sort 10 - dc(src)"
      }
    },
    "ds_top_dns_query_sources": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top DNS Query Sources",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Network_Resolution.DNS  where DNS.message_type=QUERY by _time,DNS.src span=1h | `drop_dm_object_name(\"DNS\")` | stats sparkline(sum(count),1h) as sparkline,sum(count) as count by src | sort 10 - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_top_dns_queries": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top DNS Queries",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Network_Resolution.DNS where DNS.message_type=QUERY by DNS.query | `drop_dm_object_name(\"DNS\")` | sort 10 - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_queries_per_domain": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Queries Per Domain",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Network_Resolution.DNS  where DNS.message_type=QUERY by DNS.query | `drop_dm_object_name(\"DNS\")` | `truncate_domain(query,domain)` | stats sum(count) as count, dc(query) as query_count, values(query) as queries by domain | sort -query_count | `mvtruncate(queries)`"
      }
    },
    "ds_recent_dns_queries": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Recent DNS Queries",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from datamodel:\"Network_Resolution\".\"DNS\" | search message_type=RESPONSE | head 50 | iplocation answer | table _time, name, record_type, query_type, query, answer, City, Country, Region"
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_keyIndicators",

      "position": {
        "x": 0,

}]]></definition>

result.label: dns_search_data
result.title: dns_search_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_dns_search_table": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_dns_search_table"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.src.value",
              "key": "row.src.value"
            },{
              "token": "row.query.value",
              "key": "row.query.value"
            },{
              "token": "row.answer.value",
              "key": "row.answer.value"
            }
          ]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Network_Resolution\".\"DNS\" | search src=\"$payload:row.src.value|u$\" query=\"$payload:row.query.value|u$\" answer=\"$payload:row.answer.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "width": 170,
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
              "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    },
    "viz_dns_search_events": {
      "type": "splunk.events",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_dns_search_events",
        "fieldsummary": "ds_dns_search_events_fieldsummary"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
      {
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [
                {
                    "token": "tag_value",
                    "key": "value"
                },
                {
                    "token": "field",
                    "key": "name"
                }
            ]
        }
      },
      {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
              "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Network_Resolution\".\"DNS\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.query_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.message_type_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.rcode_raw$ | head 100 | search \"tag::$payload:field$\"=$payload:tag_value$",
              "newTab": true,
              "events": [
                  "tag.click"
              ]
          }
      },
      {
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Network_Resolution\".\"DNS\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.query_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.message_type_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.rcode_raw$ | head 100",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "eventViewerDrilldownHandler",
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "events"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "footerFields": [
          "src",
          "src_port",
          "dest",
          "dest_port",
          "message_type",
          "record_type",
          "query_type",
          "query",
          "answer",
          "reply_code"
        ],
        "highlightValuesByField": {
          "src": "$src$",
          "dest": "$dest$",
          "query": "$query$",
          "message_type": "$message_type$",
          "reply_code": "$rcode_form$"
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_reply_codes": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Reply codes",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_dns_reply_codes`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_dns_search_table": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "DNS Search table",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,values(DNS.dest) as dest,values(DNS.message_type) as message_type,values(DNS.reply_code) as reply_code,values(DNS.query_type) as query_type,values(DNS.record_type) as record_type,count from datamodel=Network_Resolution.DNS where * $ds_input_tokens:result.src_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.message_type_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.query_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.rcode_dm$ by DNS.src,DNS.query,DNS.answer | `drop_dm_object_name(\"DNS\")` | sort - count | fields _time,src,dest,message_type,record_type,query_type,query,answer,reply_code,count"
      }
    },
    "ds_dns_search_events": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "DNS Search events",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from datamodel:\"Network_Resolution\".\"DNS\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.query_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.message_type_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.rcode_raw$ | head 100"
      }
    },
    "ds_dns_search_events_fieldsummary": {
      "type": "ds.chain",
      "name": "DNS Search events fieldsummary",
      "options": {
        "query": "fieldsummary maxvals=10",
        "extend": "ds_dns_search_events"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval src_raw=if($src|s$==\"*\" OR $src|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(src=\\\"$src$\\\")\")\n| eval src_dm=if($src|s$==\"*\" OR $src|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(DNS.src=\\\"$src$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_raw=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_dm=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(DNS.dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\")\n| eval query_raw=if($query|s$==\"*\" OR $query|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(query=\\\"$query$\\\")\")\n| eval query_dm=if($query|s$==\"*\" OR $query|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(DNS.query=\\\"$query$\\\")\")\n| eval message_type_raw=if($message_type|s$==\"*\" OR $message_type|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(message_type=\\\"$message_type$\\\")\")\n| eval message_type_dm=if($message_type|s$==\"*\" OR $message_type|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(DNS.message_type=\\\"$message_type$\\\")\")\n| eval rcode_form=$rcode_form|s$\n| eval rcode_raw=case(rcode_form==\"all_errors\",\"(reply_code!=\\\"No error\\\" AND reply_code!=\\\"NoError\\\" )\", rcode_form==\"*\" OR rcode_form==\"\", \" \", true(), \"(reply_code=\\\"$rcode_form$\\\")\")\n| eval rcode_dm=case(rcode_form==\"all_errors\",\"(DNS.reply_code!=\\\"No error\\\" AND DNS.reply_code!=\\\"NoError\\\" )\", rcode_form==\"*\" OR rcode_form==\"\", \" \", true(), \"(DNS.reply_code=\\\"$rcode_form$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      },
      "ds.chain": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_source": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Source",
      "options": {
        "token": "src",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_destination": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Destination",
      "options": {
        "token": "dest",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_query": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Query",
      "options": {
        "token": "query",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_message_type": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Message Type",
      "options": {
        "token": "message_type",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "QUERY",
          "label": "Query"
        },{
          "value": "RESPONSE",
          "label": "Response"
        },{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      }
    },
    "input_reply_code": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Reply Code",
      "options": {
        "token": "rcode_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        },{
          "value": "all_errors",
          "label": "All Errors"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.reply_code",
        "label": "primary.reply_code"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_reply_codes"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",

  "visualizations": {

            {
              "token": "row.src.value",

            },
            {
              "token": "row.dest.value",

            }]
        }},

            "newTab": true

      ],

    "viz_rarely_seen_senders": {

      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.src_user.value",
              "key": "row.src_user.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/email_search?form.sender=$payload:row.src_user.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],

    },
    "viz_rarely_seen_receivers": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_rarely_seen_receivers"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.recipient.value",
              "key": "row.recipient.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/email_search?form.recipient=$payload:row.recipient.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {},
      "title": "Rarely Seen Receivers"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_protocol": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Email Protocol",
      "options": {

        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_top_email_sources": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Email Sources",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Email.All_Email where * $ds_input_tokens:result.protocol_dm$ by _time,All_Email.src span=1h | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Email\")` | stats sparkline(sum(count),1h) as sparkline,sum(count) as count by src | sort 100 - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_large_emails": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Large Emails",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` values(All_Email.protocol) as protocol, avg(All_Email.size) as avg_size, count from datamodel=Email.All_Email where * $ds_input_tokens:result.protocol_dm$ All_Email.size>`large_email_threshold`  by All_Email.src,All_Email.src_user,All_Email.dest | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Email\")` | eval avg_size=floor(avg_size) | sort 100 - avg_size | fields protocol, src, src_user, dest, count, avg_size"
      }
    },
    "ds_rarely_seen_senders": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Rarely Seen Senders",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` values(All_Email.protocol) as protocol, dc(All_Email.src) as src_count, dc(All_Email.recipient) as recipient_count, count from datamodel=Email.All_Email where * $ds_input_tokens:result.protocol_dm$ by All_Email.src_user | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Email\")` | sort 100 + count"
      }
    },
    "ds_rarely_seen_receivers": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Rarely Seen Receivers",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` values(All_Email.protocol) as protocol, dc(All_Email.src) as src_count, dc(All_Email.src_user) as src_user_count, count from datamodel=Email.All_Email where * $ds_input_tokens:result.protocol_dm$ by All_Email.recipient | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Email\")` | sort 100 + count"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval protocol_dm=if($protocol|s$==\"*\" OR $protocol|s$==\"\", \" \", \"All_Email.protocol=\\\"$protocol$\\\"\")",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        },
        "enableSmartSources": true
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {

      }

      }

        "token": "protocol",
        "defaultValue": "*",

          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.protocol",
        "label": "primary.protocol"
      },

      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {

      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {

      }
    },{

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_email_search_table": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_email_search_table"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.src.value",
              "key": "row.src.value"
            },{
              "token": "row.src_user.value",
              "key": "row.src_user.value"
            },{
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Email\".\"All_Email\" | search src=\"$payload:row.src.value|u$\" src_user=\"$payload:row.src_user.value|u$\" dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "width": 170,
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
              "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    },
    "viz_email_search_events": {
      "type": "splunk.events",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_email_search_events",
        "fieldsummary": "ds_email_search_events_fieldsummary"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
      {
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [
                {
                    "token": "tag_value",
                    "key": "value"
                },
                {
                    "token": "field",
                    "key": "name"
                }
            ]
        }
      },
      {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
              "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Email\".\"All_Email\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.sender_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.recipient_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.protocol_raw$ | head 100 | search \"tag::$payload:field$\"=$payload:tag_value$",
              "newTab": true,
              "events": [
                  "tag.click"
              ]
          }
      },
      {
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Email\".\"All_Email\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.sender_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.recipient_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.protocol_raw$ | head 100",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "eventViewerDrilldownHandler",
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "events"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "footerFields": [
          "protocol",
          "src",
          "src_user",
          "subject",
          "dest",
          "recipient"
        ],
        "highlightValuesByField": {
          "protocol": "$protocol$",
          "src": "$src$",
          "src_user": "$sender$",
          "dest": "$dest$",
          "recipient": "$recipient$"
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_email_protocols": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Email Protocol",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_email_protocols`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_email_search_table": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Email search table",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time, values(All_Email.protocol) as protocol, values(All_Email.recipient) as recipient, count from datamodel=Email.All_Email where * $ds_input_tokens:result.sender_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.recipient_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.protocol_dm$ by All_Email.src,All_Email.src_user,All_Email.dest |  `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Email\")` | sort - count | fields _time, protocol, src, src_user, dest, recipient, count"
      }
    },
    "ds_email_search_events": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Email search events",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from datamodel:\"Email\".\"All_Email\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.sender_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.recipient_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.protocol_raw$ | head 100"
      }
    },
    "ds_email_search_events_fieldsummary": {
      "type": "ds.chain",
      "name": "Email search events fieldsummary",
      "options": {
        "query": "fieldsummary maxvals=10",
        "extend": "ds_email_search_events"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval protocol_raw=if($protocol|s$==\"*\" OR $protocol|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(protocol=\\\"$protocol$\\\")\")\n| eval protocol_dm=if($protocol|s$==\"*\" OR $protocol|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Email.protocol=\\\"$protocol$\\\")\")\n| eval src_raw=if($src|s$==\"*\" OR $src|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(src=\\\"$src$\\\")\")\n| eval src_dm=if($src|s$==\"*\" OR $src|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Email.src=\\\"$src$\\\")\")\n| eval sender_raw=if($sender|s$==\"*\" OR $sender|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(src_user=\\\"$sender$\\\")\")\n| eval sender_dm=if($sender|s$==\"*\" OR $sender|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Email.src_user=\\\"$sender$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_raw=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_dm=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Email.dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\")\n| eval recipient_raw=if($recipient|s$==\"*\" OR $recipient|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(recipient=\\\"$recipient$\\\")\")\n| eval recipient_dm=if($recipient|s$==\"*\" OR $recipient|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Email.recipient=\\\"$recipient$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      },
      "ds.chain": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_email_protocol": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Email Protocol",
      "options": {
        "token": "protocol",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.protocol",
        "label": "primary.protocol"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_email_protocols"
      }
    },
    "input_source": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Source",
      "options": {
        "token": "src",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_sender": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Sender",
      "options": {
        "token": "sender",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_destination": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Destination",
      "options": {
        "token": "dest",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_recipient": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Recipient",
      "options": {
        "token": "recipient",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-60m@m,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_email_search_table",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 285
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_email_search_events",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 285,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 530
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_email_protocol",
      "input_source",
      "input_sender",
      "input_destination",
      "input_recipient",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Email Search"
}]]></definition>

  "isEditable":true
