          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| multisearch [| from datamodel:Endpoint.Filesystem | search tag=\"change\" dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\"] [| from datamodel:Endpoint.Registry | search tag=\"change\" dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\"] [| from datamodel:Change.Endpoint_Changes | search tag=\"change\" dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\"]&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "sparkline": {
            "width": 95
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Endpoint Changes By System"
    },
    "viz_recent_endpoint_changes": {
      "type": "splunk.events",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_recent_endpoint_changes",
        "fieldsummary": "ds_recent_endpoint_changes_fieldsummary"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
      {
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [
                {
                    "token": "tag_value",
                    "key": "value"
                },
                {
                    "token": "field",
                    "key": "name"
                }
            ]
        }
      },
      {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
              "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:Endpoint.Filesystem | search tag=\"change\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$] [| from datamodel:Endpoint.Registry | search tag=\"change\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$] [| from datamodel:Change.Endpoint_Changes | search $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$] | head 100 | search \"tag::$payload:field$\"=$payload:tag_value$",
              "newTab": true,
              "events": [
                  "tag.click"
              ]
          }
      },
      {
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| multisearch [| from datamodel:Endpoint.Filesystem | search tag=\"change\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$] [| from datamodel:Endpoint.Registry | search tag=\"change\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$] [| from datamodel:Change.Endpoint_Changes | search $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$] | head 100",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "eventViewerDrilldownHandler",
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "events"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "footerFields": [
          "action",
          "object_category",
          "object_path",
          "object",
          "dest",
          "user"
        ],
        "highlightValuesByField": {
          "user_bunit": "$bunit_form$",
          "user_category": "$category_form$"
        }
      },
      "title": "Recent Endpoint Changes"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_category_form": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Category Form",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_endpoint_changes_by_action": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Endpoint Changes By Action",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Endpoint.Filesystem where Filesystem.tag=\"change\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_filesystem_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_filesystem_dm$ by _time,Filesystem.action span=10m | eval action='Filesystem.action' | `tstats` append=T count from datamodel=Endpoint.Registry where Registry.tag=\"change\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_registry_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_registry_dm$ by _time,Registry.action span=10m | eval action=if(isnull(action),'Registry.action',action) | `tstats` append=T count from datamodel=Change.All_Changes where nodename=\"All_Changes.Endpoint_Changes\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_change_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_change_dm$ by _time,All_Changes.action span=10m | eval action=if(isnull(action),'All_Changes.action',action) | timechart minspan=10m useother=`useother` count by action"
      }
    },
    "ds_endpoint_changes_by_type": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Endpoint Changes By Type",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Endpoint.Filesystem where Filesystem.tag=\"change\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_filesystem_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_filesystem_dm$ | eval object_category=\"file\" | `tstats` append=T count from datamodel=Endpoint.Registry where Registry.tag=\"change\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_registry_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_registry_dm$ | eval object_category=if(isnull(object_category),\"registry\",object_category) | `tstats` append=T count from datamodel=Change.All_Changes where nodename=\"All_Changes.Endpoint_Changes\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_change_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_change_dm$ by All_Changes.object_category | eval object_category=if(isnull(object_category),'All_Changes.object_category',object_category) | stats count by object_category | sort 10 - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_endpoint_changes_by_system": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Endpoint Changes By System",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Endpoint.Filesystem where Filesystem.tag=\"change\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_filesystem_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_filesystem_dm$ by _time,Filesystem.dest | eval object_category=\"file\",dest='Filesystem.dest' | `tstats` append=T count from datamodel=Endpoint.Registry where Registry.tag=\"change\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_registry_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_registry_dm$ by _time,Registry.dest | eval object_category=if(isnull(object_category),\"registry\",object_category),dest=if(isnull(dest),'Registry.dest',dest) | `tstats` append=T count from datamodel=Change.All_Changes where nodename=\"All_Changes.Endpoint_Changes\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_change_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_change_dm$ by _time,All_Changes.object_category,All_Changes.dest | eval object_category=if(isnull(object_category),'All_Changes.object_category',object_category),dest=if(isnull(dest),'All_Changes.dest',dest) | stats count by _time,object_category,dest | stats sparkline(sum(count)) as sparkline,values(object_category) as object_category,sum(count) as count by dest | sort 100 - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_recent_endpoint_changes": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Recent Endpoint Changes",
      "options": {
        "query": "| multisearch [| from datamodel:Endpoint.Filesystem | search tag=\"change\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$] [| from datamodel:Endpoint.Registry | search tag=\"change\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$] [| from datamodel:Change.Endpoint_Changes | search $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$] | head 100"
      }
    },
    "ds_recent_endpoint_changes_fieldsummary": {
      "type": "ds.chain",
      "name": "Recent Endpoint Changes fieldsummary",
      "options": {
        "query": "fieldsummary maxvals=10",
        "extend": "ds_recent_endpoint_changes"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval bunit_raw=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(src_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_change_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Changes.src_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_filesystem_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Filesystem.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Filesystem.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_registry_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Registry.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Registry.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_raw=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(src_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_change_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Changes.src_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_filesystem_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Filesystem.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Filesystem.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_registry_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Registry.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Registry.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "ds.chain": {
      "options": {
        "queryParameters": {
          "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
          "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_bunit_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "token": "bunit_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_category_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Category",
      "options": {
        "token": "category_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.category",
        "label": "primary.category"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_category_form"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_endpoint_changes_by_action",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_endpoint_changes_by_type",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 320
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_endpoint_changes_by_system",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 320
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_recent_endpoint_changes",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 570,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 500
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_bunit_form",
      "input_category_form",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Endpoint Changes"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

result.label: ES Use Case
result.title: ES_Use_Case
result.eai:data:
About Splunk Enterprise Security


You're exploring an example that, while could be done in Splunk Enterprise with a lot of effort, is more easily accomplished with Splunk's Enterprise Security (ES).

ES is Splunk's premium and flagship security product, which combines out-of-the-box SIEM functionality, several interactive features designed for Incident Response, and a set of security-centric data models so that you get value from your security data quickly and easily. Other important ES features include:

  • Five frameworks designed from the ground up to support your SOC and IR teams, including Asset/Identity, Risk, Notable Event, Threat Intelligence, and Adaptive Response;
  • Built-in correlation rules to notify you about common and not-so-common security incidents;
  • Investigator Journal and Timeline that allow your teams to fully document and collaborate on incidents;
  • Regularly-updated analytic content to help you detect and defend against the latest cyber-threats; and
  • Integrates with Splunk UBA to start investigations from user behavior threats and anomalies.

    • The majority of the Security Examples marked as Try Splunk ESwithin Security Essentials are "out-of-the-box" correlation searches within ES, as shown in the screencaps that you can select below. Find out more about Splunk Enterprise Security here.

     Your Use Case
         Details for your Use Case
         Screenshots for your Use Case
         Related Splunk Content
         Collection Normalization Expansion Enrichment Advanced stage1 true true true true true Example Stage 1 ES Correlation Search Results

    Personally Identifiable Information Detected


     Example Stage 2 ES Correlation Search Results

    Brute Force Access Behavior Detected


    Example Stage 3 ES Correlation Search Results

    Abnormally High Number of Endpoint Changes


    Example Stage 4 ES Correlation Search Results

    Threat Activity Detected


    Example Stage 6 ES Correlation Search Results

    UEBA Threat Detected

result.label: ESCU Use Case
result.title: ESCU_Use_Case
result.eai:data:
About Splunk Enterprise Security Content Updates

You're exploring an example that is best handled in Splunk with the advanced Enterprise Security (ES) feature, ES Content Updates (ESCU). Note that some of the ESCU content is also included in ES as the "Use Case Library" but to get the latest and greatest content, ESCU should be loaded into your ES deployment.

ES Content Updates provide Enterprise Security users with regularly-updated analytic stories to hunt for the most recent security threats analyzed by Splunk's Security Research team, and optionally add new correlation searches and notable events to ES to detect these in near real-time. The content updates are iterative, and Splunk provides free updates for them on a regular basis via Splunkbase. ESCU has the following features:

  • Over 60 Analytic Stories covering a wide range of security domains;
  • Stories broken down across a simplified Kill Chain, MITRE ATT&CK, and CSC20 for better applicability to your investigations;
  • Leverage Splunk data models from CIM where possible for efficient searching;
  • Contains narrative content to help you understand the nature of the threat and what Splunk is searching for; and
  • Integrates with Splunk ES to create notable events from findings.

    • The Security Examples marked as Try ES Content Updatewithin Security Essentials are "out-of-the-box" portions of analytic stories within ESCU, as shown in the screencaps that you can select below. Find out more about Splunk Enterprise Security Content Updates here.

    Screenshots for your Use Case

     Use Case Stories
     Related Splunk Content
         Expansion Enrichment stage3 true true true true Example Stage 3 ES Content Update Search Results:

    Monitor Web Traffic for Brand Abuse


    Example Stage 4 ES Content Update Search Results:

    Prohibited Network Traffic Allowed

result.label: ess_confighealth_data
result.title: ess_confighealth_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_introduction_markdown": {
      "type": "custom.essConfigHealthIntro",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "## **Introduction**\nThe ES Configuration Health dashboard identifies three types of configuration anomalies.\n#### **Unshipped Items**\nUnshipped items are identified as items present in the current ES installation that did not ship with the latest ES version. This is expected for items that live in /local or known backup files, so these have been filtered automatically. Please examine the remaining items and determine if they are in fact needed.\n#### **Removed Stanzas**\nRemoved stanzas are identified as stanzas that existed in a previous ES version but do no ship with the latest ES version. If any of these removed stanzas are still present in the current ES installation they will be identified. Please examine any removed stanzas and determine if they are in fact needed.\n#### **Local Overrides**\nChanged parameters are identified as parameters that were modified between the previous and latest ES versions. If any of these changed parameters differ from the latest ES version they are considered to be locally overridden. Please reconcile any local overrides with the newly shipped defaults. []()"
      }
    },
    "viz_configuration_items_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### Configuration Items"
      }
    },
    "viz_configuration_items": {
      "type": "custom.perPanelFilter",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_configuration_items"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "name",
              "key": "name"
            },
            {
              "token": "value",
              "key": "value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| esconfighealth mode=$ds_input_tokens:result.mode$ previousESVersion=$ds_input_tokens:result.previousESVersion$ | fillnull value=\"-\" stanza,parameter | eval _time=now() | `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_esconfighealth\",\"item,item_type,stanza,parameter\")` | rename ppf_cell as \"Per-panel Filter\" | search $payload:name|u$=\"$payload:value|u$\"&earliest=0.000&latest=",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "selectedRows": "$PPF:selected_rows$"
      },
      "title": "Configuration Items"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_previous_es_version": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Previous ES Version",
      "options": {
        "query": "| esconfighealth mode=previous_versions",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_configuration_items": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Configuration Items",
      "options": {
        "query": "| esconfighealth mode=$ds_input_tokens:result.mode$ previousESVersion=$ds_input_tokens:result.previousESVersion$ | fillnull value=\"-\" stanza,parameter | eval _time=now() | `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_esconfighealth\",\"item,item_type,stanza,parameter\")` | rename ppf_cell as \"Per-panel Filter\" | table \"Per-panel Filter\",item,item_type,es_version,stanza,parameter | sort -\"Per-panel Filter\",+item"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval mode=\"$mode$\"\n| eval previousESVersion=\"$previousESVersion$\"",
        "enableSmartSources": true
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "now",
            "earliest": "0"
          }
        }
      },
      "tokens": {
        "PPF": {
          "selected_rows": {
            "value": "{}"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_mode": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Mode",
      "options": {
        "token": "mode",
        "defaultValue": "all",
        "items": [{
          "value": "all",
          "label": "All"
        },{
          "value": "unshipped",
          "label": "Unshipped"
        },{
          "value": "removed_stanzas",
          "label": "Removed Stanzas"
        },{
          "value": "local_overrides",
          "label": "Local Overrides"
        }]
      }
    },
    "input_previous_es_version": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Previous ES Version",
      "options": {
        "token": "previousESVersion"
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.version",
        "label": "primary.version"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_previous_es_version"
      }
    },
    "input_ppf_button": {
      "type": "input.perPanelFilterButton",
      "options": {
        "selectedRows": "$PPF:selected_rows$",
        "ppfOptions": {
          "namespace": "SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite",
          "lookupFile": "ppf_esconfighealth.csv",
          "fields": ["item", "item_type", "stanza", "parameter"],
          "lookupEditLink": "ess_lookups_edit?namespace=SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite&file=ppf_esconfighealth.csv"
        },
        "searchManagersToReload": [ "viz_configuration_items" ]
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_introduction_markdown",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 406
      }
    },{

      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 406,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 40
      }
    },{
      "item": "input_ppf_button",
      "type": "input",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 446,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 42
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_configuration_items",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 488,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 680
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_mode",
      "input_previous_es_version"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "ES Configuration Health"
}]]></definition>

result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations":{
    "viz_key_metrics":{
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### Key Metrics"
      }
    },
    "viz_mean_time_triage":{
      "type":"splunk.singlevalue",
      "description":"",

        "primary":"ds_mean_time_triage"
      },
      "eventHandlers":[],
      "options":{
        "majorFontSize":35,
        "trendFontSize":20,

  "dataSources":{
    "ds_mean_time_triage":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Mean Time to Triage",
      "options":{
        "query":"| tstats summariesonly=true earliest(_time) as _time FROM datamodel=Incident_Management BY \"Notable_Events_Meta.rule_id\"\n    | rename \"Notable_Events_Meta.*\" as \"*\"\n    | lookup update=true incident_updates_lookup rule_id OUTPUTNEW time\n    | search time=*\n    | stats earliest(_time) as create_time, min(time) as triage_time by rule_id\n    | eval diff=triage_time-create_time, stat_type=if(create_time < relative_time(now(), \"$global_time.earliest$\"), \"past\", \"current\"), past=if(stat_type=\"past\", 1, 0), current=if(stat_type=\"current\", 1, 0), past_diff=if(stat_type=\"past\", diff, 0), current_diff=if(stat_type=\"current\", diff, 0)\n    | stats sum(past) AS past, sum(current) AS current, sum(past_diff) AS past_diff, sum(current_diff) as current_diff\n    | eval past = round(past_diff/past/60), current = round(current_diff/current/60)\n    | table past, current\n    | transpose\n    | rename \"column\" as stat_type,\"row 1\" as mean_triage_time\n    | fillnull value=0 mean_triage_time",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "$ds_input_tokens:result.deltaEarliest$",
          "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_mean_time_resolution":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Mean Time to Resolution",
      "options":{
        "query":"| tstats summariesonly=true earliest(_time) as _time FROM datamodel=Incident_Management BY \"Notable_Events_Meta.rule_id\"\n    | rename \"Notable_Events_Meta.*\" as \"*\"\n    | eval temp_time=time()+86400\n    | lookup update=true event_time_field=temp_time incident_review_lookup rule_id OUTPUTNEW time, status\n    | `get_reviewstatuses`\n    | search time=* AND status_end=true\n    | stats first(_time) as create_time, last(time) as resolve_time by rule_id\n    | eval diff=resolve_time-create_time, stat_type=if(create_time < relative_time(now(), \"$global_time.earliest$\"), \"past\", \"current\"), past=if(stat_type=\"past\", 1, 0), current=if(stat_type=\"current\", 1, 0), past_diff=if(stat_type=\"past\", diff, 0), current_diff=if(stat_type=\"current\", diff, 0)\n    | stats sum(past) AS past, sum(current) AS current, sum(past_diff) AS past_diff, sum(current_diff) as current_diff\n    | eval past = round(past_diff/past/60), current = round(current_diff/current/60)\n    | table past, current\n    | transpose\n    | rename \"column\" as stat_type,\"row 1\" as mean_resolution_time\n    | fillnull value=0 mean_resolution_time",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "$ds_input_tokens:result.deltaEarliest$",
          "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_investigation_created":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Investigations Created",
      "options":{
        "query":"| `investigations` all=true strict=true\n    | where create_time > relative_time(now(), \"$ds_input_tokens:result.deltaEarliest$\") \n    | stats count(eval(create_time < relative_time(now(), \"$global_time.earliest$\"))) AS past, count(eval(create_time >= relative_time(now(), \"$global_time.earliest$\"))) AS current\n    | transpose\n    | rename \"column\" as count_type, \"row 1\" as count",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "$ds_input_tokens:result.deltaEarliest$",
          "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_distribution_by_urgency":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Distribution by Urgency",
      "options":{
        "query":"`get_notable_index`  | eval `get_event_id_meval`, rule_id=event_id, temp_time=time()+86400 $suppressed_notables$ | lookup update=true correlationsearches_lookup _key as source OUTPUTNEW severity | lookup update=true event_time_field=temp_time incident_review_lookup rule_id OUTPUT urgency as new_urgency | eval urgency=if(isnotnull(new_urgency),new_urgency,urgency) | `get_urgency` | eval urgency = upper(substr(urgency,1,1)).lower(substr(urgency,2)) | timechart span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$ count by urgency"
      }
    },
    "ds_notables_by_domain":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Notables by Domain",
      "options":{
        "query":"| `get_earliest_notables` | lookup update=true correlationsearches_lookup _key as source OUTPUTNEW security_domain | fillnull value=\"threat\" security_domain | lookup update=true security_domain_lookup security_domain OUTPUTNEW label as security_domain_label | timechart span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$ count by security_domain_label"
      }
    },
    "ds_untriaged_notables_by_domain":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Untriaged Notables by Domain",
      "options":{
        "query":"| `untriaged_notables_by_domain` | timechart span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$ count by security_domain_label"
      }
    },
    "ds_untriaged_notables_by_type":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Untriaged Notables by Type",
      "options":{
        "query":"`get_notable_index`  | eval `get_event_id_meval`, rule_id=event_id, temp_time=time()+86400 $suppressed_notables$ | lookup update=true event_time_field=temp_time incident_review_lookup rule_id OUTPUT time as triage_time | where isnull(triage_time) | eval type=if(isnotnull(risk_object), \"Risk Notable\", \"Notable\") | timechart span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$ count by type"
      }
    },
    "ds_top_10_untriaged_notables_by_sources":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Top 10 Untriaged Notables by Sources",
      "options":{
        "query":"`get_notable_index`  | eval `get_event_id_meval`, rule_id=event_id, temp_time=time()+86400 $suppressed_notables$ | lookup update=true event_time_field=temp_time incident_review_lookup rule_id OUTPUT time as triage_time | where isnull(triage_time) | lookup update=true correlationsearches_lookup _key as source OUTPUTNEW rule_name | eval rule_name=if(isnull(rule_name),source,rule_name) | stats count by rule_name | sort - count | head 10"
      }
    },
    "ds_frequent_notable_event_sources":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Frequent Notable Event Sources",
      "options":{
        "query":"`get_notable_index`  | eval source=case(isNotNull(orig_source), orig_source, isNotNull(source_correlation_search), source_correlation_search, 1=1, source) $suppressed_notables$ | lookup update=true correlationsearches_lookup _key as source OUTPUTNEW rule_name | eval rule_name=if(isnull(rule_name),source,rule_name) | stats count by rule_name | sort - count | head 10"
      }
    },
    "ds_rare_notable_event_sources":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Rare Notable Event Sources",
      "options":{
        "query":"`get_notable_index`  | eval source=case(isNotNull(orig_source), orig_source, isNotNull(source_correlation_search), source_correlation_search, 1=1, source) $suppressed_notables$ | lookup update=true correlationsearches_lookup _key as source OUTPUTNEW rule_name | eval rule_name=if(isnull(rule_name),source,rule_name) | stats count by rule_name | sort + count | head 10"
      }
    },
    "ds_risk_notable_vs_notable_events":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Risk Notable vs Notable Events",
      "options":{
        "query":"`get_notable_index`  | eval notable_type=if(isnotnull(risk_object) AND isnotnull(risk_object_type), \"Risk Notable\", \"Notable\") $suppressed_notables$ | fields notable_type, count | timechart span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$ count by notable_type"
      }
    },
    "ds_risk_events_contributing_to_risk_notables":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Risk Events Contributing to Risk Notables",
      "options":{
        "query":"(index=risk ) OR (`get_notable_index` risk_object=* )\n    | eval source=case(index=\"risk\",source,isnull(orig_source),source_correlation_search,1=1,orig_source),search_time=if(index=\"notable\",mvzip(info_min_time,mvsort(info_max_time)),null()),risk_id=if(index=\"risk\",replace(_bkt,\".*~(.+)\",\"\\1\").\"@@\".index.\"@@\".md5(_time._raw),null()), risk_id_time=if(index=\"risk\",mvzip(risk_id,_time),null())\n    $suppressed_notables$| stats values(index) AS index, values(risk_id_time) AS risk_id_time, values(search_time) AS search_time by source, risk_object, risk_object_type\n    | mvexpand risk_id_time\n    | mvexpand search_time\n    | eval risk_id=if(isnull(risk_id_time),null(),mvindex(split(risk_id_time,\",\"),0)),risk_time=if(isnull(risk_id_time),null(),mvindex(split(risk_id_time,\",\"),1)),search_earliest=if(isnull(search_time),null(),mvindex(split(search_time,\",\"),0)), search_latest=if(isnull(search_time),null(),mvindex(split(search_time,\",\"),1)),contributing=if(isnull(search_earliest) OR isnull(search_latest) OR risk_time <= search_earliest OR risk_time >= search_latest,\"false\",\"true\")\n    | stats values(contributing) as contributing, values(risk_time) as _time by risk_id\n    | eval contributed=if(contributing=\"true\", \"Contributed\", \"Not Contributed\")\n    | timechart span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$ count by contributed"
      }
    },
    "ds_sources_not_contributing_to_risk_notables":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Sources Not Contributing to Risk Notables",
      "options":{
        "query":"(index=risk ) OR (`get_notable_index` risk_object=* )\n    | eval source=if(index=\"notable\",if(isnull(orig_source),source_correlation_search, orig_source), source)\n    $suppressed_notables$| stats count, values(index) as index by source\n    | where index != \"notable\"\n    | `get_correlations_performant`\n    | table rule_name, count\n    | sort - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_adaptive_response_action_fired":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Adaptive Response Actions Fired",
      "options":{
        "query":"| tstats summariesonly=true count from datamodel=Splunk_Audit.Modular_Actions where Modular_Actions.is_Modular_Action_Invocations=1 by _time, Modular_Actions.action_mode, Modular_Actions.action_name\n    | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Modular_Actions\")`\n    | eval action_mode=if(action_mode=\"saved\",\"automated\", action_mode), action_name=action_mode+\"-\"+action_name\n    | fields - action_mode | timechart span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$ sum(count) as count by action_name"
      }
    },
    "ds_sources_with_notable_action_vs_risk_action_enabled":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Sources with Notable Action vs Risk Action Enabled",
      "options":{
        "query":"| inputlookup correlationsearch_changes_lookup\n    | where _time > relative_time(now(),\"$global_time.earliest$\") | sort - _time | bin _time span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$\n    | dedup label, _time | where (disabled == 0) | mvexpand actions\n    | where actions=\"notable\" OR actions=\"risk\" | eval actions=if(actions=\"notable\", \"Notable Action\", \"Risk Action\") | timechart span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$ count by actions"
      }
    },
    "ds_correlation_searches_enabled_vs_disabled":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"Correlation Searches Enabled vs Disabled",
      "options":{
        "query":"| inputlookup correlationsearch_changes_lookup | where _time > relative_time(now(),\"$global_time.earliest$\")\n    | sort - _time | bin _time span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$ | dedup label, _time\n    | timechart span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$ count by disabled | rename 0 as Enabled, 1 as Disabled"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens":{
      "type":"ds.search",
      "name":"ds_input_tokens",
      "options":{
        "query":"| makeresults\n| eval ear=\"$global_time.earliest$\"\n| eval deltaEarliest=case(ear==\"-24h@h\", \"-48h@h\", ear==\"-7d@d\", \"-14d@d\", ear==\"-30d@d\", \"-60d@d\", ear=\"-90d@d\", \"-180d@d\", ear=\"-365d@d\", \"-730d@d\", true(), \"-1d@d\")\n| eval spanTimechart=case(ear==\"-24h@h\", \"1h\", ear==\"-7d@d\", \"1d\", ear==\"-30d@d\", \"1d\", ear=\"-90d@d\", \"1mon\", ear=\"-365d@d\", \"1mon\", true(), \"1d\")",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults":{
    "visualizations":{
      "global":{
        "showProgressBar":true
      }
    },
    "dataSources":{
      "ds.search":{
        "options":{
          "queryParameters":{
            "latest":"$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs":{
    "input_global_time":{
      "title":" ",
      "options":{
        "token":"global_time",
        "selections":[{
            "value":"-24h@h,now",
            "label":"24h"
        },{
          "value":"-7d@d,now",
          "label":"7d"
        },{
          "value":"-30d@d,now",
          "label":"30d"
        },{
          "value":"-90d@d,now",
          "label":"90d"
        },{
          "value":"-365d@d,now",
          "label":"1y"
        }],
        "defaultValue":"-7d@d,now"
      },
      "type":"input.simpleTimePicker"
    },
    "input_suppressed_notables": {
      "type":"input.toggleSwitch",
      "title":" ",
      "options":{
        "token":"suppressed_notables",
        "label":"Include suppressed notables",
        "onValue":" ",
        "offValue":"| `suppression_extract` | search NOT suppression=*",
        "defaultValue":"| `suppression_extract` | search NOT suppression=*"
      }
    }
  },

        "item":"viz_investigation_created",

result.label: ess_geo_data
result.title: ess_geo_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_map": {
      "type": "splunk.map",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_map"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row._geo_bounds_south.value",
              "key": "row._geo_bounds_south.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row._geo_bounds_north.value",
              "key": "row._geo_bounds_north.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row._geo_bounds_west.value",
              "key": "row._geo_bounds_west.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row._geo_bounds_east.value",
              "key": "row._geo_bounds_east.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=`notable` | where (isnotnull(src_lat) AND isnotnull(src_long)) OR (isnotnull(dest_lat) AND isnotnull(dest_long)) | table rule_name,src_lat,src_long,dest_lat,dest_long | rename src_lat as latitude,src_long as longitude | appendpipe [| rename dest_lat as latitude,dest_long as longitude] | search latitude>=$payload:row._geo_bounds_south.value$ latitude<$payload:row._geo_bounds_north.value$ longitude>=$payload:row._geo_bounds_west.value$ longitude<$payload:row._geo_bounds_east.value$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "layers": [{
          "type": "bubble"
        }],
        "zoom": 2
      },
      "title": ""
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_map": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Notable Event Geography",
      "options": {
        "query": "`notable` | where (isnotnull(src_lat) AND isnotnull(src_long)) OR (isnotnull(dest_lat) AND isnotnull(dest_long)) | table rule_name,src_lat,src_long,dest_lat,dest_long | rename src_lat as latitude,src_long as longitude | appendpipe [| rename dest_lat as latitude,dest_long as longitude] | geostats latfield=latitude longfield=longitude maxzoomlevel=18 count by rule_name",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-24h",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {},
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_map",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": []
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Notable Event Geography"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_investigation_selector": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Show Investigations",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults | eval label=\"Collaborations\", value=\"*\" | append [| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /services/authentication/current-context/context | where capabilities=\"manage_all_investigations\" | eval label=\"All\", value=\"all=true\"] | table label, value",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_unclosed_investigations": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Unclosed Investigations",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | where NOT current_status_end=1 | stats count"
      }
    },
    "ds_investigations_created": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Investigations Created",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | chart count"
      }
    },
    "ds_investigations_closed": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Investigations Closed",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | where current_status_end=1 | chart count"
      }
    },
    "ds_oldest_unclosed_investigations": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Oldest Unclosed Investigations",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | spath output=collaborators input=collaborators path={}.name | mvexpand collaborators | `get_realname(collaborators)` | rename collaborators_realname as collaborators | mvcombine collaborators | where NOT current_status_end=1 | sort create_time | eval age=toString(now()-create_time, \"duration\") | table id, name, create_time, creator_realname, mod_time, current_status_name, collaborators, collaborator_count, age"
      }
    },
    "ds_total_time_spent_on_investigations": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Total Time Spent On Investigations",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | spath output=collaborators input=collaborators path={}.name | mvexpand collaborators | `get_realname(collaborators)` | rename collaborators_realname as collaborators | mvcombine collaborators | `investigation_get_open_duration(status, status_open_duration)` | sort - status_open_duration  | head 30 | eval status_open_duration=tostring(status_open_duration, \"duration\") | table id, name, create_time, creator_realname, mod_time, current_status_name, collaborators, status_open_duration"
      }
    },
    "ds_time_unclosed_in_days_average_status_open_duration": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Average Status Open Duration",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | `investigation_get_open_duration(status, status_open_duration)` | stats avg(status_open_duration) | eval  \"avg(status_open_duration)\"='avg(status_open_duration)'/60/60/24"
      }
    },
    "ds_time_unclosed_in_days_median_status_open_duration": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Median Status Open Duration",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | `investigation_get_open_duration(status, status_open_duration)` | stats median(status_open_duration) | eval \"median(status_open_duration)\"='median(status_open_duration)'/60/60/24"
      }
    },
    "ds_time_to_complete_in_days_average_time_to_resolve": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Average Time to Resolve",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | eval time_resolved=if(current_status_end=1, current_status_time, now()) | eval time_to_resolve=time_resolved-create_time | stats avg(time_to_resolve) | eval \"avg(time_to_resolve)\"='avg(time_to_resolve)'/60/60/24"
      }
    },
    "ds_time_to_complete_in_days_median_time_to_resolve": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Median Time to Resolve",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | eval time_resolved=if(current_status_end=1, current_status_time, now()) | eval time_to_resolve=time_resolved-create_time | stats median(time_to_resolve) | eval \"median(time_to_resolve)\"='median(time_to_resolve)'/60/60/24"
      }
    },
    "ds_investigations_unclosed_per_collaborator": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Investigations Unclosed Per Collaborator",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | spath output=collaborator input=collaborators path={}.name | mvexpand collaborator | `get_realname(collaborator)` | where NOT current_status_end=1 | rename current_status_name as status | chart count over collaborator_realname by status"
      }
    },
    "ds_investigations_unclosed_per_creator": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Investigations Unclosed Per Creator",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | where NOT current_status_end=1 | rename current_status_name as status | chart count over creator by status"
      }
    },
    "ds_investigations_unclosed_per_status": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Investigations Unclosed Per Status",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | where NOT current_status_end=1 | stats count by current_status_name | sort - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_number_of_collaborators_per_unclosed_investigation": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Number of Collaborators Per Unclosed Investigation",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | where NOT current_status_end=1 | top collaborator_count"
      }
    },
    "ds_longest_inactive_investigation_unclosed": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Longest Inactive Investigation (Unclosed)",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | spath output=collaborators input=collaborators path={}.name | mvexpand collaborators | `get_realname(collaborators)` | rename collaborators_realname as collaborators | mvcombine collaborators | where NOT current_status_end=1 | sort mod_time | head 30 |eval inactive_time=tostring(now() - mod_time, \"duration\") | table id, inactive_time, name, create_time, creator_realname, mod_time, current_status_name, collaborators, collaborator_count"
      }
    },
    "ds_most_often_reopened": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Most Often Reopened",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | `investigation_get_reopen_count` | where status_reopen_count>0 | sort - status_reopen_count | table id, name, create_time, mod_time, current_status_name, status_reopen_count"
      }
    },
    "ds_investigations_created_per_day": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Investigations Created Per Day",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` $ds_input_tokens:result.all_raw$ earliest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$ds_input_tokens:result.create_time.latest$\" | `get_realname(creator)` | fieldformat create_time=strftime(create_time, \"%c\") | `uitime(\"mod_time\")` | eval _time=create_time, id=title | `investigation_get_current_status` | `investigation_get_collaborator_count` | eval _time=create_time | timechart span=1d count by creator_realname"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval all_raw=if($all|s$==\"*\" OR $all|s$==\"\", \" \", \"$all$\")\n| eval create_time.earliest=\"$create_time.earliest$\"\n| eval create_time.latest=\"$create_time.latest$\"",
        "enableSmartSources": true
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "now",
            "earliest": "0"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_investigation_selector": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Show Investigations",
      "options": {
        "token": "all",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.value",
        "label": "primary.label"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_investigation_selector"
      }
    },
    "input_create_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Create Time",
      "options": {
        "token": "create_time",
        "defaultValue": "-7d@h,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_unclosed_investigations",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 400,
        "h": 120
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_investigations_created",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 400,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 400,
        "h": 120
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_investigations_closed",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 800,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 400,
        "h": 120
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_oldest_unclosed_investigations",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 120,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_total_time_spent_on_investigations",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 370,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_time_unclosed_in_days",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 620,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 40
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_time_to_complete_in_days",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 620,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 40
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_time_unclosed_in_days_average_status_open_duration",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 660,
        "w": 300,
        "h": 120
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_time_unclosed_in_days_median_status_open_duration",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 300,
        "y": 660,
        "w": 300,
        "h": 120
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_time_to_complete_in_days_average_time_to_resolve",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 660,
        "w": 300,
        "h": 120
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_time_to_complete_in_days_median_time_to_resolve",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 900,
        "y": 660,
        "w": 300,
        "h": 120
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_investigations_unclosed_per_collaborator",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 780,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 270
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_investigations_unclosed_per_creator",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 1050,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_investigations_unclosed_per_status",
      "type": "block",

}]]></definition>

result.label: ess_modular_action_center_data
result.title: ess_modular_action_center_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_keyIndicators": {
      "type": "custom.keyIndicators",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {},
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "groupName": "modular_action_center"
      }
    },
    "viz_action_invocations_over_time_by_name": {
      "type": "splunk.column",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_action_invocations_over_time_by_name"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Splunk_Audit\".\"Modular_Actions\" | search",
            "searchKey": "action_name",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            },
            "autoPause": "$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$"
          },
          "handlerName": "modularActionCenterDrilldownHandler",
          "events": [
            "point.click",
            "legend.click"
          ],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "column"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "xAxisTitleText": "time",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "stackMode": "stacked"
      },
      "title": "Action Invocations Over Time By Name"
    },
    "viz_top_actions_by_name": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_top_actions_by_name"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.action_name.value",
              "key": "row.action_name.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Splunk_Audit\".\"Modular_Actions\" | search action_name=\"$payload:row.action_name.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "showInternalFields": false
      },
      "title": "Top Actions By Name"
    },
    "viz_top_actions_by_search": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "options": {},
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_top_actions_by_search"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.search_name.value",
              "key": "row.search_name.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Splunk_Audit\".\"Modular_Actions\" | search search_name=\"$payload:row.search_name.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "title": "Top Actions By Search"
    },
    "viz_recent_adaptive_response_actions": {
      "type": "splunk.events",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_recent_adaptive_response_actions",
        "fieldsummary": "ds_ess_modular_action_center_fieldsummary"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
      {
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [
                {
                    "token": "tag_value",
                    "key": "value"
                },
                {
                    "token": "field",
                    "key": "name"
                }
            ]
        }
      },
      {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
              "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Splunk_Audit\".\"Modular_Actions\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_mode_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.action_name_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.action_status_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.sid_raw$ | head 100 | search \"tag::$payload:field$\"=$payload:tag_value$",
              "newTab": true,
              "events": [
                  "tag.click"
              ]
          }
      },
      {
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Splunk_Audit\".\"Modular_Actions\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_mode_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.action_name_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.action_status_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.sid_raw$ | head 100",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "eventViewerDrilldownHandler",
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "events"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "footerFields": [
          "signature",
          "action_name",
          "search_name",
          "app",
          "user",
          "action_mode",
          "action_status"
        ],
        "highlightValuesByField": {
          "action_name": "$action_name$",
          "user": "$user$",
          "action_mode": "$action_mode$",
          "action_status": "$action_status$"
        },
        "rowNumbers": false,
        "type": "list",
        "list.wrap": true
      },
      "title": "Recent Adaptive Response Actions"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_action_modes": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Action Modes",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cam_action_modes`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_action_statuses": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Action Statuses",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cam_action_statuses`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_user_realnames": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "User Realnames",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from inputlookup:user_realnames_lookup",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_action_invocations_over_time_by_name": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Action Invocations Over Time By Name",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` min(_time) as _time,latest(Modular_Actions.action_status) as action_status from datamodel=Splunk_Audit.Modular_Actions where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_mode_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.action_name_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.action_status_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.sid_dm$ by Modular_Actions.action_name, Modular_Actions.sid, Modular_Actions.rid | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_status_raw$ | timechart count by Modular_Actions.action_name"
      }
    },
    "ds_top_actions_by_name": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Actions By Name",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` latest(Modular_Actions.action_status) as action_status,values(Modular_Actions.search_name) as search_name,latest(Modular_Actions.duration) as duration from datamodel=Splunk_Audit.Modular_Actions where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_mode_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.action_name_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.sid_dm$ by Modular_Actions.action_mode,Modular_Actions.action_name,Modular_Actions.sid,Modular_Actions.rid,Modular_Actions.user | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_status_raw$ | stats values(Modular_Actions.action_mode) as action_mode,values(search_name) as search_name,values(Modular_Actions.user) as user,dc(Modular_Actions.sid) as search_count,avg(duration) as \"avg_duration (ms)\",count as result_count by Modular_Actions.action_name | eval \"avg_duration (ms)\"=round('avg_duration (ms)', 1) | rename Modular_Actions.action_name as action_name | sort 10 - result_count | `es_get_cam` | fields action_name,cam_category,cam_subject,action_mode,search_name,user,search_count,result_count,\"avg_duration (ms)\""
      }
    },
    "ds_top_actions_by_search": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Actions By Search",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` latest(Modular_Actions.action_status) as action_status,values(Modular_Actions.search_name) as search_name from datamodel=Splunk_Audit.Modular_Actions where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_mode_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.action_name_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.sid_dm$ by Modular_Actions.action_mode,Modular_Actions.action_name,Modular_Actions.sid,Modular_Actions.rid,Modular_Actions.user | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_status_raw$ | stats values(Modular_Actions.action_name) as action_name,values(Modular_Actions.action_mode) as action_mode,values(Modular_Actions.user) as user,dc(Modular_Actions.sid) as search_count,count as result_count by search_name | sort 10 - result_count"
      }
    },
    "ds_recent_adaptive_response_actions": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Recent Adaptive Response Actions",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from datamodel:\"Splunk_Audit\".\"Modular_Actions\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_mode_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.action_name_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.action_status_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.sid_raw$ | head 100"
      }
    },
    "ds_ess_modular_action_center_fieldsummary": {
      "type": "ds.chain",
      "name": "Recent Adaptive Response Actions events fieldsummary",
      "options": {
        "query": "fieldsummary maxvals=10",
        "extend": "ds_recent_adaptive_response_actions"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval action_status_raw=if($action_status|s$==\"*\" OR $action_status|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(action_status=\\\"$action_status$\\\")\")\n| eval action_status_dm=if($action_status|s$==\"*\" OR $action_status|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Modular_Actions.action_status=\\\"$action_status$\\\")\")\n| eval action_name_raw=if($action_name|s$==\"*\" OR $action_name|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(action_name=\\\"$action_name$\\\")\")\n| eval action_name_dm=if($action_name|s$==\"*\" OR $action_name|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Modular_Actions.action_name=\\\"$action_name$\\\")\")\n| eval action_mode_raw=if($action_mode|s$==\"*\" OR $action_mode|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(action_mode=\\\"$action_mode$\\\")\")\n| eval action_mode_dm=if($action_mode|s$==\"*\" OR $action_mode|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Modular_Actions.action_mode=\\\"$action_mode$\\\")\")\n| eval user_raw=if($user|s$==\"*\" OR $user|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(user=\\\"$user$\\\")\")\n| eval user_dm=if($user|s$==\"*\" OR $user|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Modular_Actions.user=\\\"$user$\\\")\")\n| eval sid_raw=if($sid_form|s$==\"*\" OR $sid_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(sid=\\\"$sid_form$\\\" OR orig_sid=\\\"$sid_form$\\\")\")\n| eval sid_dm=if($sid_form|s$==\"*\" OR $action_mode|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Modular_Actions.sid=\\\"$sid_form$\\\" OR Modular_Actions.orig_sid=\\\"$sid_form$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      },
      "ds.chain": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_action_mode": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Action Mode",
      "options": {
        "token": "action_mode",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [
          {
            "value": "*",
            "label": "All"
          }
        ]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.action_mode",
        "label": "primary.action_mode"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_action_modes"
      }
    },
    "input_action_name": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Action Name",
      "options": {
        "token": "action_name",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_action_status": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Action Status",
      "options": {
        "token": "action_status",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [
          {
            "value": "*",
            "label": "All"
          }
        ]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.action_status",
        "label": "primary.action_status"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_action_statuses"
      }
    },
    "input_user": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "User",
      "options": {
        "token": "user",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [
          {
            "value": "*",
            "label": "All"
          }
        ]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.user",
        "label": "primary.realname"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_user_realnames"
      }
    },
    "input_sid_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Search ID (sid)",
      "options": {
        "token": "sid_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_keyIndicators",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 150
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_action_invocations_over_time_by_name",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 150,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_top_actions_by_name",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 400,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 400
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_top_actions_by_search",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 800,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 400
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_recent_adaptive_response_actions",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 1200,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 400
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_action_mode",
      "input_action_name",
      "input_action_status",
      "input_user",
      "input_sid_form",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Adaptive Response Action Center"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

<definition><![CDATA[{

    "viz_mean_time_triage": {

      },
      "context": {

          },{

        }],

          },{

        }]
      },

    },
    "viz_investigation_created": {
      "type": "splunk.singlevalue",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {

      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "majorFontSize": 35,
        "trendFontSize": 20,
        "sparklineDisplay": "off",
        "trendColor": "> trendValue | rangeValue(trendColorThresholds)"
      },
      "context": {
        "trendColorThresholds": [{
            "from": 1,
            "value": "#e40606"
          },{
            "to": 1,
            "value": "#008000"
        }],
        "strokeColorThresholds": [{
            "from": 1,
            "value": "#e40606"
          },{
            "to": 1,

        }]
      },
      "title": "Investigations Created"
    },
    "viz_workload": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",

      }
    },
    "viz_assigned_notables_over_time": {

    "viz_notables_end_state_by_time": {

          "Total Assigned": "#99C5D7",
