        }
      },
      "title": "Notables In End State by Time"
    },
    "viz_analyst_close_rate_over_time": {
      "type": "splunk.column",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_analyst_close_rate_over_time"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "stackMode": "stacked",
        "columnSpacing": 25,
        "yAxisTitleVisibility": "hide",
        "xAxisTitleVisibility": "hide",
        "legendDisplay": "bottom",
        "seriesColorsByField": {
          "Notables Open": "#FCCF87",
          "Notables Closed": "#00ABFF"
        }
      },
      "title": "Analyst Close Rate Over Time"
    },
    "viz_dispositions": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### Dispositions"
      }
    },
    "viz_disposition_over_time": {
      "type": "splunk.line",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_disposition_over_time"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "yAxisTitleVisibility": "hide",
        "xAxisTitleVisibility": "hide",
        "nullValueDisplay": "zero",
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisOff",
        "seriesColorsByField": {
          "Unassigned": "#26AA92",
          "True Positive - Suspicious Activity": "#5ECE5A",
          "Benign Positive - Suspicious But Expected": "#F29BAC",
          "False Positive - Incorrect Analytic Logic": "#FCD9A3",
          "False Positive - Inaccurate Data": "#CEF06C",
          "Other": "#4EB2D2",
          "Undetermined": "#FB865C"
        }
      },
      "title": "Disposition Over Time"
    },
    "viz_false_positive_incorrect_analytic_logic": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_false_positive_incorrect_analytic_logic"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "headerVisibility": "none",
        "count": 5
      },
      "title": "Sources Contributing to False Positive - Incorrect Analytic Logic"
    },
    "viz_false_positive_inaccurate_data": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_false_positive_inaccurate_data"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "headerVisibility": "none",
        "count": 5
      },
      "title": "Sources Contributing to False Positive - Inaccurate Data"
    },
    "viz_true_positive_suspicious_activity": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_true_positive_suspicious_activity"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "headerVisibility": "none",
        "count": 5
      },
      "title": "Sources Contributing to True Positive - Suspicious Activity"
    },
    "viz_benign_positive_suspicious_expected": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_benign_positive_suspicious_expected"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "headerVisibility": "none",
        "count": 5
      },
      "title": "Sources Contributing to Benign Positive - Suspicious But Expected"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_mean_time_triage": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Mean time to triage",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats summariesonly=true earliest(_time) as _time FROM datamodel=Incident_Management BY \"Notable_Events_Meta.rule_id\"\n    | rename \"Notable_Events_Meta.*\" as \"*\"\n    | lookup update=true incident_updates_lookup rule_id OUTPUTNEW time\n    | search time=*\n    | stats earliest(_time) as create_time, min(time) as triage_time by rule_id\n    | eval diff=triage_time-create_time, stat_type=if(create_time < relative_time(now(), \"$global_time.earliest$\"), \"past\", \"current\"), past=if(stat_type=\"past\", 1, 0), current=if(stat_type=\"current\", 1, 0), past_diff=if(stat_type=\"past\", diff, 0), current_diff=if(stat_type=\"current\", diff, 0)\n    | stats sum(past) AS past, sum(current) AS current, sum(past_diff) AS past_diff, sum(current_diff) as current_diff\n    | eval past = round(past_diff/past/60), current = round(current_diff/current/60)\n    | table past, current\n    | transpose\n    | rename \"column\" as stat_type,\"row 1\" as mean_triage_time\n    | fillnull value=0 mean_triage_time",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "$ds_input_tokens:result.deltaEarliest$",
          "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_mean_time_resolution": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Mean time to resolution",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats summariesonly=true earliest(_time) as _time FROM datamodel=Incident_Management BY \"Notable_Events_Meta.rule_id\"\n    | rename \"Notable_Events_Meta.*\" as \"*\"\n    | eval temp_time=time()+86400\n    | lookup update=true event_time_field=temp_time incident_review_lookup rule_id OUTPUTNEW time, status\n    | `get_reviewstatuses`\n    | search time=* AND status_end=true\n    | stats first(_time) as create_time, last(time) as resolve_time by rule_id\n    | eval diff=resolve_time-create_time, stat_type=if(create_time < relative_time(now(), \"$global_time.earliest$\"), \"past\", \"current\"), past=if(stat_type=\"past\", 1, 0), current=if(stat_type=\"current\", 1, 0), past_diff=if(stat_type=\"past\", diff, 0), current_diff=if(stat_type=\"current\", diff, 0)\n    | stats sum(past) AS past, sum(current) AS current, sum(past_diff) AS past_diff, sum(current_diff) as current_diff\n    | eval past = round(past_diff/past/60), current = round(current_diff/current/60)\n    | table past, current\n    | transpose\n    | rename \"column\" as stat_type,\"row 1\" as mean_resolution_time\n    | fillnull value=0 mean_resolution_time",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "$ds_input_tokens:result.deltaEarliest$",
          "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_investigation_created": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Investigations Created",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `investigations` all=true strict=true\n    | where create_time > relative_time(now(), \"$ds_input_tokens:result.deltaEarliest$\")  \n    | stats count(eval(create_time < relative_time(now(), \"$global_time.earliest$\"))) AS past, count(eval(create_time >= relative_time(now(), \"$global_time.earliest$\"))) AS current\n    | transpose\n    | rename \"column\" as count_type, \"row 1\" as count",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "$ds_input_tokens:result.deltaEarliest$",
          "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_assigned_notables_over_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Assigned notables over time",
      "options": {
        "query": "`get_notable_index` \n    | eval `get_event_id_meval`, rule_id=event_id\n    $suppressed_notables$| `get_current_status`\n    | `get_owner`\n    | timechart span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$ count(eval(owner!=\"unassigned\")) AS \"Assigned Notables\", count(eval(owner=\"unassigned\")) AS \"Unassigned Notables\""
      }
    },
    "ds_notables_end_state_by_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Notables in end state by time",
      "options": {
        "query": "`get_notable_index` \n    | eval `get_event_id_meval`, rule_id=event_id\n    $suppressed_notables$| `get_current_status`\n    | `get_owner`\n    | where owner != \"unassigned\"\n    | timechart span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$ count(eval(status_end=\"true\")) AS \"In End State\", count AS \"Total Assigned\""
      }
    },
    "ds_analyst_close_rate_over_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Analyst close rate over time",
      "options": {
        "query": "`get_notable_index` \n    | eval `get_event_id_meval`, rule_id=event_id\n    $suppressed_notables$| `get_current_status`\n    | `get_owner`\n    | where owner != \"unassigned\"\n    | stats count(eval(status_end = \"true\")) AS \"Notables Closed\", count(eval(status_end = \"false\")) AS \"Notables Open\" by owner_realname\n    | rename owner_realname AS \"Analyst\""
      }
    },
    "ds_disposition_over_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Disposition Over time",
      "options": {
        "query": "`get_notable_index` \n    | eval `get_event_id_meval`, rule_id=event_id, temp_time=time()+86400\n    $suppressed_notables$| lookup update=true correlationsearches_lookup _key as source OUTPUTNEW default_disposition\n    | lookup update=true event_time_field=temp_time incident_review_lookup rule_id OUTPUT disposition as new_disposition\n    | eval disposition=if(isnotnull(new_disposition),new_disposition,default_disposition)\n    | `get_notable_disposition`\n    | timechart span=$ds_input_tokens:result.spanTimechart$ count by disposition_label"
      }
    },
    "ds_false_positive_incorrect_analytic_logic": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "False Positive Incorrect analytic logic",
      "options": {
        "query": "`get_notable_index` \n    | eval `get_event_id_meval`, rule_id=event_id, temp_time=time()+86400\n    $suppressed_notables$| lookup update=true correlationsearches_lookup _key as source OUTPUTNEW default_disposition\n    | lookup update=true event_time_field=temp_time incident_review_lookup rule_id OUTPUT disposition as new_disposition\n    | eval disposition=if(isnotnull(new_disposition),new_disposition,default_disposition)\n    | `get_notable_disposition`\n    | where disposition=\"disposition:3\"\n    | stats count by source\n    | sort - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_false_positive_inaccurate_data": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "False Positive Inaccurate data",
      "options": {
        "query": "`get_notable_index` \n    | eval `get_event_id_meval`, rule_id=event_id, temp_time=time()+86400\n    $suppressed_notables$| lookup update=true correlationsearches_lookup _key as source OUTPUTNEW default_disposition\n    | lookup update=true event_time_field=temp_time incident_review_lookup rule_id OUTPUT disposition as new_disposition\n    | eval disposition=if(isnotnull(new_disposition),new_disposition,default_disposition)\n    | `get_notable_disposition`\n    | where disposition=\"disposition:4\"\n    | stats count by source\n    | sort - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_true_positive_suspicious_activity": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "True Positive Suspicious activity",
      "options": {
        "query": "`get_notable_index` \n    | eval `get_event_id_meval`, rule_id=event_id, temp_time=time()+86400\n    $suppressed_notables$| lookup update=true correlationsearches_lookup _key as source OUTPUTNEW default_disposition\n    | lookup update=true event_time_field=temp_time incident_review_lookup rule_id OUTPUT disposition as new_disposition\n    | eval disposition=if(isnotnull(new_disposition),new_disposition,default_disposition)\n    | `get_notable_disposition`\n    | where disposition=\"disposition:1\"\n    | stats count by source\n    | sort - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_benign_positive_suspicious_expected": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Benign Positive Suspicious but expected",
      "options": {
        "query": "`get_notable_index` \n    | eval `get_event_id_meval`, rule_id=event_id, temp_time=time()+86400\n    $suppressed_notables$| lookup update=true correlationsearches_lookup _key as source OUTPUTNEW default_disposition\n    | lookup update=true event_time_field=temp_time incident_review_lookup rule_id OUTPUT disposition as new_disposition\n    | eval disposition=if(isnotnull(new_disposition),new_disposition,default_disposition)\n    | `get_notable_disposition`\n    | where disposition=\"disposition:2\"\n    | stats count by source\n    | sort - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults\n| eval ear=\"$global_time.earliest$\"\n| eval deltaEarliest=case(ear==\"-24h@h\", \"-48h@h\", ear==\"-7d@d\", \"-14d@d\", ear==\"-30d@d\", \"-60d@d\", ear=\"-90d@d\", \"-180d@d\", ear=\"-365d@d\", \"-730d@d\", true(), \"-1d@d\")\n| eval spanTimechart=case(ear==\"-24h@h\", \"1h\", ear==\"-7d@d\", \"1d\", ear==\"-30d@d\", \"1d\", ear=\"-90d@d\", \"1mon\", ear=\"-365d@d\", \"1mon\", true(), \"1d\")\n",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.simpleTimePicker",
      "title": "",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-7d@d,now",
        "selections": [{
          "value": "-24h@h,now",
          "label": "24h"
        },{
          "value": "-7d@d,now",
          "label": "7d"
        },{
          "value": "-30d@d,now",
          "label": "30d"
        },{
          "value": "-90d@d,now",
          "label": "90d"
        },{
          "value": "-365d@d,now",
          "label": "1y"
        }]
      }
    },
    "input_suppressed_notables": {
      "type":"input.toggleSwitch",
      "title":" ",
      "options":{
        "token":"suppressed_notables",
        "label":"Include suppressed notables",
        "onValue":" ",
        "offValue":"| `suppression_extract` | search NOT suppression=*\n    ",
        "defaultValue":"| `suppression_extract` | search NOT suppression=*\n    "
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
        "item": "viz_key_metrics",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 0,
          "y": 0,
          "w": 120,
          "h": 40
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_mean_time_triage",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 0,
          "y": 40,
          "w": 400,
          "h": 110
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_workload",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 0,
          "y": 150,
          "w": 120,
          "h": 40
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_assigned_notables_over_time",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 0,
          "y": 190,
          "w": 400,
          "h": 230
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_dispositions",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 0,
          "y": 420,
          "w": 120,
          "h": 40
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_disposition_over_time",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 0,
          "y": 460,
          "w": 1200,
          "h": 230
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_false_positive_incorrect_analytic_logic",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 0,
          "y": 690,
          "w": 600,
          "h": 230
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_true_positive_suspicious_activity",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 0,
          "y": 920,
          "w": 600,
          "h": 230
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_mean_time_resolution",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 400,
          "y": 40,
          "w": 400,
          "h": 110
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_notables_end_state_by_time",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 400,
          "y": 190,
          "w": 400,
          "h": 230
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_false_positive_inaccurate_data",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 600,
          "y": 690,
          "w": 600,
          "h": 230
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_benign_positive_suspicious_expected",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 600,
          "y": 920,
          "w": 600,
          "h": 230
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_investigation_created",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 800,
          "y": 40,
          "w": 400,
          "h": 110
        }
      },{
        "item": "viz_analyst_close_rate_over_time",
        "type": "block",
        "position": {
          "x": 800,
          "y": 190,
          "w": 400,
          "h": 230
        }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_global_time",
      "input_suppressed_notables"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "SOC Operations"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

result.label: ess_view_auditing_data
result.title: ess_view_auditing_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_view_activity_over_time": {
      "type": "splunk.line",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_view_activity_over_time"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Splunk_Audit\".\"View_Activity\" | search",
            "searchKey": "view",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "-7d@d",
              "latest": "now"
            },
            "autopause": "$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$"
          },
          "handlerName": "searchDrilldownHandler",
          "events": [
            "point.click",
            "legend.click"
          ],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "line"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "xAxisTitleText": "time",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count"
      },
      "title": "View Activity Over Time"
    },
    "viz_expected_view_activity": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_expected_view_activity"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
          "tokenNamespace": "payload",
          "tokens": [{
            "token": "row.view.value",
            "key": "row.view.value"
          }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Splunk_Audit\".\"View_Activity\" | search view=\"$payload:row.view.value$\"&earliest=-7d@d&latest=now&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "app": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('app') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "view": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('view') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "alignPositionCol": [ "left" ]
      },
      "title": "Expected View Activity"
    },
    "viz_web_service_errors": {
      "type": "splunk.events",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_web_service_errors",
        "fieldsummary": "ds_web_service_errors_fieldsummary"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
      {
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [
                {
                    "token": "tag_value",
                    "key": "value"
                },
                {
                    "token": "field",
                    "key": "name"
                }
            ]
        }
      },
      {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
              "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Splunk_Audit\".\"Web_Service_Errors\" | head 1000 | search \"tag::$payload:field$\"=$payload:tag_value$",
              "newTab": true,
              "events": [
                  "tag.click"
              ]
          }
      },
      {
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Splunk_Audit\".\"Web_Service_Errors\" | head 1000",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "-24h@h",
              "latest": "now"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "eventViewerDrilldownHandler",
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "events"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "footerFields": [
          "host",
          "source",
          "sourcetype"
        ],
        "highlightValuesByField": {}
      },
      "title": "Web Service Errors"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_view_activity_over_time": {
      "type": "ds.savedSearch",
      "name": "Audit - ES View Activity Over Time",
      "options": {
        "query": "| savedsearch \"Audit - ES View Activity Over Time\"",
        "ref": "Audit - ES View Activity Over Time"
      }
    },
    "ds_expected_view_activity": {
      "type": "ds.savedSearch",
      "name": "Audit - Expected ES View Activity",
      "options": {
        "query": "| savedsearch \"Audit - Expected ES View Activity\"",
        "ref": "Audit - Expected ES View Activity"
      }
    },
    "ds_web_service_errors": {
      "type": "ds.savedSearch",
      "name": "Audit - Web Service Errors",
      "options": {
        "query": "| savedsearch \"Audit - Web Service Errors\"",
        "ref": "Audit - Web Service Errors"
      }
    },
    "ds_web_service_errors_fieldsummary": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Audit - Web Service Errors fieldsummary",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from datamodel:\"Splunk_Audit\".\"Web_Service_Errors\" | head 1000 | fieldsummary maxvals=10",
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "now",
            "earliest": "-24h@h"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
          "showProgressBar": true
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {},
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_view_activity_over_time",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    }, {
      "item": "viz_expected_view_activity",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    }, {
      "item": "viz_web_service_errors",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 500,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 500
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": []
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "View Audit"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable": true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

result.label: forwarder_auditing_data
result.title: forwarder_auditing_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_event_count_over_time_by_host_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### Event Count Over Time By Host"
      }
    },
    "viz_event_count_over_time_by_host": {
      "type": "splunk.area",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_event_count_over_time_by_host"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "name",
              "key": "name"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=search index=* host=\"$payload:name|u$\"&earliest=$time_token_event_count_time_host.earliest|u$&latest=$time_token_event_count_time_host.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "nullValueDisplay": "zero"
      },
      "title": ""
    },
    "viz_hosts_by_last_report_time_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### Hosts By Last Report Time"
      }
    },
    "viz_hosts_by_last_report_time": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_hosts_by_last_report_time"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.host.value",
              "key": "row.host.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.firstTimeEpoch.value",
              "key": "row.firstTimeEpoch.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.lastTimeEpoch.value",
              "key": "row.lastTimeEpoch.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=search index=* host=\"$payload:row.host.value|u$\"&earliest=$payload:row.firstTimeEpoch.value|u$&latest=$payload:row.lastTimeEpoch.value|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "dayDiff": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName(\"dayDiff\") | formatByType(dayDiffPrecisionConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "dayDiffPrecisionConfig": {
          "dayDiff": {
            "precision": 2
          }
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    },
    "viz_splunkd_process_utilization_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### Splunkd Process Utilization"
      }
    },
    "viz_splunkd_process_utilization": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_splunkd_process_utilization"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Endpoint\".\"Processes\" | search process=*splunkd* dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\"&earliest=$time_token_proc_util.earliest|u$&latest=$time_token_proc_util.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {},
      "title": ""
    },
    "viz_splunk_service_start_mode_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### Splunk Service Start Mode"
      }
    },
    "viz_splunk_service_start_mode": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_splunk_service_start_mode"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Endpoint\".\"Services\" | search (service=splunkd OR service=splunk) dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\"&earliest=$time_token_service_start.earliest|u$&latest=$time_token_service_start.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {},
      "title": ""
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_category": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Category",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_event_count_over_time_by_host": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Event Count Over Time By Host",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` count where index=* $ds_input_tokens:result.system_raw$ [| tstats `summariesonly` count where index=* $ds_input_tokens:result.system_raw$ by host | sort 10 - count | return 10 host] by _time,host | `get_asset(host)` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.is_expected_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ | timechart useother=`useother` count by host",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "$time_token_event_count_time_host.earliest$",
          "latest": "$time_token_event_count_time_host.latest$"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_hosts_by_last_report_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Hosts By Last Report Time",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `host_eventcount` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.is_expected_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.system_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ | rename totalCount as count | eval firstTimeEpoch=firstTime | eval lastTimeEpoch=lastTime | eval lastTimeEpoch=if(lastTimeEpoch<=firstTimeEpoch,firstTimeEpoch+1,lastTimeEpoch) | `uitime(firstTime)` | `uitime(lastTime)` | table host is_expected firstTime* lastTime* count dayDiff",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "$time_token_host_last_report_time.earliest$",
          "latest": "$time_token_host_last_report_time.latest$"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_splunkd_process_utilization": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Splunkd Process Utilization",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` avg(Processes.cpu_load_percent) as avg_cpu_load,avg(Processes.mem_used) as avg_mem_used from datamodel=Endpoint.Processes where Processes.process=*splunkd* $ds_input_tokens:result.is_expected_processes_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.system_processes_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_processes_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_processes_dm$ by Processes.dest | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Processes\")` | eval \"avg_cpu_load (%)\"=floor(avg_cpu_load) | eval \"avg_mem_used (MB)\"=floor(avg_mem_used/1048576) | fields - avg_cpu_load,avg_mem_used | sort 100 - \"avg_cpu_load (%)\"",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "$time_token_proc_util.earliest$",
          "latest": "$time_token_proc_util.latest$"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_splunk_service_start_mode": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Splunk Service Start Mode",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` latest(Services.start_mode) as start_mode,latest(Services.status) as status from datamodel=Endpoint.Services where (Services.service=splunkd OR Services.service=splunk) $ds_input_tokens:result.is_expected_services_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.system_services_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_services_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_services_dm$ by Services.dest | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Services\")` | sort 100 + start_mode",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "$time_token_service_start.earliest$",
          "latest": "$time_token_service_start.latest$"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval bunit_raw=if($bunit|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(host_bunit=\\\"$bunit$\\\" OR host_owner_bunit=\\\"$bunit$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_processes_dm=if($bunit|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Processes.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_services_dm=if($bunit|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Services.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit$\\\")\")\n| eval category_raw=if($category|s$==\"*\" OR $category|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(host_category=\\\"$category$\\\" OR host_owner_category=\\\"$category$\\\")\")\n| eval category_services_dm=if($category|s$==\"*\" OR $category|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Services.dest_category=\\\"$category$\\\")\")\n| eval category_processes_dm=if($category|s$==\"*\" OR $category|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Processes.dest_category=\\\"$category$\\\")\")\n| eval is_expected_raw=if($is_expected|s$==\"*\" OR $is_expected|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(host_is_expected=\\\"$is_expected$\\\")\")\n| eval is_expected_processes_dm=if($is_expected|s$==\"*\" OR $is_expected|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Processes.dest_is_expected=\\\"$is_expected$\\\")\")\n| eval is_expected_services_dm=if($is_expected|s$==\"*\" OR $is_expected|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Services.dest_is_expected=\\\"$is_expected$\\\")\")\n| eval system_raw=if($system|s$==\"*\" OR $system|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(host=\\\"$system$\\\")\")\n| eval system_processes_dm=if($system|s$==\"*\" OR $system|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Processes.dest=\\\"$system$\\\")\")\n| eval system_services_dm=if($system|s$==\"*\" OR $system|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Services.dest=\\\"$system$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "tokens": {
      "default": {
        "time_token_event_count_time_host.earliest": {
          "value": "-24h@h"
        },
        "time_token_event_count_time_host.latest": {
          "value": "now"
        },
        "time_token_host_last_report_time.earliest": {
          "value": "-30d@d"
        },
        "time_token_host_last_report_time.latest": {
          "value": "now"
        },
        "time_token_proc_util.earliest": {
          "value": "-24h@h"
        },
        "time_token_proc_util.latest": {
          "value": "now"
        },
        "time_token_service_start.earliest": {
          "value": "-24h@h"
        },
        "time_token_service_start.latest": {
          "value": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {

result.label: Forwarders: Deployment
result.title: forwarder_deployment
result.eai:data:
Show instances forwarding internal logs
| inputlookup dmc_forwarder_assets | makemv delim=" " avg_tcp_kbps_sparkline | eval sum_kb = if (status == "missing", "N/A", sum_kb) | eval avg_tcp_kbps_sparkline = if (status == "missing", "N/A", avg_tcp_kbps_sparkline) | eval avg_tcp_kbps = if (status == "missing", "N/A", avg_tcp_kbps) | eval avg_tcp_eps = if (status == "missing", "N/A", avg_tcp_eps) | `dmc_rename_forwarder_type(forwarder_type)` | `dmc_time_format(last_connected)` | search NOT [| inputlookup dmc_assets | dedup serverName | rename serverName as hostname | fields hostname] | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/nobody/splunk_monitoring_console/saved/searches/DMC%20Forwarder%20-%20Build%20Asset%20Table/history | eval endtime = strptime(updated, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | sort 1 -endtime | fields updated | rename updated AS last_run_time | eval last_run_time = if(isnotnull(last_run_time), " - As of ".replace(last_run_time, "T", " "), " ") $result.last_run_time$

Forwarder Monitoring is disabled. Go to the setup page to enable it.

 Forwarders by $forwarderCountSplitByLabel$ false status Status Forwarder Type Splunk Version OS Architecture $label$

Note: A forwarder is "missing" if it does not connect to indexers for 15 minutes. Forwarder status takes 30 minutes minimum to reflect a monitoring data collection interval of 15 minutes, and higher intervals can take longer.

Total: $forwarder_count_including_internal_logs$ stats dc(guid) as "count" by $forwarderCountSplitBy$ stats dc(guid) as count $result.count$ Total: $true_forwarder_count$ stats dc(guid) as "count" by $forwarderCountSplitBy$ stats dc(guid) as count $result.count$ Status and Configuration $last_run_time$ * search hostname="* *" * false All active missing search status=" " Total: $forwarder_count_including_internal_logs$ | fields hostname, forwarder_type, version, os, arch, status, last_connected, sum_kb, avg_tcp_kbps_sparkline, avg_tcp_kbps, avg_tcp_eps | $forwarderNameFilter$ | $forwarderStatusFilter$ | rename hostname as Instance, forwarder_type as Type, version as Version, os as OS, arch as Architecture, status as Status, last_connected as "Last Connected to Indexers", sum_kb as "Total KB", avg_tcp_kbps_sparkline as "Average KB/s Over Time", avg_tcp_kbps as "Average KB/s", avg_tcp_eps as "Average Events/s" $job.resultCount$ forwarder_instance?form.hostname=$row.Instance$
Total: $true_forwarder_count$ search NOT [| inputlookup dmc_assets | dedup serverName | rename serverName as hostname | fields hostname] | fields hostname, forwarder_type, version, os, arch, status, last_connected, sum_kb, avg_tcp_kbps_sparkline, avg_tcp_kbps, avg_tcp_eps | $forwarderNameFilter$ | $forwarderStatusFilter$ | rename hostname as Instance, forwarder_type as Type, version as Version, os as OS, arch as Architecture, status as Status, last_connected as "Last Connected to Indexers", sum_kb as "Total KB", avg_tcp_kbps_sparkline as "Average KB/s Over Time", avg_tcp_kbps as "Average KB/s", avg_tcp_eps as "Average Events/s" $job.resultCount$ forwarder_instance?form.hostname=$row.Instance$

Click on a forwarder to see more details.

 Historical Charts -60m@m now Total Count of Forwarders and Receivers `dmc_get_forwarder_tcpin` | eval forwarder = guid | eval receiver = host.":".destPort | stats dc(forwarder) as count_forwarder, dc(receiver) as count_receiver $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ `dmc_get_forwarder_tcpin` | eval forwarder = guid | eval receiver = host.":".destPort | search NOT [| inputlookup dmc_assets | dedup serverName | rename serverName as hostname | fields hostname] | stats dc(forwarder) as count_forwarder, dc(receiver) as count_receiver $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ fields count_forwarder fields count_forwarder fields count_receiver

Note: "Forwarder" is the GUID. "Receiver" is "serverName:port" combination.

 Forwarder Connection Count Over Time false kb KB/s Events/s KB/s Events/s `dmc_get_forwarder_tcpin` | eval connection = hostname.":".sourcePort."->".host.":".destPort | eval event_count = tcp_eps * 30 | `dmc_timechart_for_metrics_log` dc(connection) as connection_count, per_second($funcForwarderCountOverlay$) as $funcForwarderCountOverlay$ | rename connection_count as "Connections", $funcForwarderCountOverlay$ as $forwarderCountOverlayLabel$ $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

Note: "Forwarder connection count" is the total number of connections between forwarders and receivers. For example, if a forwarder connects to three receivers, its count is three.

 Status and Configuration `dmc_get_forwarder_tcpin` hostname=$hostname$ | eval source_uri = hostname.":".sourcePort | eval dest_uri = host.":".destPort | eval connection = source_uri."->".dest_uri | stats values(fwdType) as fwdType, values(sourceIp) as sourceIp, latest(version) as version, values(os) as os, values(arch) as arch, dc(dest_uri) as dest_count, dc(connection) as connection_count, avg(tcp_KBps) as avg_tcp_kbps, avg(tcp_eps) as avg_tcp_eps by hostname, guid | eval avg_tcp_kbps = round(avg_tcp_kbps, 2) | eval avg_tcp_eps = round(avg_tcp_eps, 2) | `dmc_rename_forwarder_type(fwdType)` | rename hostname as Instance, fwdType as "Forwarder Type", sourceIp as IP, version as "Splunk Version", os as OS, arch as Architecture, guid as GUID, dest_count as "Receiver Count", connection_count as "Connection Count", avg_tcp_kbps as "Average KB/s", avg_tcp_eps as "Average Events/s" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ $row.Instance$

Click on a forwarder to see a list of connected receivers.

Note: Multiple forwarders installed on one host appear with identical host names, but different GUIDs.

 List of Instances $forwarderStatusDrilldown$ Connects to `dmc_get_forwarder_tcpin` hostname=$hostname$ | eval dest_uri = host.": ".destPort | stats count by dest_uri | fields dest_uri | rename dest_uri as "Receivers" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$
Close this panel Outgoing Data Rate false avg Average Maximum `dmc_get_forwarder_tcpin` hostname=$hostname$ | `dmc_timechart_for_metrics_log` $funcVolume$(eval(tcp_KBps)) as "KB/s", $funcVolume$(tcp_eps) as "Events/s" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.dest_port.value",
              "key": "row.dest_port.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.transport.value",
              "key": "row.transport.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/traffic_search?form.dest_form=$payload:row.dest.value|u$&form.dest_port=$payload:row.dest_port.value|u$&form.transport=$payload:row.transport.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "count": 10
      },
      "title": "Long Lived Connections"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_cim_malware_actions": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Cim Transport Protocols",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_transport_protocols`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_connections_by_protocol": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Connections By Protocol",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where `cim_filter_unknown_values(All_Traffic.app)` by all_traffic.app"
      }
    },
    "ds_usage_by_protocol": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Usage By Protocol",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` sum(All_Traffic.bytes) from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where `cim_filter_unknown_values(All_Traffic.app)` All_Traffic.bytes>0 by all_traffic.app"
      }
    },
    "ds_top_connection_sources": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Connection Sources",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic by All_Traffic.src | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Traffic\")` | sort 10 -count"
      }
    },
    "ds_usage_for_well_known_ports": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Usage For Well Known Ports",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` sum(All_Traffic.bytes) as bytes from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where All_Traffic.dest_port<1024 All_Traffic.bytes>0 $ds_input_tokens:result.transport_dm$ by _time,All_Traffic.dest_port | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Traffic\")` | stats sparkline(sum(bytes)) as sparkline,sum(bytes) as bytes by dest_port | sort - bytes"
      }
    },
    "ds_long_lived_connections": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Long Lived Connections",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` values(All_Traffic.src) as src,values(All_Traffic.src_port) as src_port  from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where All_Traffic.duration > 180 by All_Traffic.dest,All_Traffic.dest_port,All_Traffic.transport,All_Traffic.duration | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Traffic\")` | sort - duration"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval transport_form=if($transport_form|s$==\"*\" OR $transport_form|s$==\"\", \"\", \"$transport_form$\")\n| eval transport_dm=if($transport_form|s$==\"*\" OR $transport_form|s$==\"\", \"All_Traffic.transport=\\\"*\\\"\", \"All_Traffic.transport=\\\"$transport_form$\\\"\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "tokens": {
      "default": {
        "transport_form": {
          "value": "*"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_transport_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Transport Protocol",
      "options": {
        "token": "transport_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.transport",
        "label": "primary.transport"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_cim_malware_actions"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_keyIndicators",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 150
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_connections_by_protocol",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,

    },{

      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 400,

        "h": 250
      }

      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 800,

        "w": 400,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_usage_for_well_known_ports_markdown",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 400,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 40
      }
    },{
      "item": "input_transport_form",
      "type": "input",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,

        "h": 83
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_usage_for_well_known_ports",

result.label: Home
result.title: home
result.eai:data: Welcome to Splunk Security Essentials! Below you will find the primary areas where Splunk users get value from this app. Within each, you will see a guide showing you where to go, and what (if anything) you need to configure. The goal of this free app is to help you be more successful more quickly with Splunk for Security. If you run into any issues, check out the docs site or ask for help on Splunk Answers. Happy Splunking!

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {

          {
            "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
            "options": {
              "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Web\".\"Web\" | search category=\"$payload:row.category.value$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest$&latest=$global_time.latest$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",

          "x": "> primary | seriesByIndex(1)",

        },
        "title": "Category Distribution"
    },
    "viz_category_details_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### Category Details"
      }
    },
    "viz_category_details": {
      "type": "custom.perPanelFilter",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_category_details"
      },
      "options": {
        "selectedRows": "$PPF:selected_rows$"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.category.value",
              "key": "row.category.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Web\".\"Web\" | search category=\"$payload:row.category.value$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest$&latest=$global_time.latest$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "title": "Category Details"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_category_distribution": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Category Distribution",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` dc(Web.src) as dc(src),count from datamodel=Web.Web by Web.category | eval category='Web.category' | tags outputfield=tag category | search $ds_input_tokens:result.is_unknown_raw$ | `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_http_category\",\"category\")` | fields category,count,dc(src)"
      }
    },
    "ds_category_details": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Category Details",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as lastTime,dc(Web.src) as dc(src),dc(Web.dest) as dc(dest),count from datamodel=Web.Web by Web.category | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")` | join type=outer category [| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Web.Web where earliest=`http_category_sparkline_earliest` latest=+0s by _time,Web.category span=`http_category_sparkline_span` | stats sparkline(sum(count),`http_category_sparkline_span`) as sparkline by Web.category | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")`] | tags outputfield=tag category | search $ds_input_tokens:result.is_unknown_raw$ | `makemv(sparkline,\",\")` | eventstats avg(count) as mean_count,stdev(count) as stdev | `get_stdev_index(count)` | `round(Z)` | `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_http_category\",\"category\")` | rename ppf_cell as \"Per-panel Filter\" | sort -ppf_filter,+count | `uitime(lastTime)` | table \"Per-panel Filter\",category,sparkline,dc(src),dc(dest),count,Z,lastTime"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval is_unknown_raw=if($is_unknown|s$==\"\" OR $is_unknown|s$==\"False\", \" \", \"tag=unknown\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "tokens": {
      "PPF": {
        "selected_rows": {
          "value": "{}"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_is_unknown": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Show only unknown categories",
      "options": {
        "token": "is_unknown",
        "defaultValue": "False",
        "items": [{
          "value": "False",

        },{

        }]
      }

`dmc_set_index_introspection` component="HttpEventCollector" search_group=$role$ search_group="$group$" data.series="$data_series$" $token_clause$ | timechart minspan=1m sum(data.num_of_events) as events_total, sum(data.num_of_requests) as requests_total, sum(data.num_of_parser_errors) as parser_error_total, sum(data.num_of_requests_to_disabled_token) as requests_to_disabled_token_total, sum(data.num_of_auth_failures) as auth_failures_total, sum(data.num_of_requests_to_incorrect_url) as requests_to_incorrect_url_total, sum(data.total_bytes_indexed) as data_indexed, sum(data.total_bytes_received) as data_received | eval data_received=data_received/pow(1024, 2) | eval data_indexed=data_indexed/pow(1024, 2) | eval valid_requests_total = requests_total $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ `dmc_set_index_introspection` component="HttpEventCollector" search_group=$role$ search_group="$group$" data.series="$data_series$" $token_clause$ | bin _time minspan=1m | stats sum(data.num_of_events) as events_total, sum(data.num_of_requests) as requests_total, sum(data.num_of_requests_to_disabled_token) as disabled_token_total, sum(data.num_of_requests_to_incorrect_url) as incorrect_url_total, sum(data.num_of_auth_failures) as auth_fail_total, sum(data.num_of_parser_errors) as parser_error_total, sum(data.total_bytes_indexed) as data_indexed, sum(data.total_bytes_received) as data_received by _time | eval incorrect_url_total=if(isnull(incorrect_url_total), 0, incorrect_url_total) | eval auth_fail_total=if(isnull(auth_fail_total), 0, auth_fail_total) | eval data_indexed=data_indexed/pow(1024, 2) | eval data_received=data_received/pow(1024, 2) | eval valid_requests_total = requests_total | eval invalid_requests_total = disabled_token_total + incorrect_url_total + auth_fail_total rt-30m rt `dmc_set_index_introspection` component="HttpEventCollector" search_group=$role$ search_group="$group$" data.series="$data_series$" $token_clause$ | bin _time minspan=1m | stats sum(data.num_of_events) as events_total, sum(data.num_of_requests) as requests_total, sum(data.num_of_requests_to_disabled_token) as disabled_token_total, sum(data.num_of_requests_to_incorrect_url) as incorrect_url_total, sum(data.num_of_auth_failures) as auth_fail_total, auth_fail_total=if(isnull(auth_fail_total), 0, auth_fail_total) | eval data_indexed=data_indexed/pow(1024, 2) | eval data_received=data_received/pow(1024, 2) | eval valid_requests_total = requests_total | eval invalid_requests_total = disabled_token_total + incorrect_url_total + auth_fail_total | stats sum(events_total) as events_total, sum(valid_requests_total) as valid_requests_total, sum(invalid_requests_total) as invalid_requests_total, sum(data_received) as data_received, sum(data_indexed) as data_indexed | appendcols [search `dmc_set_index_introspection` component="HttpEventCollector" search_group=$role$ search_group="$group$" data.series="$data_series$" $token_clause$ | stats count as event_count] $time.earliest$ $time.latest$
All Indexer Search Head true false false | `dmc_get_groups_containing_role($role$)` | search search_group!="dmc_group_*" label search_group All * false | rest splunk_server_group=$role$ splunk_server_group="$group$" /services/data/inputs/http | eval token_name=substr('title', 8) All Tokens * token_name token_name http_event_collector true http_event_collector_token $row.token_name$ true

Snapshots Current Throughput

Requests

stats sum(events_total) as events_total by _time | stats latest(events_total) as event_latest | eval event_throughput = event_latest/60 | fields event_throughput stats sum(valid_requests_total) as valid_requests_total by _time | stats latest(valid_requests_total) as valid_request_latest | eval valid_requests_throughput=valid_request_latest/60 | fields valid_requests_throughput stats sum(invalid_requests_total) as invalid_requests_total by _time | stats latest(invalid_requests_total) as invalid_request_latest | eval invalid_requests_throughput=invalid_request_latest/60 | fields invalid_requests_throughput

Data

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_keyIndicators": {
      "type": "custom.keyIndicators",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {},
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "groupName": "http_user_agent"
      }
    },
    "viz_user_agent_distribution": {
      "type": "splunk.scatter",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_user_agent_distribution"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.http_user_agent.value",
              "key": "row.http_user_agent.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Web\".\"Web\" | search http_user_agent=\"$payload:row.http_user_agent.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "xAxisTitleText": "length",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "legendDisplay": "off",
        "x": "> primary | seriesByIndex(1)",
        "y": "> primary | seriesByIndex(2)",
        "category": "> primary | seriesByIndex(0)"
      },
      "title": "User Agent Distribution"
    },
    "viz_user_agent_details_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### User Agent Details"
      }
    },
    "viz_user_agent_details": {
      "type": "custom.perPanelFilter",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_user_agent_details"
      },
      "options": {
        "selectedRows": "$PPF:selected_rows$"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.http_user_agent.value",
              "key": "row.http_user_agent.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Web\".\"Web\" | search http_user_agent=\"$payload:row.http_user_agent.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "title": "User Agent Details"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_Z_form": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Standard Deviation Index",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `standard_deviations`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_user_agent_distribution": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "User Agent Distribution",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` latest(Web.http_user_agent_length) as length,count from datamodel=Web.Web where Web.http_user_agent!=unknown $ds_input_tokens:result.Z_raw$ by Web.http_user_agent | eval http_user_agent='Web.http_user_agent' | `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_http_user_agent\",\"http_user_agent\")` | fields http_user_agent,length,count"
      }
    },
    "ds_user_agent_details": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "User Agent Details",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as lastTime,dc(Web.src) as dc(src),dc(Web.dest) as dc(dest),latest(Web.http_user_agent_length) as length,count from datamodel=Web.Web where Web.http_user_agent!=unknown $ds_input_tokens:result.Z_raw$ by Web.http_user_agent | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")` | join type=outer http_user_agent [| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Web.Web where earliest=`http_user_agent_sparkline_earliest` latest=+0s Web.http_user_agent!=unknown $ds_input_tokens:result.Z_raw$ by _time,Web.http_user_agent span=`http_user_agent_sparkline_span` | stats sparkline(sum(count),`http_user_agent_sparkline_span`) as sparkline by Web.http_user_agent | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")`] | `makemv(sparkline,\",\")` | appendcols[| inputlookup append=T start=0 max=1 user_agent_length_tracker | fields mean_length,stdev] | filldown mean_length,stdev | `get_stdev_index(length)` | `round(Z)` | `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_http_user_agent\",\"http_user_agent\")` | rename ppf_cell as \"Per-panel Filter\" | sort - ppf_filter,Z | `uitime(lastTime)` | table \"Per-panel Filter\",http_user_agent,sparkline,length,dc(src),dc(dest),count,Z,lastTime"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval Z_raw=if($Z_form|s$==\"*\" OR $Z_form|s$==\"\", \"Web.http_user_agent_length>0\", \"[| inputlookup append=T user_agent_length_tracker | search Z=$Z_form$ | fields search]\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "tokens": {
      "PPF": {
        "selected_rows": {
          "value": "{}"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_Z_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Standard Deviation Index",
      "options": {
        "token": "Z_form",
        "defaultValue": "2",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },

        "value": "primary.stdev",
        "label": "primary.stdev_label"
      },
      "dataSources": {

      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {

        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      }
    },
    "input_ppf_button": {
      "type": "input.perPanelFilterButton",
      "options": {
        "selectedRows": "$PPF:selected_rows$",
        "ppfOptions": {
          "namespace": "DA-ESS-NetworkProtection",

          "fields": [ "http_user_agent" ],
          "lookupEditLink": "ess_lookups_edit?namespace=DA-ESS-NetworkProtection&file=ppf_http_user_agent.csv"
        },
        "searchManagersToReload": [
          "viz_user_agent_distribution",
          "viz_user_agent_details"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",

}]]></definition>

      },

          }

          }

      "type": "splunk.table",

      },

      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {

            "data": "> table | seriesByName(\"_time\") | formatByType(timeConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss A"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "IAM Error Activity"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_regions": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Regions",
      "options": {
        "query": "| inputlookup aws_regions",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_account_id": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Account Id",
      "options": {
        "query": "| inputlookup aws_all_account_ids | search account_id!=\"ANONYMOUS_PRINCIPAL\"",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_actions": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Actions",
      "options": {
        "query": "| inputlookup actions | search cloud_service_provider=\"aws\" change_type=\"AAA\"",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval region=\"$region$\"\n| eval list=split(region,\",\")\n| eval filterlist=mvfilter(!list IN (\"*\"))\n| eval regions_fields_dm=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"vendor_region=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval regions_fields_tstats=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"All_Changes.vendor_region=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval regions_fields=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"region=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval regions_DM=case(region==\"*\",\"(vendor_region=\\\"*\\\")\", true(), regions_fields_dm)\n| eval regions_TSTATS=case(region==\"*\",\"(All_Changes.vendor_region=\\\"*\\\")\", true(), regions_fields_tstats)\n| eval status_DM=\"(status=\\\"$status$\\\")\"\n| eval status_TSTATS=\"(All_Changes.status=\\\"$status$\\\")\"\n| eval accountID=\"$account_id$\"\n| eval list=split(accountID,\",\")\n| eval filterlist=mvfilter(!list IN (\"*\"))\n| eval accountID_fields_dm=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"vendor_account=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval accountID_fields_tstats=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"All_Changes.vendor_account=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval accountID_fields=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"accountID=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval accountID_DM=case(accountID==\"*\",\"(vendor_account=\\\"*\\\")\", true(), accountID_fields_dm)\n| eval accountID_TSTATS=case(accountID==\"*\",\"(All_Changes.vendor_account=\\\"*\\\")\", true(), accountID_fields_tstats)\n| eval command=\"$command$\"\n| eval list=split(command,\",\")\n| eval filterlist=mvfilter(!list IN (\"*\"))\n| eval command_fields_dm=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"command=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval command_fields_tstats=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"All_Changes.command=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval command_fields=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"command=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval command_DM=case(command==\"*\",\"(command=\\\"*\\\")\", true(), command_fields_dm)\n| eval command_TSTATS=case(command==\"*\",\"(All_Changes.command=\\\"*\\\")\", true(), command_fields_tstats)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_error_events": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Error Events",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "| datamodel `summariesonly` Change Account_Management search | search All_Changes.change_type=AAA | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_DM$ status=failure | search $ds_input_tokens:result.command_DM$ command!=Get* command!=Describe* command!=List* | head 100 | stats count"
        },
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Change.All_Changes WHERE nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management All_Changes.change_type=AAA $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.command_TSTATS$ All_Changes.command!=Get* All_Changes.command!=Describe* All_Changes.command!=List* All_Changes.status=failure | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_activity_by_user": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Activity by user",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "| datamodel `summariesonly` Change Account_Management search | search All_Changes.change_type=AAA | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_DM$ | search $ds_input_tokens:result.command_DM$ command!=Get* command!=Describe* command!=List* | head 100 | stats count by user, user_name | sort 100 - count"
        },
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Change.All_Changes WHERE nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management All_Changes.change_type=AAA $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.command_TSTATS$ All_Changes.command!=Get* All_Changes.command!=Describe* All_Changes.command!=List* by All_Changes.user, All_Changes.user_name | sort 100 - count | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_iam_actions": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "IAM actions",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "| datamodel `summariesonly` Change Account_Management search | search All_Changes.change_type=AAA | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_DM$ | search $ds_input_tokens:result.command_DM$ command!=Get* command!=Describe* command!=List* | head 100 | stats count by command | sort 100 - count"
        },
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Change.All_Changes WHERE nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management All_Changes.change_type=AAA $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.command_TSTATS$ All_Changes.command!=Get* All_Changes.command!=Describe* All_Changes.command!=List* by All_Changes.command | sort 100 - count | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_iam_actions_over_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "IAM actions over time",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "| datamodel `summariesonly` Change Account_Management search | search All_Changes.change_type=AAA | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_DM$ | search $ds_input_tokens:result.command_DM$ command!=Get* command!=Describe* command!=List* | head 100 | timechart limit=20 count BY command"
        },
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` prestats=t count FROM datamodel=Change.All_Changes WHERE nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management All_Changes.change_type=AAA $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.command_TSTATS$ All_Changes.command!=Get* All_Changes.command!=Describe* All_Changes.command!=List* by _time, All_Changes.command | timechart limit=20 count BY All_Changes.command | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_success_vs_failure_activity": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Success vs failure activity",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "| datamodel `summariesonly` Change Account_Management search | search All_Changes.change_type=AAA | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_DM$ status!=unknown | search $ds_input_tokens:result.command_DM$ command!=Get* command!=Describe* command!=List* | head 100 | stats count by status, command | eval success=if(status=\"success\",count,0), failure=if(status=\"failure\",count,0) | stats sum(success) as Success, sum(failure) as Failure by command | sort - Failure"
        },
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Change.All_Changes WHERE nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management All_Changes.change_type=AAA $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_TSTATS$ All_Changes.status!=unknown $ds_input_tokens:result.command_TSTATS$ All_Changes.command!=Get* All_Changes.command!=Describe* All_Changes.command!=List* by All_Changes.status, All_Changes.command | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | eval success=if(status=\"success\",count,0), failure=if(status=\"failure\",count,0) | stats sum(success) as Success, sum(failure) as Failure by command | sort - Failure"
      }
    },
    "ds_most_recent_iam_activity": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Most recent IAM activity",
      "options": {
        "query": "| datamodel `summariesonly` Change Account_Management search | search All_Changes.change_type=AAA | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_DM$ | search $ds_input_tokens:result.command_DM$ command!=Get* command!=Describe* command!=List* | head 100 | rename Account_Management.src_user as src_user, Account_Management.src_user_name as src_user_name | table command, src_user, src_user_name, src, user, user_name, vendor_account, vendor_region, _time"
      }
    },
    "ds_iam_activity_error": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "IAM Error Activity",
      "options": {
        "query": "| datamodel `summariesonly` Change Account_Management search | search All_Changes.change_type=AAA | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_DM$ status=failure | search $ds_input_tokens:result.command_DM$ command!=Get* command!=Describe* command!=List* | head 100 | rename Account_Management.src_user as src_user, Account_Management.src_user_name as src_user_name | table command, src_user, src_user_name, src, user, user_name, result_id, result, vendor_account, vendor_region, _time"
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {

            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_identities_by_priority": {

    "viz_identity_information": {

  "dataSources": {
    "ds_urgency": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Urgency",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `urgency` | dedup priority",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_identity_categories": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Identity Categories",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `identity_categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_identities_by_priority": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Identities By Priority",
      "options": {
        "query": "| inputlookup identity_lookup_expanded where * $ds_input_tokens:result.username_raw$ | fillnull value=\"\" priority, bunit, category, watchlist | eval category_=mvjoin(category, \" \") | stats values(category) as category, count by priority, bunit, category_, watchlist | search $ds_input_tokens:result.priority_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.watchlist_raw$ | stats sum(count) as count by priority | where priority!=\"\" | `stats2chart(priority)`"
      }
    },
    "ds_identities_by_business_unit": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Identities By Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "query": "| inputlookup identity_lookup_expanded where * $ds_input_tokens:result.username_raw$ | fillnull value=\"\" priority, bunit, category, watchlist | eval category_=mvjoin(category, \" \") | stats values(category) as category, count by priority, bunit, category_, watchlist | search $ds_input_tokens:result.priority_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.watchlist_raw$ | stats sum(count) as count by bunit | where bunit!=\"\""
      }
    },
    "ds_identities_by_category": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Identities By Category",
      "options": {
        "query": "| inputlookup identity_lookup_expanded where * $ds_input_tokens:result.username_raw$ | fillnull value=\"\" priority, bunit, category, watchlist | eval category_=mvjoin(category, \" \") | stats values(category) as category, count by priority, bunit, category_, watchlist | search $ds_input_tokens:result.priority_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.watchlist_raw$ | stats sum(count) as count by category | where category!=\"\""
      }
    },
    "ds_identity_information": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Identity Information",
      "options": {
        "query": "| inputlookup identity_lookup_expanded where * $ds_input_tokens:result.username_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.priority_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.watchlist_raw$ [makeresults | eval maxrow=if(trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.username$\",\" \").trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.priority$\",\" \").trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.bunit$\",\" \").trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.category$\",\" \").trim(\"$ds_input_tokens:result.watchlist$\",\" \")==\"\", \"max=1000\", \"\") | return $maxrow ] | `uitime(startDate)` | `uitime(endDate)` | fields identity,first,last,email,phone,managedBy,priority,bunit,category,watchlist,startDate,endDate,work_city,work_country,work_lat,work_long"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval username=if($username|s$==\"*\" OR $username|s$==\"\", \" \", $username|s$)\n| eval priority=if($priority|s$==\"*\" OR $priority|s$==\"\", \" \", $priority|s$)\n| eval bunit=if($bunit|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit|s$==\"\", \" \", $bunit|s$)\n| eval category=if($category|s$==\"*\" OR $category|s$==\"\", \" \", $category|s$)\n| eval watchlist=if($watchlist|s$==\"*\" OR $watchlist|s$==\"\", \" \", $watchlist|s$)\n| eval lowercase_username=\"identity=\\\"\".lower(username).\"\\\"\"\n| eval username_raw=if(username==\" \", \" \", lowercase_username)\n| eval priority_raw=if(priority==\" \", \" \", \"priority=\\\"$priority$\\\"\")\n| eval lowercase_bunit=\"bunit=\\\"\".lower(bunit).\"\\\"\"\n| eval bunit_raw=if(bunit==\" \", \" \", lowercase_bunit)\n| eval category_raw=if(category==\" \", \" \", \"category=\\\"$category$\\\"\")\n| eval watchlist_raw=if(watchlist==\" \", \" \", \"watchlist=\\\"$watchlist$\\\"\")\n",
        "enableSmartSources": true
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "now",
            "earliest": "0"
          }
        }
      }
    }

      },

    "input_watchlist": {

        },{

        },{

          "label": "False"
        }]
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
