result.label: KV Store: Deployment
result.title: kv_store_deployment
result.eai:data:
false | `dmc_get_groups_containing_role(dmc_group_kv_store)` | where search_group!="dmc_group_kv_store" label search_group All KV Stores *
Warning and Error Patterns -24h now `dmc_get_warnings_and_errors(dmc_group_kv_store, KVStore*)` search_group="$group$" | cluster showcount=t | table cluster_count, _time, log_level, component, event_message, punct | sort - cluster_count | `dmc_time_format(_time)` | rename cluster_count AS Count, _time AS "Latest Time", log_level as "Log Level", component as Component, event_message as "Latest Message" $warningErrorTime.earliest$ $warningErrorTime.latest$ Count, "Latest Time", "Log Level", Component, "Latest Message" $row.punct$

Click on a row to see event details.

 Event Details `dmc_get_warnings_and_errors(dmc_group_kv_store, KVStore*)` punct="$warningErrorPunct$" search_group="$group$" $warningErrorTime.earliest$ $warningErrorTime.latest$ Close this panel

Select views: All Snapshot Historical

Snapshots KV Store Status | rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_kv_store splunk_server_group="$group$" /services/server/introspection/kvstore/serverstatus | eval Instance=splunk_server | spath input=data | spath input=data path=mem.resident output=physMem | spath input=data path=mem.virtual output=virtMem | spath input=data path="wiredTiger.capacity.background fsync time (msecs)" output=flush | spath input=data path=globalLock output=globalLock | spath input=data path=globalLock.totalTime output=total | spath input=data path=extra_info.page_faults output=page_faults | spath input=data path=opcounters.command output=c | spath input=data path=opcounters.update output=u | spath input=data path=opcounters.query output=q | spath input=data path=opcounters.delete output=d | spath input=data path=opcounters.getmore output=g | spath input=data path=opcounters.insert output=i | eval lock = round(abs((('globalLock.activeClients.total'+'globalLock.currentQueue.total')/total)*100), 2) | eval network=round(abs(('network.bytesIn'+'network.bytesOut')/1024/1024), 2) | eval totalops=if(isNotNull('c'), 'c',0)+if(isNotNull('u'), 'u', 0)+if(isNotNull('q'), 'q', 0)+if(isNotNull('d'), 'd', 0)+if(isNotNull('g'), 'g', 0)+if(isNotNull('i'), 'i', 0) | eval pf=round(abs(page_faults/totalops), 2) | eval hours=toString(round(uptime/3600, 2)) | rename repl.ismaster as rstate | rename repl.secondary as secondary | eval replstate=if(rstate=="true", "Primary", if(secondary=="true", "Secondary", "N/A")) | stats first(physMem) AS "Physical Memory Usage (MB)" first(virtMem) AS "Virtual Memory Usage (MB)" first(pf) AS "Page Faults per Operation" first(globalLock.currentQueue.total) AS "Total Queued" first(connections.current) AS "Active Connections" first(lock) AS "Lock (%)" first(flush) AS "Last Flush (ms)" first(network) AS "Network Traffic (MB)" first(hours) AS "Uptime (hours)" first(replstate) AS "Replication Role" by Instance $time.earliest$$time.latest$

Click instance name for more details. Total queued is operations (readers and writers) waiting for a read or write lock to be cleared.

 Historical Charts -4h@m now Instances by $countPageFaultsFuncLabel$ Page Faults per Operation false Median Average Median Minimum Maximum 90th Percentile Sampled $label$
`dmc_set_index_introspection` search_group=dmc_group_kv_store search_group="$group$" component=kvstoreserverstats | eval server = host | rename data.opcounters.command as c, data.opcounters.update as u, data.opcounters.queries as q, data.opcountes.deletes as d, data.opcounters.getmore as g, data.opcounters.inserts as i | eval commands=if(isNotNull('c'), 'c',0) | eval totalops=if(isNotNull('c'), 'c',0)+if(isNotNull('u'), 'u', 0)+if(isNotNull('q'), 'q', 0)+if(isNotNull('d'), 'd', 0)+if(isNotNull('g'), 'g', 0)+if(isNotNull('i'), 'i', 0) | bin _time minspan=30s | stats latest(totalops) AS ops latest(data.extra_info.page_faults) AS pf by server _time | eval percent=if(ops==0, 0, round(abs(pf/ops), 2)) | bin _time minspan=30s | stats $countPageFaultsFunc$(percent) as percent by server _time | rangemap field=percent "0-0.7"=0-0.7 "0.7-1.3"=0.7001-1.3 "1.3+"=1.3001-999999 default=abnormal | timechart minspan=30s partial=f dc(server) as server_count by range | fields _time, "1.3+", "0.7-1.3", "0-0.7" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ true $row._span$ $row.earliest$ $row.earliest_label$ $row.latest$ $row.latest_label$ $row.drilldown_indexing_rate_metric$ $row.numInstances$ (30 * 86400) | rename pool_id AS pool | eval warning_day=if(category=="pool_over_quota","(".strftime(create_time,"%B %e, %Y").")",strftime(create_time-43200,"%B %e, %Y")) | fields pool warning_day | join outer pool [rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ /services/licenser/slaves | mvexpand active_pool_ids | eval slave_name=label | eval pool=active_pool_ids | fields pool slave_name | stats values(slave_name) as "members" by pool] | join outer pool [rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ /services/licenser/pools | eval pool=title | eval quota=if(isnull(effective_quota),quota,effective_quota) | eval quotaGB=round(quota/1024/1024/1024,3) | fields pool stack_id, quotaGB] | stats first(pool) as "Pool" first(stack_id) as "Stack ID" first(members) as "Current Members" first(quotaGB) as "Curent Quota (GB)" values(warning_day) AS "Warning Days - (Soft)/Hard" by pool | fields - pool
Slave Usage Warnings | rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ /services/licenser/slaves | mvexpand active_pool_ids | where warning_count>0 | eval pool=active_pool_ids | join type=outer pool [rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ /services/licenser/pools | eval pool=title | fields pool stack_id] | eval in_violation=if(warning_count>4 OR (warning_count>2 AND stack_id=="free"),"yes","no") | fields label, title, pool, warning_count, in_violation | fields - _timediff | rename label as "Slave" title as "GUID" pool as "Pool" warning_count as "Hard Warnings" in_violation AS "In Violation?"

result.label: New Lookup (Old)
result.title: lookup_new
result.eai:data:
CSV Lookup

A lookup based upon a comma-separated file that can be edited or imported from Excel

Use a CSV lookup if:

  • Want to import from Excel or an existing CSV file
  • Want to maintain a revision history of user's edits to the file
  • Want to have a lookup that is specific to a user (not global)
  • Need to perform case-sensitive lookups
Create CSV Lookup...

Key-Value Store Lookup

A lookup based upon the KV store; this is useful for very large lookups that need to be edited in the user-interface

Use a key-value store lookup if:

  • You have a large lookup file
  • You are using Splunk 6.2 or later
Create KV Store Lookup...
KV store is not supported on this version of Splunk; upgrade to Splunk 6.2 or later for KV store support

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_keyIndicators": {
      "type": "custom.keyIndicators",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {},
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {

      }
    },
    "viz_malware_activity_over_time_by_action": {
      "type": "splunk.line",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_malware_activity_over_time_by_action"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "malwareCenterDrilldownHandler",
          "events": [
            "point.click",
            "legend.click"
          ],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "line"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "markerDisplay": "off",
        "xAxisTitleText": "time",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "nullValueDisplay": "zero",
        "seriesColorsByField": {
          "allowed": "0xD25B3B",
          "blocked": "0x64A43D",
          "deferred": "0x66B3FF",
          "unknown": "0x999999"
        }
      },
      "title": "Malware Activity Over Time By Action"
    },
    "viz_malware_activity_over_time_by_signature": {
      "type": "splunk.line",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_malware_activity_over_time_by_signature"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "malwareCenterDrilldownHandler",
          "events": [
            "point.click",
            "legend.click"
          ],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "line"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "markerDisplay": "off",
        "xAxisTitleText": "time",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "nullValueDisplay": "zero"
      },
      "title": "Malware Activity Over Time By Signature"
    },
    "viz_top_infections": {
      "type": "splunk.bar",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_top_infections"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.signature.value",
              "key": "row.signature.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/malware_search?form.signature=$payload:row.signature.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "xAxisTitleText": "signature",
        "yAxisTitleText": "dc(dest)",
        "legendDisplay": "off"
      },
      "title": "Top Infections"
    },
    "viz_new_malware_last_30_days": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_new_malware_last_30_days"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.signature.value",
              "key": "row.signature.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/malware_search?form.signature=$payload:row.signature.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {},
      "title": "New Malware - Last 30 Days"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_cim_malware_actions": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Cim Malware Actions",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_malware_actions`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_categories": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Categories",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_malware_activity_over_time_by_action": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Malware Activity Over Time By Action",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Malware.Malware_Attacks where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by _time,Malware_Attacks.action span=10m | timechart minspan=10m useother=`useother` count by Malware_Attacks.action | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Malware_Attacks\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_malware_activity_over_time_by_signature": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Malware Activity Over Time By Signature",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Malware.Malware_Attacks where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by _time,Malware_Attacks.signature span=10m | timechart minspan=10m useother=`useother` count by Malware_Attacks.signature | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Malware_Attacks\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_top_infections": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Infections",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` dc(Malware_Attacks.dest) as dest_count from datamodel=Malware.Malware_Attacks where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by Malware_Attacks.signature | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Malware_Attacks\")` | sort 10 - dest_count"
      }
    },
    "ds_new_malware_last_30_days": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "New Malware - Last 30 Days",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from inputlookup:malware_tracker | stats min(firstTime) as firstTime,dc(dest) by signature | eval _time=firstTime | `daysago(30)` | sort 100 - firstTime | `uitime(firstTime)` | table firstTime,signature,dc(dest)"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval action_dm=if($action|s$==\"*\" OR $action|s$==\"\", \" \", \"Malware_Attacks.action=\\\"$action$\\\"\")\n| eval bunit_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Malware_Attacks.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Malware_Attacks.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Malware_Attacks.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Malware_Attacks.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_action": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Action",
      "options": {
        "token": "action",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.action",
        "label": "primary.action"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_cim_malware_actions"
      }
    },
    "input_bunit_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "token": "bunit_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_category_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Category",
      "options": {
        "token": "category_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.category",
        "label": "primary.category"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_categories"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_keyIndicators",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 150
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_malware_activity_over_time_by_action",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 150,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_malware_activity_over_time_by_signature",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 150,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_top_infections",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 400,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 315
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_new_malware_last_30_days",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 400,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 315
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_action",
      "input_bunit_form",
      "input_category_form",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Malware Center"
}]]></definition>

            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Malware\".\"Malware_Operations\" | search product_version=\"$payload:row.product_version.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true

      ],
      "options": {

    "viz_clients_by_signature_version": {
      "type": "splunk.bar",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_clients_by_signature_version"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.signature_version.value",
              "key": "row.signature_version.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Malware\".\"Malware_Operations\" | search signature_version=\"$payload:row.signature_version.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "xAxisTitleText": "signature_version",
        "yAxisTitleText": "dc(dest)",
        "legendDisplay": "off"
      },
      "title": "Clients By Signature Version"
    },
    "viz_repeat_infections": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_repeat_infections"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.signature.value",
              "key": "row.signature.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/malware_search?form.signature=$payload:row.signature.value|u$&form.dest=$payload:row.dest.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {},
      "title": "Repeat Infections"
    },
    "viz_oldest_infections": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_oldest_infections"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.signature.value",
              "key": "row.signature.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/malware_search?form.signature=$payload:row.signature.value|u$&form.dest=$payload:row.dest.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "table": "> primary | frameBySeriesNames(\"firstTime\",\"lastTime\",\"signature\",\"dest\",\"days_active\")"
      },
      "title": "Oldest Infections"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_category_form": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Category Form",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_clients_by_product_version": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Clients By Product Version",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `malware_operations_tracker(time_product_version)` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ | stats dc(dest) by product_version | sort 10 - dc(dest)"
      }
    },
    "ds_clients_by_signature_version": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Clients By Signature Version",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `malware_operations_tracker(time_signature_version)` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ | stats dc(dest) by signature_version | sort 10 - dc(dest)"
      }
    },
    "ds_repeat_infections": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Repeat Infections",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` values(Malware_Attacks.action) as action,count from datamodel=Malware.Malware_Attacks where Malware_Attacks.action!=allowed $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by _time,Malware_Attacks.signature,Malware_Attacks.dest span=1d | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Malware_Attacks\")` | stats values(action) as action,count as day_count by signature,dest | sort 100 - day_count"
      }
    },
    "ds_oldest_infections": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Oldest Infections",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `malware_tracker(lastTime)` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ | eval days_active=floor((lastTime-firstTime)/86400 + 1) | `uitime(firstTime)` | `uitime(lastTime)` | sort 100 - days_active | fields firstTime,lastTime,signature,dest,days_active"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval category_raw=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR dest_owner_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Malware_Attacks.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Malware_Attacks.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_raw=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR dest_owner_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Malware_Attacks.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Malware_Attacks.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_bunit_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "token": "bunit_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_category_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Category",
      "options": {
        "token": "category_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.category",
        "label": "primary.category"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_category_form"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-30d@d,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_keyIndicators",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 150
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_clients_by_product_version",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 150,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_clients_by_signature_version",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 150,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_repeat_infections",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 400,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_oldest_infections",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 400,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_bunit_form",
      "input_category_form",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Malware Operations"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

result.label: malware_search_data
result.title: malware_search_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_malware_search_table": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_malware_search_table"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.signature.value",
              "key": "row.signature.value"
            },{
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Malware\".\"Malware_Attacks\" | search signature=\"$payload:row.signature.value|u$\" dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "width": 170,
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
              "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    },
    "viz_malware_search_events": {
      "type": "splunk.events",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_malware_search_events",
        "fieldsummary": "ds_malware_search_events_fieldsummary"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
      {
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [
                {
                    "token": "tag_value",
                    "key": "value"
                },
                {
                    "token": "field",
                    "key": "name"
                }
            ]
        }
      },
      {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
              "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Malware\".\"Malware_Attacks\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.signature_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.file_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_raw$ | head 100 | search \"tag::$payload:field$\"=$payload:tag_value$",
              "newTab": true,
              "events": [
                  "tag.click"
              ]
          }
      },
      {
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Malware\".\"Malware_Attacks\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.signature_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.file_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_raw$ | head 100",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "eventViewerDrilldownHandler",
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "events"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "footerFields": [
          "action",
          "dest",
          "signature",
          "user",
          "vendor_product",
          "file_name"
        ],
        "highlightValuesByField": {
          "action": "$action$",
          "dest": "$dest$",
          "signature": "$signature$",
          "user": "$user$",
          "vendor_product": "$vendor_product$"
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_actions": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Action",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_malware_actions`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_malware_search_table": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Malware search table",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,values(Malware_Attacks.action) as action,values(Malware_Attacks.file_name) as file_name,latest(Malware_Attacks.user) as user,count from datamodel=Malware.Malware_Attacks where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.signature_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.file_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_dm$ by Malware_Attacks.signature,Malware_Attacks.dest | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Malware_Attacks\")` | sort - count | fields _time,action,signature,file_name,dest,user,count"
      }
    },
    "ds_malware_search_events": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Malware search events",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from datamodel:\"Malware\".\"Malware_Attacks\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.signature_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.file_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_raw$ | head 100"
      }
    },
    "ds_malware_search_events_fieldsummary": {
      "type": "ds.chain",
      "name": "Malware search events fieldsummary",
      "options": {
        "query": "fieldsummary maxvals=10",
        "extend": "ds_malware_search_events"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval action_raw=if($action|s$==\"*\" OR $action|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(action=\\\"$action$\\\")\")\n| eval action_dm=if($action|s$==\"*\" OR $action|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Malware_Attacks.action=\\\"$action$\\\")\")\n| eval signature_raw=if($signature|s$==\"*\" OR $signature|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(signature=\\\"$signature$\\\")\")\n| eval signature_dm=if($signature|s$==\"*\" OR $signature|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Malware_Attacks.signature=\\\"$signature$\\\")\")\n| eval file_raw=if($file_form|s$==\"*\" OR $file_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(file_hash=\\\"$file_form$\\\" OR file_name=\\\"$file_form$\\\" OR file_path=\\\"$file_form$\\\")\")\n| eval file_dm=if($file_form|s$==\"*\" OR $file_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Malware_Attacks.file_hash=\\\"$file_form$\\\" OR Malware_Attacks.file_name=\\\"$file_form$\\\" OR Malware_Attacks.file_path=\\\"$file_form$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_raw=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_dm=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Malware_Attacks.dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\")\n| eval user_raw=if($user|s$==\"*\" OR $user|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(user=\\\"$user$\\\")\")\n| eval user_dm=if($user|s$==\"*\" OR $user|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Malware_Attacks.user=\\\"$user$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      },
      "ds.chain": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_action": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Action",
      "options": {
        "token": "action",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.action",
        "label": "primary.action"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_actions"
      }
    },
    "input_signature": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Signature",
      "options": {
        "token": "signature",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_file": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "File",
      "options": {
        "token": "file_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_destination": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Destination",
      "options": {
        "token": "dest",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_user": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "User",
      "options": {
        "token": "user",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-60m@m,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_malware_search_table",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 310
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_malware_search_events",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 310,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 500
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_action",
      "input_signature",
      "input_file",
      "input_destination",
      "input_user",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Malware Search"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

result.label: managed_lookups_audit_data
result.title: managed_lookups_audit_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_lookups": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_lookups"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.Name.value",
              "key": "row.Name.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=search index=audit_summary source=\"Audit - Managed Lookups Size - Summary Gen\" title=\"$payload:row.Name.value|u$\"&earliest=$event_time.earliest|u$&latest=$event_time.latest|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "count": 10,
        "columnFormat": {
          "Growth": {
            "width": 95
          },
          "Size(MB)": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName(\"Size(MB)\") | formatByType(numberPrecisionConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "numberPrecisionConfig": {
          "number": {
            "precision": 2
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Lookups"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_lookups": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Lookups",
      "options": {
        "query": "index=audit_summary source=\"Audit - Managed Lookups Size - Summary Gen\"| stats sparkline(avg(size)) AS Growth, latest(size) as Size, latest(count) as Count, latest(eai:acl.app) as App by title | eval Size(MB)=round(Size/1024/1024,2) | where $ds_input_tokens:result.size_range$ | rename title as Name | fields - Size | sort - Size(MB)",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "$event_time.earliest$",
          "latest": "$event_time.latest$"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval lookup_size=$lookup_size_form|s$\n| eval first_range=\"'Size(MB)'>=0 AND 'Size(MB)'<50\"\n| eval second_range=\"'Size(MB)'>=50 AND 'Size(MB)'<500\"\n| eval third_range=\"'Size(MB)'>=500\"\n| eval default_range=\"'Size(MB)'>=0\"\n| eval size_range=case(lookup_size==\"first_range\",first_range, lookup_size==\"second_range\", second_range, lookup_size==\"third_range\", third_range, true(), default_range)",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        },
        "enableSmartSources": true
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_lookup_size_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Size in MB",
      "options": {
        "token": "lookup_size_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{

<!-- B. Tabs with its Dashboard definition JSON -->
<tabbeddefinition value="Active Directory"><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_password_account_lockout": {
      "type": "splunk.singlevalue",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_password_account_lockout"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "majorFontSize": 70,
        "trendColor": "> trendValue | rangeValue(trendColorThresholds)",
        "trendFontSize": 32
      },
      "context": {
        "trendColorThresholds": [{
          "from": 0,
          "value": "#669922"
        },{
          "to": 0,
          "value": "#d41f1f"
        }]
      },
      "title": "Password Account Lockouts"
    },
    "viz_users_enable_vs_disable_mfa": {
      "type": "splunk.pie",
      "description": "",

        "primary": "ds_users_enable_vs_disable_mfa"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "collapseThreshold": 0.05,
        "resultLimit": 6,
        "showDonutHole": true
      },
      "title": "Users with Enable vs Disable MFA"
    },
    "viz_failed_user_logins": {
      "type": "splunk.singlevalue",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_failed_user_logins"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "majorFontSize": 70,
        "trendColor": "> trendValue | rangeValue(trendColorThresholds)",
        "trendFontSize": 32
      },
      "context": {
        "trendColorThresholds": [{
          "from": 0,
          "value": "#669922"
        },{
          "to": 0,
          "value": "#d41f1f"
        }]
      },
      "title": "Failed User Logins"
    },
    "viz_impossible_travel": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_impossible_travel"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {},
      "title": "Impossible Travel"
    },
    "viz_added_removed_members_group": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_added_removed_member_groups"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {},
      "title": "Added or Removed Members from Group"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_password_account_lockout": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Password Account Lockouts",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "`o365-index` sourcetype=\"o365:management:activity\" Workload=AzureActiveDirectory Operation=UserLoginFailed LogonError=IdsLocked | head 100"
        },
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=\"o365:management:activity\" Workload=AzureActiveDirectory Operation=UserLoginFailed LogonError=IdsLocked | timechart span=1d count by LogonError"
      }
    },
    "ds_users_enable_vs_disable_mfa": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Users with Enable vs Disable MFA",
      "options": {
        "data": {},
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=\"o365:management:activity\" Workload=AzureActiveDirectory | eval mfa=case(Operation=\"Enable Strong Authentication.\", \"MFA Enabled\", Operation=\"Disable Strong Authentication.\", \"MFA Disabled\") | stats count by mfa",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-24h@h",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_failed_user_logins": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Failed User Logins",
      "options": {
        "data": {},
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=\"o365:management:activity\" Workload=AzureActiveDirectory Operation=\"UserLoginFailed\" | timechart span=1d count by Operation"
      }
    },
    "ds_impossible_travel": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Impossible Travel",
      "options": {
        "data": {},
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=\"o365:management:activity\" Operation=UserLoggedIn\n    | rename ClientIP AS src_ip\n    | sort 0 UserId, _time\n    | streamstats window=1 current=f values(_time) as last_time values(src_ip) as last_src_ip by UserId\n    | iplocation last_src_ip\n    | eval last_location = if(isnotnull(City) AND City!=\"\", City . \", \", \"\") . if(isnotnull(Country) AND Country!=\"\", Country . \", \", \"\") . if(isnotnull(Region) AND Region!=\"\", Region, \"\")\n    | rename lat as last_lat lon as last_lon Country as last_Country\n    | iplocation src_ip\n    | eval location = if(isnotnull(City) AND City!=\"\", City . \", \", \"\") . if(isnotnull(Country) AND Country!=\"\", Country . \", \", \"\") . if(isnotnull(Region) AND Region!=\"\", Region, \"\")\n    | foreach * location\n        [| eval <<FIELD>> = replace(replace('<<FIELD>>', \"^\\s*,\\s*\", \"\"), \"\\s*,\\s*$$\", \"\")]\n    | eval rlat1 = pi()*last_lat/180, rlat2=pi()*lat/180, rlat = pi()*(lat-last_lat)/180, rlon= pi()*(lon-last_lon)/180\n    | eval a = sin(rlat/2) * sin(rlat/2) + cos(rlat1) * cos(rlat2) * sin(rlon/2) * sin(rlon/2)\n    | eval c = 2 * atan2(sqrt(a), sqrt(1-a))\n    | eval distance = 6371 * c, time_difference_hours = round((_time - last_time) / 3600,2), speed=round(distance/ ( time_difference_hours),2)\n    | fields - rlat* a c\n    | eval day=strftime(_time, \"%m/%d/%Y\")\n    | search last_Country!=Country distance!=0 speed>1000 | head 100\n    | stats values(time_difference_hours) as time_difference_hours values(speed) as speed first(last_location) as location_one first(location) as location_two values(*src_ip) as *src_ip min(_time) as firstTime by UserId distance day\n    | eval firstTime=strftime(firstTime, \"%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S\")\n    | sort - distance\n    | rename time_difference_hours AS \"Time Difference (H)\" speed AS Speed location_one AS \"Original Location\" location_two AS \"Second Location\" distance AS \"Distance (M)\" day AS Day last_src_ip AS \"Last Source IP\" src_ip AS \"Original Source IP\" firstTime AS \"First Event\"\n    | fields UserId, Day, \"Time Difference (H)\", \"Distance (M)\", Speed, \"Original Location\", \"Original Source IP\", \"Second Location\", \"Last Source IP\""
      }
    },
    "ds_added_removed_member_groups": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Added or Removed Members from Group",
      "options": {
        "data": {},
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=\"o365:management:activity\" Workload=AzureActiveDirectory(Operation=\"Remove member from group.\" OR Operation=\"Add member to group.\") | head 100 | spath path=ModifiedProperties{1}.NewValue output=gname | eval added=if(Operation=\"Add member to group.\", 1, 0) | eval removed=if(Operation=\"Remove member from group.\", 1, 0) | stats sum(added) as Added, sum(removed) as Removed by gname | rename gname AS \"Group Name\""
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {},
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {
      "showTitleAndDescription": false
    },
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_password_account_lockout",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 400,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_users_enable_vs_disable_mfa",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 400,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 400,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_failed_user_logins",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 800,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 400,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_impossible_travel",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 300
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_added_removed_members_group",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 300
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": []
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Microsoft 365 Security"
}]]></tabbeddefinition>

  "dataSources": {
    "ds_exchange_operations": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Exchange Operations",
      "options": {
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=\"o365:management:activity\" Workload=\"exchange\" | rex field=src \"(?<ip>(?:(?:\\d{1,3}\\.){3}(?:\\d{1,3}))|(?:(?:::)?(?:[\\dA-Fa-f]{1,4}:{1,2}){1,7}(?:[\\d\\%A-Fa-z\\.]+)?(?:::)?)|(?:::[\\dA-Fa-f\\.]{1,15})|(?:::))\" | iplocation ip | stats count as result by Country"
      }
    },
    "ds_mailbox_forwarding_rules": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Mailbox Forwarding Rules",
      "options": {
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=\"o365:management:activity\" Workload=\"exchange\" Operation=\"Set-Mailbox\" ForwardingSmtpAddress=\"*\" | sort 100 Identity | table Operation, Identity, ForwardingSmtpAddress"
      }
    },
    "ds_mailbox_export": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Mailbox Exports",
      "options": {
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=\"o365:management:activity\" Workload=\"exchange\" Operation=\"*ExportRequest\" | sort 100 Operation | table Operation, Mailbox, FilePath"
      }
    },
    "ds_fullaccess_permission_change": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "FullAccess Permission changes",
      "options": {
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=\"o365:management:activity\" Workload=\"exchange\" AccessRights=\"FullAccess\" | eval User = mvappend(Trustee, User) | sort 100 Operation | table Operation, Identity, User, user, AccessRights | rename Identity as Target, User as \"Granted to\", user as \"Granted by\""
      }
    },
    "ds_external_domain_forwarding_policy": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "External Domain with Forwarding Policy",
      "options": {
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=\"o365:management:activity\" Workload=\"exchange\" Operation=\"Set-Mailbox\" ForwardingSmtpAddress=\"*\" | rex field=ForwardingSmtpAddress \"^(\\S+)@(?<Domain>\\S+)\" | stats count by Domain"
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {},
  "layout": {

    },
    "structure": [{

      "type": "block",

      },

    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_activity_by_location": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Activity By Location",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "`o365-index` sourcetype=o365:management:activity (Workload=SharePoint OR Workload=OneDrive) | head 100"
        },
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=o365:management:activity (Workload=SharePoint OR Workload=OneDrive) | stats count by src |  iplocation src | stats sum(count) as result by Country"
      }
    },
    "ds_operations_over_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Operations Over Time",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "`o365-index` sourcetype=o365:management:activity (Workload=SharePoint OR Workload=OneDrive) | head 100"
        },
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=o365:management:activity (Workload=SharePoint OR Workload=OneDrive) | timechart limit=20 count BY Operation"
      }
    },
    "ds_activity_by_user": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Activity By User",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "`o365-index` sourcetype=o365:management:activity (Workload=SharePoint OR Workload=OneDrive) | head 100"
        },
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=o365:management:activity (Workload=SharePoint OR Workload=OneDrive) | head 100 | stats count by UserId"
      }
    },
    "ds_risky_downloads_over_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Risky Downloads Over Time",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "`o365-index` sourcetype=o365:management:activity (Workload=SharePoint OR Workload=OneDrive) Operation=\"FileDownloaded\" `dangerous_extensions(SourceFileExtension)` | head 100"
        },
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=o365:management:activity (Workload=SharePoint OR Workload=OneDrive) Operation=\"FileDownloaded\" `dangerous_extensions(SourceFileExtension)` | timechart limit=20 count BY ObjectId"
      }
    },
    "ds_items_shared_external_users": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Items Shared With External Users",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "`o365-index` sourcetype=o365:management:activity (Workload=SharePoint OR Workload=OneDrive) TargetUserOrGroupType=Guest | dedup UserId, TargetUserOrGroupName, ObjectId  | head 100"
        },
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=o365:management:activity (Workload=SharePoint OR Workload=OneDrive) TargetUserOrGroupType=Guest | dedup UserId, TargetUserOrGroupName, ObjectId  | head 100  | table Workload, UserId, TargetUserOrGroupName, Operation, ItemType, ObjectId, _time  | rename Workload AS Location UserId AS \"Source User\" ItemType AS \"Item Type\" ObjectId AS Object TargetUserOrGroupName AS \"Target User\" | sort - _time \"Source User\" \"Target User\""
      }
    },
    "ds_permission_changes": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Permission Changes",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "`o365-index` sourcetype=o365:management:activity (Workload=SharePoint OR Workload=OneDrive) (Operation IN (\"SiteCollectionAdminAdded\", \"SiteCollectionAdminRemoved\", \"SitePermissionsModified\") OR Operation=\"Permission*\") | head 100"
        },
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=o365:management:activity (Workload=SharePoint OR Workload=OneDrive) (Operation IN (\"SiteCollectionAdminAdded\", \"SiteCollectionAdminRemoved\", \"SitePermissionsModified\") OR Operation=\"Permission*\") | head 100 | stats count by TargetUserOrGroupName | rename TargetUserOrGroupName as \"Target User or Group\", count as \"Number of Permission Changes\""
      }
    },
    "ds_top_sharepoint_sites_accessed": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Sharepoint Sites Accessed",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "`o365-index` sourcetype=\"o365:management:activity\" Workload=SharePoint Operation=PageViewed | rex field=ObjectId \"\\/sites\\/(?<ObjectSite>[^\\/]+)\" | head 100"
        },
        "query": "`o365-index` sourcetype=\"o365:management:activity\" Workload=SharePoint Operation=PageViewed | rex field=ObjectId \"\\/sites\\/(?<ObjectSite>[^\\/]+)\" | stats count, dc(UserId) by ObjectSite | sort - dc(UserId), count | head 100 | rename count as \"Page Hits\", \"dc(UserId)\" as \"Total Users\", ObjectSite as Site"
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {

This dashboard contains preconfigured top ATT&CK Technique lists that you can use to narrow the scope of your coverage and benchmark reporting. The Splunk strategic research team, SURGe, created a list of top Techniques that were selected from analyzing and weighing Techniques from other leading threat report providers, such as Mandiant and Red Canary. As part of this research, SURGe cross-referenced Techniques that appear together in CISA Alerts to determine if some Techniques are used in conjunction with others as part of an adversary attack flow. Use the CISA Alert Correlation Factor to include the expanded list of Techniques in the dashboard. To learn more about the methodology used in this research, see the Splunk blog post. View Splunk Blogs.

Intro

This page will provide specific content recommendations based on your needs and your available data. To give you a good starting point, it also pulls in MITRE ATT&CK and shows only the Splunk content that is mapped to ATT&CK Techniques that MITRE has shown to be popular with multiple threat groups.

To get started, select a content category in the dropdown above. If desired, you can disabled the data availability filter, and use the popularity filter to show more or less content.

Source',$datasource_selection$),0,1=1,'$SelectedLongName$') | eval m="Move the overlapping entries to Phase 2 so they dont get lost while filtering" | fields - m | eval "$Phase2LongName$"=if('$SelectedLongName$_New'=0 AND '$SelectedLongName$'>0, coalesce('$Phase2LongName$',0)+coalesce('$SelectedLongName$',0), coalesce('$Phase2LongName$',0)) | rename "$SelectedLongName$_New" AS "$SelectedLongName$" | eval Total='$Phase0LongName$'+'$Phase1LongName$'+'$Phase2LongName$'+'$SelectedLongName$' | sort - Total | table "Data Source Category" Total "$Phase0LongName$" "$Phase1LongName$" "$Phase2LongName$" "$SelectedLongName$" eventtypeId "Data Availability" "Data Coverage" | where case( "$phase$"="Active" AND 'Active'>0,1, "$phase$"="Available" AND 'Available'>0,1, "$phase$"="Needs data" AND 'Needs data'>0,1, "$phase$"="Selected" AND 'Total'>0,1, "$phase$"="*" AND 'Total'>0,1, 1=1,0 )=1 [#$Phase0Color$] $row.Data Source Category$
Click to filter | eval Status=if(in(datasource,$datasource_selection$), "$SelectedLongName$",Status) | search Status="$phase$" "App"="$app$" "Data Source"="$datasource$" "Data Source Category"="$datacategory$" "bookmark_status"="$bookmark_status$" "MITRE Tactic"="$MITRE_Tactic$" "mitre_technique_combined" IN($mitre_technique_combined_for_in$) "MITRE Threat Group" IN($mitre_threat_groups_for_in$) "MITRE Platforms" IN("$modified_mitre_platforms$") | where like(lower(Title),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") OR like(lower(Description),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") OR like(lower('Data Source'),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") OR like(lower('Data Source Category'),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") OR like(lower('Use Case'),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") | where mvcount('MITRE Threat Group')>=$threatgrouppopularity$ | mvexpand "MITRE Tactic" | lookup mitre_enterprise_list "Tactic" AS "MITRE Tactic" OUTPUT Matrix | where Matrix="Enterprise ATT&CK" | stats sum(eval(if(Status="$Phase0LongName$",1,0))) AS $Phase0LongName$, sum(eval(if(Status="$Phase1LongName$",1,0))) AS "$Phase1LongName$", sum(eval(if(Status="$Phase2LongName$",1,0))) AS "$Phase2LongName$", sum(eval(if(Status="$SelectedLongName$",1,0))) AS "$SelectedLongName$", dc("MITRE Technique") AS "MITRE Techniques" BY "MITRE Tactic" | eval "$SelectedLongName$_New"=case(isnotnull('Data Source') AND in('Data Source',$datasource_selection$), '$SelectedLongName$',isnotnull('Data Source') AND NOT in('Data Source',$datasource_selection$),0,1=1,'$SelectedLongName$') | eval m="Move the overlapping entries to Phase 2 so they dont get lost while filtering" | fields - m | eval "$Phase2LongName$"=if('$SelectedLongName$_New'=0 AND '$SelectedLongName$'>0, coalesce('$Phase2LongName$',0)+coalesce('$SelectedLongName$',0), coalesce('$Phase2LongName$',0)) | rename "$SelectedLongName$_New" AS "$SelectedLongName$" | eval Total='$Phase0LongName$'+'$Phase1LongName$'+'$Phase2LongName$'+'$SelectedLongName$' | sort - Total | table "MITRE Tactic" "MITRE Techniques" Total "$Phase0LongName$" "$Phase1LongName$" "$Phase2LongName$" "$SelectedLongName$" | rename "MITRE *" AS "ATT&CK *" | foreach "ATT&CK*" [ | eval "<<FIELD>>"=mvdedup('<<FIELD>>') ] [#$Phase0Color$] $row.ATT&CK Tactic$
Click to filter | eval Status=if(in(datasource,$datasource_selection$), "$SelectedLongName$",Status) | search Status="$phase$" "App"="$app$" "Data Source"="$datasource$" "Data Source Category"="$datacategory$" "bookmark_status"="$bookmark_status$" "MITRE Tactic"="$MITRE_Tactic$" "mitre_technique_combined" IN($mitre_technique_combined_for_in$) "MITRE Threat Group" IN($mitre_threat_groups_for_in$) "MITRE Platforms" IN("$modified_mitre_platforms$") | where like(lower(Title),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") OR like(lower(Description),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") OR like(lower('Data Source'),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") OR like(lower('Data Source Category'),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") OR like(lower('Use Case'),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") | where mvcount('MITRE Threat Group')>=$threatgrouppopularity$ | mvexpand "MITRE Technique" | eval Sub_Technique_Temp="-" | lookup mitre_enterprise_list "Technique" AS "MITRE Technique", Sub_Technique AS Sub_Technique_Temp OUTPUT Matrix TechniqueIdCombined | where Matrix="Enterprise ATT&CK" | where 'MITRE Technique'!="" | stats sum(eval(if(Status="$Phase0LongName$",1,0))) AS $Phase0LongName$, sum(eval(if(Status="$Phase1LongName$",1,0))) AS "$Phase1LongName$", sum(eval(if(Status="$Phase2LongName$",1,0))) AS "$Phase2LongName$", sum(eval(if(Status="$SelectedLongName$",1,0))) AS "$SelectedLongName$", values(TechniqueIdCombined) AS Id BY "MITRE Technique" | eval "$SelectedLongName$_New"=case(isnotnull('Data Source') AND in('Data Source',$datasource_selection$), '$SelectedLongName$',isnotnull('Data Source') AND NOT in('Data Source',$datasource_selection$),0,1=1,'$SelectedLongName$') | eval m="Move the overlapping entries to Phase 2 so they dont get lost while filtering" | fields - m | eval "$Phase2LongName$"=if('$SelectedLongName$_New'=0 AND '$SelectedLongName$'>0, coalesce('$Phase2LongName$',0)+coalesce('$SelectedLongName$',0), coalesce('$Phase2LongName$',0)) | rename "$SelectedLongName$_New" AS "$SelectedLongName$" | eval Total='$Phase0LongName$'+'$Phase1LongName$'+'$Phase2LongName$'+'$SelectedLongName$' | sort - Total | table Id "MITRE Technique" Total "$Phase0LongName$" "$Phase1LongName$" "$Phase2LongName$" "$SelectedLongName$" | rename "MITRE Technique" AS "MITRE ATT&CK Technique" | foreach "ATT&CK*" [ | eval "<<FIELD>>"=mvdedup('<<FIELD>>') ] [#$Phase0Color$] $row.MITRE ATT&CK Technique$
Click to filter | eval Status=if(in(datasource,$datasource_selection$), "$SelectedLongName$",Status) | search Status="$phase$" "App"="$app$" "Data Source"="$datasource$" "Data Source Category"="$datacategory$" "bookmark_status"="$bookmark_status$" "MITRE Tactic"="$MITRE_Tactic$" "mitre_technique_combined" IN($mitre_technique_combined_for_in$) "MITRE Threat Group" IN($mitre_threat_groups_for_in$) "MITRE Platforms" IN("$modified_mitre_platforms$") | where like(lower(Title),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") OR like(lower(Description),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") OR like(lower('Data Source'),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") OR like(lower('Data Source Category'),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") OR like(lower('Use Case'),"%".lower("$searchfilter$")."%") | where mvcount('MITRE Threat Group')>=$threatgrouppopularity$ | mvexpand "MITRE Threat Group" | where 'MITRE Threat Group'!="" | stats sum(eval(if(Status="$Phase0LongName$",1,0))) AS $Phase0LongName$, sum(eval(if(Status="$Phase1LongName$",1,0))) AS "$Phase1LongName$", sum(eval(if(Status="$Phase2LongName$",1,0))) AS "$Phase2LongName$", sum(eval(if(Status="$SelectedLongName$",1,0))) AS "$SelectedLongName$", dc("MITRE Technique") AS "MITRE Techniques" BY "MITRE Threat Group" | eval "$SelectedLongName$_New"=case(isnotnull('Data Source') AND in('Data Source',$datasource_selection$), '$SelectedLongName$',isnotnull('Data Source') AND NOT in('Data Source',$datasource_selection$),0,1=1,'$SelectedLongName$') | eval m="Move the overlapping entries to Phase 2 so they dont get lost while filtering" | fields - m | eval "$Phase2LongName$"=if('$SelectedLongName$_New'=0 AND '$SelectedLongName$'>0, coalesce('$Phase2LongName$',0)+coalesce('$SelectedLongName$',0), coalesce('$Phase2LongName$',0)) | rename "$SelectedLongName$_New" AS "$SelectedLongName$" | eval Total='$Phase0LongName$'+'$Phase1LongName$'+'$Phase2LongName$'+'$SelectedLongName$' | sort - Total | table "MITRE Threat Group" "MITRE Techniques" Total "$Phase0LongName$" "$Phase1LongName$" "$Phase2LongName$" "$SelectedLongName$" | rename "MITRE *" AS "ATT&CK *" | foreach "ATT&CK*" [ | eval "<<FIELD>>"=mvdedup('<<FIELD>>') ] | where in('ATT&CK Threat Group',split("$MITRE_Threat_Group$",",")) [#$Phase0Color$] $row.ATT&CK Threat Group$

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">

      "eventHandlers": [{

result.label: network_acls_data
result.title: network_acls_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_error_events": {
      "type": "splunk.singlevalue",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_error_events"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "majorFontSize": 70
      },
      "title": "Error Events"
    },
    "viz_network_acl_actions": {
      "type": "splunk.pie",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_network_acl_actions"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "collapseThreshold": 0.05,
        "resultLimit": 6,
        "showDonutHole": true
      },
      "title": "Network ACL Actions"
    },
    "viz_network_acl_activity_over_time": {
      "type": "splunk.column",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_network_acl_activity_over_time"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "legendDisplay": "right",
        "stackMode": "stacked",
        "xAxisTitleText": "Time",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count"
      },
      "title": "Network ACL Activity Over Time"
    },
    "viz_most_recent_network_acl_activity": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_most_recent_network_acl_activity"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {},
      "title": "Most Recent Network ACLs Activity"
    },
    "viz_network_acl_error_activity": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_network_acl_error_activity"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {},
      "title": "Network ACL Error Activity"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_regions": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Regions",
      "options": {
        "query": "| inputlookup aws_regions",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_account_id": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "AccountId",
      "options": {
        "query": "| inputlookup aws_all_account_ids | search account_id!=\"ANONYMOUS_PRINCIPAL\"",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_error_events": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Error events",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "| datamodel `summariesonly` Change Network_Changes search | search All_Changes.command=\"*networkacl*\" | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_DM$ status=failure | head 100 | stats count | sort 100 - count"
        },
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count as result FROM datamodel=Change.All_Changes WHERE nodename=All_Changes.Network_Changes All_Changes.command=\"*networkacl*\" $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_TSTATS$ All_Changes.status=failure"
      }
    },
    "ds_network_acl_actions": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Network Acl Actions",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "| datamodel `summariesonly` Change Network_Changes search | search All_Changes.command=\"*networkacl*\" | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_DM$ | head 100 | stats count by command | sort 100 - count"
        },
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count as result FROM datamodel=Change.All_Changes WHERE nodename=All_Changes.Network_Changes All_Changes.command=\"*networkacl*\" $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_TSTATS$ by All_Changes.command | sort 100 - result"
      }
    },
    "ds_network_acl_activity_over_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Network Acl Activity overtime",
      "options": {
        "data": {
          "rawQuery": "| datamodel `summariesonly` Change Network_Changes search | search All_Changes.command=\"*networkacl*\" | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_DM$ | head 100 | stats count as result by command, _time | timechart limit=20 sum(result) by command span=1d | fillnull value=0"
        },
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count as result FROM datamodel=Change.All_Changes WHERE nodename=All_Changes.Network_Changes All_Changes.command=\"*networkacl*\" $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_TSTATS$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_TSTATS$ by _time, All_Changes.command | timechart limit=20 sum(result) BY All_Changes.command | fillnull value=0"
      }
    },
    "ds_most_recent_network_acl_activity": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Most recent network acl activity",
      "options": {
        "data": {},
        "query": "| datamodel `summariesonly` Change Network_Changes search | search All_Changes.command=\"*networkacl*\" | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_DM$ | head 100 | table command, user, user_name, src, object_id, vendor_account, vendor_region, _time"
      }
    },
    "ds_network_acl_error_activity": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Network acl error activity",
      "options": {
        "data": {},
        "query": "| datamodel `summariesonly` Change Network_Changes search | search All_Changes.command=\"*networkacl*\" | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.accountID_DM$ $ds_input_tokens:result.regions_DM$ dvc=ec2* status=failure | head 100 | spath requestParameters | table command, user, user_name, src, object_id, result_id, result, vendor_account, vendor_region, requestParameters, _time"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval region=\"$region$\"\n| eval list=split(region,\",\")\n| eval filterlist=mvfilter(!list IN (\"*\"))\n| eval regions_fields_dm=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"vendor_region=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval regions_fields_tstats=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"All_Changes.vendor_region=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval regions_fields=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"region=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval regions_DM=case(region==\"*\",\"(vendor_region=\\\"*\\\")\", true(), regions_fields_dm)\n| eval regions_TSTATS=case(region==\"*\",\"(All_Changes.vendor_region=\\\"*\\\")\", true(), regions_fields_tstats)\n| eval status_DM=\"(status=\\\"$status$\\\")\"\n| eval status_TSTATS=\"(All_Changes.status=\\\"$status$\\\")\"\n\n| eval accountID=\"$account_id$\"\n| eval list=split(accountID,\",\")\n| eval filterlist=mvfilter(!list IN (\"*\"))\n| eval accountID_fields_dm=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"vendor_account=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval accountID_fields_tstats=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"All_Changes.vendor_account=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval accountID_fields=\"(\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"accountID=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\")\"\n| eval accountID_DM=case(accountID==\"*\",\"(vendor_account=\\\"*\\\")\", true(), accountID_fields_dm)\n| eval accountID_TSTATS=case(accountID==\"*\",\"(All_Changes.vendor_account=\\\"*\\\")\", true(), accountID_fields_tstats)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_account_id": {
      "type": "input.multiselect",
      "title": "Account ID",
      "options": {
        "token": "account_id",
        "defaultValue": "*",
         "items": [
          {
            "value": "*",
            "label": "All"
          }
        ]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.account_id",
        "label": "primary.account_id"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_account_id"
      }
    },
    "input_region": {
      "type": "input.multiselect",
      "title": "Regions",
      "options": {
        "token": "region",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [
          {
            "value": "*",
            "label": "All"
          }
        ]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.region",
        "label": "primary.label"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_regions"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-7d,now"
      }
    },
    "input_status": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Status",
      "options": {
        "token": "status",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [
          {
            "value": "*",
            "label": "All"
          },
          {
            "value": "failure",
            "label": "Error"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  },

    "type": "grid",

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {

              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            },

            "newTab": true

      ],
      "options": {

      },
      "context": {},

    },
    "viz_recent_network_changes": {
      "type": "splunk.events",
      "description": "",

        "primary": "ds_recent_network_changes",
        "fieldsummary": "ds_recent_network_changes_fieldsummary"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
      {
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [
                {
                    "token": "tag_value",
                    "key": "value"
                },
                {
                    "token": "field",
                    "key": "name"
                }
            ]
        }
      },
      {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
              "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Change\".\"Network_Changes\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ | head 100 | search \"tag::$payload:field$\"=$payload:tag_value$",
              "newTab": true,
              "events": [
                  "tag.click"
              ]
          }
      },
      {
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Change\".\"Network_Changes\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ | head 100",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "eventViewerDrilldownHandler",
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "events"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "footerFields": [
          "action",
          "object_category",
          "object",
          "command",
          "dest",
          "user"
        ],
        "highlightValuesByField": {
          "dest_bunit": "$bunit_form$",
          "user_category": "$category_form$"
        }
      },
      "title": "Recent Network Changes"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_category": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Category",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `categories`",

          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_network_changes_by_action": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Network Changes By Action",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Change.All_Changes where nodename=All_Changes.Network_Changes $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by _time,All_Changes.action span=10m | timechart minspan=10m useother=`useother` count by All_Changes.action | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_network_changes_by_device": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Network Changes By Device",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Change.All_Changes where nodename=All_Changes.Network_Changes $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by All_Changes.dvc | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Changes\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_recent_network_changes": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Recent Network Changes",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from datamodel:\"Change\".\"Network_Changes\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ | head 100"
      }
    },
    "ds_recent_network_changes_fieldsummary": {
      "type": "ds.chain",
      "name": "Recent Network Changes FieldSummary",
      "options": {
        "query": "fieldsummary maxvals=10",
        "extend": "ds_recent_network_changes"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval bunit_raw=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(src_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Changes.src_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_raw=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(src_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Changes.src_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR All_Changes.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.chain": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      },
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_bunit": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",

        "defaultValue": "*"

    "input_category": {

    "input_global_time": {

      "options": {

      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_network_changes_by_action",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    }, {
      "item": "viz_network_changes_by_device",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    }, {

      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
