        "w": 1200,
        "h": 600
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_bunit",
      "input_category",
      "input_global_time"
    ]

  "description": "",

}]]></definition>

result.label: new_domain_analysis_data
result.title: new_domain_analysis_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_new_domain_activity": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_new_domain_activity"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/web_search?form.dest=*$payload:row.dest.value$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "New Domain Activity"
    },
    "viz_new_domain_activity_by_age": {
      "type": "splunk.scatter",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_new_domain_activity_by_age"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.age.value",
              "key": "row.Age (days).value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Web\".\"Web\" | `get_whois` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.domain_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.domain_type_raw$ | eval age=ceil((now()-$ds_input_tokens:result.age_type_raw$)/86400) | where age=\"$payload:row.age.value$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest$&latest=$global_time.latest$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "xAxisTitleText": "age (days)",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "legendDisplay": "off",
        "x": "> primary | seriesByIndex(0)",
        "y": "> primary | seriesByIndex(1)"
      },
      "title": "New Domain Activity By Age"
    },
    "viz_new_domain_activity_by_tld": {
      "type": "splunk.bar",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_new_domain_activity_by_tld"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.tld.value",
              "key": "row.tld.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Web\".\"Web\" | `get_whois` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.domain_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.domain_type_raw$ | eval age=ceil((now()-$ds_input_tokens:result.age_type_raw$)/86400) | where age<=\"$age$\" | `swap_resolved_domain(dest)` | `get_tld(dest)` | search tld=\"$payload:row.tld.value$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest$&latest=$global_time.latest$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "xAxisTitleText": "tld",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "legendDisplay": "off"
      },
      "title": "New Domain Activity By TLD"
    },
    "viz_registration_details_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### Registration Details"
      }
    },
    "viz_registration_details": {
      "type": "custom.perPanelFilter",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_registration_details"
      },
      "options": {
        "selectedRows": "$PPF:selected_rows$"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.domain.value",
              "key": "row.domain.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Domain_Analysis\".\"All_Domains\" | search domain=\"$payload:row.domain.value$\"&earliest=-$age$d@d&latest=now&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "title": "Registration Details"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_new_domain_activity": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "New Domain Activity",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,count from datamodel=Web.Web by Web.dest | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")` | `get_whois` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.domain_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.domain_type_raw$ | eval \"Age (days)\"=ceil((now()-$ds_input_tokens:result.age_type_raw$)/86400) | where 'Age (days)'<=$ds_input_tokens:result.age$ | eval domain=if(isnull(domain), dest, domain) | `swap_resolved_domain(domain)` | `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_new_domains\",\"domain\")` | `alexa_lookup(domain)` | eval alexa_rank=if(isnull(domain_rank), \"below 1 million\", domain_rank) | rename ppf_filter as filter | eval resolved_domain=if(isnull(resolved_domain) OR resolved_domain==\"unknown\",null(),resolved_domain) | sort - filter,_time | `uitime($ds_input_tokens:result.age_type_raw$)` | fields _time,dest,domain,filter,$ds_input_tokens:result.age_type_raw$,\"Age (days)\",alexa_rank,count"
      }
    },
    "ds_new_domain_activity_by_age": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "New Domain Activity By Age",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Web.Web by Web.dest | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")` | `get_whois` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.domain_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.domain_type_raw$ | eval age=ceil((now()-$ds_input_tokens:result.age_type_raw$)/86400) | where age<=$ds_input_tokens:result.age$ | eval domain=if(isnull(domain), dest, domain) | `swap_resolved_domain(domain)` | `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_new_domains\",\"domain\")` | stats sum(count) as count by age | eval \"Age (days)\"=age | table \"Age (days)\",count"
      }
    },
    "ds_new_domain_activity_by_tld": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "New Domain Activity By TLD",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Web.Web by Web.dest | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")` | `get_whois` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.domain_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.domain_type_raw$ | eval age=ceil((now()-$ds_input_tokens:result.age_type_raw$)/86400) | where age<=$ds_input_tokens:result.age$ | eval domain=if(isnull(domain), dest, domain) | `swap_resolved_domain(domain)` | `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_new_domains\",\"domain\")` | `get_tld(domain)` | stats sum(count) as count by tld | sort 10 - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_registration_details": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Registration Details",
      "options": {
        "query": "earliest=-$ds_input_tokens:result.age$d@d `whois` | eval newly_seen=_time  | eval created=if(match(created,\"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}$\"),strptime(created,\"%Y-%m-%d\"),created) | search $ds_input_tokens:result.domain_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.domain_type_raw$ | eval age=ceil((now()-$ds_input_tokens:result.age_type_raw$)/86400) | where age<=$ds_input_tokens:result.age$ | head 1000 | eval orig_domain=domain | `swap_resolved_domain(domain)` | `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_new_domains\",\"domain\")` | rename ppf_cell as \"Per-panel Filter\" | eval domain=orig_domain | eval resolved_domain=if(isnull(resolved_domain) OR resolved_domain==\"unknown\",null(),resolved_domain) | sort - ppf_filter,_time | `uitime(created)` | `uitime(expires)` | table \"Per-panel Filter\" _time domain resolved_domain created age expires nameservers registrant registrar"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval domain_raw=if($domain_form|s$==\"*\" OR $domain_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest=\\\"*$domain_form$\\\" OR domain=\\\"*$domain_form$\\\" OR resolved_domain=\\\"*$domain_form$\\\")\")\n| eval domain_type_raw=if($domain_type_form|s$==\"newly_registered\", \"(created=* NOT created=\\\"unknown\\\")\", \"newly_seen=*\")\n| eval age_type_raw=if($domain_type_form|s$==\"newly_registered\", \"created\", \"newly_seen\")\n| eval age=$age$\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "tokens": {
      "PPF": {
        "selected_rows": {
          "value": "{}"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_domain_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Domain",
      "options": {
        "token": "domain_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_domain_type_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Domain Type",
      "options": {
        "token": "domain_type_form",
        "defaultValue": "newly_registered",
        "items": [{
            "value": "newly_registered",
            "label": "Newly Registered"
          },{
            "value": "newly_seen",
            "label": "Newly Seen"
          }]
      }
    },
    "input_age": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Maximum Age (days)",
      "options": {
        "token": "age",
        "defaultValue": "30"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      }
    },
    "input_ppf_button": {
      "type": "input.perPanelFilterButton",
      "options": {
        "selectedRows": "$PPF:selected_rows$",
        "ppfOptions": {
          "namespace": "DA-ESS-NetworkProtection",
          "lookupFile": "ppf_new_domains.csv",
          "fields": [ "domain" ],
          "lookupEditLink": "ess_lookups_edit?namespace=DA-ESS-NetworkProtection&file=ppf_new_domains.csv"
        },
        "searchManagersToReload": [
          "viz_new_domain_activity",
          "viz_new_domain_activity_by_age",
          "viz_new_domain_activity_by_tld",
          "viz_registration_details"
        ]
      }
    }
  },

count -24h@h now ALL * ( ) category=" " OR category category | search $usecase$ | stats count by category | fields - count -24h@h now ALL * All Examples Only Bookmarked * Splunk Security Essentials Content (for filters set above) # of Datasources | search $usecase$ $category$ $bookmark$ | stats dc(datasource) AS "# of Datasources" -24h@h now 1 # of Examples | search $usecase$ $category$ $bookmark$ | stats count(name) AS number_of_analytics -24h@h now 1 # of Content Enabled by Datasource | search $usecase$ $category$ (enabled="Yes") $bookmark$ | stats dc(datasource) AS "# of Datasources" -24h@h now 1 # of Content Disabled by Datasource | search $usecase$ $category$ (enabled="No") $bookmark$ | stats dc(datasource) AS "# of Datasources" -24h@h now 1 # of Content Enabled by Originating App | search $usecase$ $category$ (enabled="Yes") $bookmark$ | stats dc(displayapp) AS "# of Apps" -24h@h now 1 # of Content Disabled by Originating App | search $usecase$ $category$ (enabled="No") $bookmark$ | stats dc(displayapp) AS "# of Apps" -24h@h now 1 Top MITRE ATT&CK Tactics | search $usecase$ $category$ $bookmark$ | stats count by mitre | search mitre!="None" | sort + count -24h@h now 1 Top Kill Chain Phases | search $usecase$ $category$ $bookmark$ | stats count by killchain | search killchain!="None" | sort + count -24h@h now 1 Use Cases by Security Data Journey | table name usecase hasSearch includeSSE datasource displayapp app securityDataJourney category domain icon description dashboard mitre killchain alertvolume highlight bookmark_status | search highlight=Yes | search $usecase$ $category$ $bookmark$ | chart count over securityDataJourney by usecase | eval sort_field=case(usecase=="Other",1, 1=1,0) | sort sort_field usecase | fields - sort_field _time | eval securityDataJourney = replace(securityDataJourney, "_", " ") -24h@h now 1 Use Case(s) > Data Source (Requires Sankey Viz) | search $usecase$ $category$ $bookmark$ | stats count by usecase datasource | sort usecase, datasource -24h@h now 1 Use Case(s) > Data Source Data Source > Splunk App (Requires Sankey Viz) | search $usecase$ $category$ $bookmark$ | stats count by datasource, displayapp | sort , displayapp datasource -24h@h now 1 Data Source > Splunk App Security Data Journey by Splunk Product | search $usecase$ $category$ $bookmark$ | chart count over displayapp by securityDataJourney | append [ | makeresults | eval displayapp="-"] | eval sort_field=case(displayapp=="-",1, displayapp=="Splunk User Behavior Analytics",2, displayapp=="Splunk App for Enterprise Security",3, displayapp=="Splunk Security Essentials for Ransomware",4, displayapp=="Enterprise Security Content Update",5) | sort sort_field | fields - sort_field _time | search displayapp!="-" | rename Stage_* as "Stage *" | rename displayapp as "Originating App" -24h@h now 1 Security Data Journey Coverage by Use Case | search $usecase$ $category$ $bookmark$ | chart count over securityDataJourney by usecase | eval securityDataJourney = replace(securityDataJourney, "_", " ") | rename securityDataJourney as "Security Data Journey" | fields "Security Data Journey" Security* Advance* Insider* Compli* Applic* * -24h@h now 1
Content Enabled by Originating App | rename displayapp as "Originating App" | search $usecase$ $category$ $bookmark$ (enabled="Yes") | stats count as "# of Enabled Content" by "Originating App" -24h@h now search?q=%7C%20sseanalytics%20%7C%20table%20name%20usecase%20hasSearch%20includeSSE%20datasource%20displayapp%20app%20journey%20category%20domain%20icon%20description%20dashboard%20mitre%20killchain%20alertvolume%20bookmark_status%20enabled%20%7C%20search%20$usecase$%20$category$%20(enabled%3D%22Yes%22)%20$bookmark$%0A%7C%20stats%20count%20as%20%22%23%20of%20Enabled%20Content%22%20by%20displayapp&earliest=-24h@h&latest=now Content Disabled by Originating App | rename displayapp as "Originating App" | search $usecase$ $category$ $bookmark$ (enabled="No") | stats count as "# of Disabled Content" by "Originating App" -24h@h now search?q=%7C%20sseanalytics%20%7C%20table%20name%20usecase%20hasSearch%20includeSSE%20datasource%20displayapp%20app%20journey%20category%20domain%20icon%20description%20dashboard%20mitre%20killchain%20alertvolume%20bookmark_status%20enabled%20%7C%20search%20$usecase$%20$category$%20(enabled%3D%22No%22)%20$bookmark$%0A%7C%20stats%20count%20as%20%22%23%20of%20Disabled%20Content%22%20by%20displayapp&earliest=-24h@h&latest=now

result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_per_panel_filters_by_reviewer": {
      "type": "splunk.column",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_per_panel_filters_by_reviewer"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| search `ppf_updates` |  `get_realname(user)` | search",
            "searchKey": "user_realname",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "0",
              "latest": "now"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "searchDrilldownHandler",
          "events": [
            "point.click",
            "legend.click"
          ],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "column"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "xAxisTitleText": "time",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "stackMode": "stacked"
      },
      "title": "Per-panel Filters By Reviewer"
    },
    "viz_top_users": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_top_users"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.user_realname.value",
              "key": "row.user_realname.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| search `ppf_updates` |  `get_realname(user)` | search user_realname=\"$payload:row.user_realname.value|u$\"&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "wrap": true,
        "displayRowNumbers": false,
        "dataOverlayMode": "none"
      },
      "title": "Top Users"
    },
    "viz_recent_filter_activity": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_recent_filter_activity"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.action.value",
              "key": "row.action.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.user_realname.value",
              "key": "row.user_realname.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| search `ppf_updates` |  `get_realname(user)` | fillnull value=\"manual edit\" action | search action=\"$payload:row.action.value|u$\" user_realname=\"$payload:row.user_realname.value|u$\"&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "wrap": true,
        "displayRowNumbers": false,
        "dataOverlayMode": "none",
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSS"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Recent Filter Activity"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_per_panel_filters_by_reviewer": {
      "type": "ds.savedSearch",
      "name": "Per-Panel Filtering - Activity By User Over Time",
      "options": {
        "query": "| savedsearch \"Per-Panel Filtering - Activity By User Over Time\"",
        "ref": "Per-Panel Filtering - Activity By User Over Time"
      }
    },
    "ds_top_users": {
      "type": "ds.savedSearch",
      "name": "Per-Panel Filtering - Top Users",
      "options": {
        "query": "| savedsearch \"Per-Panel Filtering - Top Users\"",
        "ref": "Per-Panel Filtering - Top Users"
      }
    },
    "ds_recent_filter_activity": {
      "type": "ds.savedSearch",
      "name": "Per-Panel Filtering - Recent Activity",
      "options": {
        "query": "| savedsearch \"Per-Panel Filtering - Recent Activity\"",
        "ref": "Per-Panel Filtering - Recent Activity"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.savedSearch": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "now",
            "earliest": "0"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {},
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_per_panel_filters_by_reviewer",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_top_users",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_recent_filter_activity",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": []
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Per-panel Filter Audit"
}]]></definition>

    "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>

result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_port_protocol_profiler_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### Port/Protocol Profiler"
      }
    },
    "viz_port_protocol_profiler": {
      "type": "splunk.column",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_port_protocol_profiler"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
        "options": {
          "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Network_Traffic\".\"All_Traffic\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.transport_raw|u$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_port_raw|u$&earliest=-60d@d&latest=now&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
          "newTab": true
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "xAxisTitleText": "time",
        "yAxisTitleText": "average / day",
        "legendDisplay": "bottom"
      },
      "title": ""
    },
    "viz_new_port_activity_last_7_days": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_new_port_activity_last_7_days"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "handlerName": "portProtocolTrackerDrilldownHandler",
          "events": ["cell.click"],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "table"
        }
      }],
      "options": {},
      "title": "New Port Activity - Last 7 Days"
    },
    "viz_prohibited_or_insecure_traffic_over_time_last_24_hours": {
      "type": "splunk.line",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_prohibited_or_insecure_traffic_over_time_last_24_hours"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Network_Traffic\".\"All_Traffic\" | `get_transport_dest_port` | search",
            "autoPause": "$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "searchKey": "transport_dest_port",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "-24h@h",
              "latest": "now"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "portProtocolTrackerDrilldownHandler",
          "events": [
            "point.click",
            "legend.click"
          ],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "line"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "markerDisplay": "off",
        "xAxisTitleText": "time",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "nullValueDisplay": "zero"
      },
      "title": "Prohibited Or Insecure Traffic Over Time - Last 24 Hours"
    },
    "viz_prohibited_traffic_details_last_24_hours": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_prohibited_traffic_details_last_24_hours"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.src.value",
              "key": "row.src.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.transport.value",
              "key": "row.transport.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.dest_port.value",
              "key": "row.dest_port.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Network_Traffic\".\"All_Traffic\" | search src=\"$payload:row.src.value|u$\" dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\" transport=\"$payload:row.transport.value|u$\" dest_port=\"$payload:row.dest_port.value|u$\"&earliest=-24h@h&latest=now&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Prohibited Traffic Details - Last 24 Hours"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_cim_malware_actions": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Cim Transport Protocols",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_transport_protocols`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_category_form": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Category Form",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_port_protocol_profiler": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Port/Protocol Profiler",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where $ds_input_tokens:result.transport_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_port_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by _time,All_Traffic.transport,All_Traffic.dest_port span=1d | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Traffic\")` | `get_transport_dest_port` | `dayDiff` | eval last60=if(dayDiff>1 AND dayDiff<=60,count,null()) | eval last7=if(dayDiff>1 AND dayDiff<=7,count,null()) | eval today=if(dayDiff<=1,count,null()) | stats avg(last60) as \"Last 60 days\",avg(last7) as \"Last 7 days\",sum(today) as \"Today\" by transport_dest_port",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-60d@d",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_new_port_activity_last_7_days": {
      "type": "ds.savedSearch",
      "name": "New Port Activity - Last 7 Days",
      "options": {
        "query": "| savedsearch \"Traffic - New Port Activity\"",
        "ref": "Traffic - New Port Activity"
      }
    },
    "ds_prohibited_or_insecure_traffic_over_time_last_24_hours": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Prohibited Or Insecure Traffic Over Time - Last 24 Hours",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` values(All_Traffic.src_category) as src_category,values(All_Traffic.dest_category) as dest_category,count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where * $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by _time,All_Traffic.src,All_Traffic.dest,All_Traffic.transport,All_Traffic.dest_port span=10m | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Traffic\")` | `is_traffic_prohibited(dest_port)` | search (is_prohibited!=\"false\" OR is_secure!=\"unknown\") | `get_transport_dest_port` | timechart minspan=10m sum(count) as count by transport_dest_port"
      }
    },
    "ds_prohibited_traffic_details_last_24_hours": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Prohibited Traffic Details - Last 24 Hours",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,values(All_Traffic.src_category) as src_category,values(All_Traffic.dest_category) as dest_category,count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where * $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by All_Traffic.src,All_Traffic.dest,All_Traffic.transport,All_Traffic.dest_port | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Traffic\")` | `is_traffic_prohibited(dest_port)` | search (is_prohibited!=\"false\" OR is_secure!=\"unknown\") | fields _time,src,src_category,dest,dest_category,transport,dest_port,is_prohibited,is_secure"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval bunit_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Traffic.src_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Traffic.src_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval transport_dm=if($transport|s$==\"*\" OR $transport|s$==\"\", \" \", \"All_Traffic.transport=\\\"$transport$\\\"\")\n| eval transport_raw=if($transport|s$==\"*\" OR $transport|s$==\"\", \" \", \"transport=\\\"$transport$\\\"\")\n| eval dest_port_dm=if($dest_port|s$==\"*\" OR $dest_port|s$==\"\", \" \", \"All_Traffic.dest_port=\\\"$dest_port$\\\"\")\n| eval dest_port_raw=if($dest_port|s$==\"*\" OR $dest_port|s$==\"\", \" \", \"dest_port=\\\"$dest_port$\\\"\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {

    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {

            "latest": "now",

          }

    "tokens": {
      "default": {

result.eai:data:
About Splunk Professional Services


You're exploring an example that is best accomplished by engaging Splunk Professional Services.

Splunk offers on-site or remote Professional Services (PS) consultants, who have created many custom security search examples identical or similar to the one you just clicked on.

Splunk PS:

  • Aligns the right people with your requirements and process to ensure success;
  • Provides project management where appropriate to keep efforts on track;
  • Leverages a vast array of custom content from which to iterate on for your specific needs; and
  • Always delivers with Splunk best practices and proven architectures in mind.

    • To learn more about Splunk Professional Services, click here or contact your Splunk account team.

result.label: Risk-based Alerting Content Recommendation
result.title: rba_content_recommendation
result.eai:data:
1 | inputlookup data_inventory_products_lookup | search stage="all-done" 1 1 * 1 1 |sseanalytics | table * | search $apps$ $categories$ $data_available$ 1 1 | search $data_available$ $apps$ 1
Available Data Only All Content data_available="good" All displayapp=" " OR displayapp displayapp | stats count by displayapp *
Intro

Risk-based Alerting is based on the idea of aggregating together "risky" events that may be too noisy to present to an analyst directly. Detecting the launch of a new process, or uncategorized web traffic have a clear value for security, but most new processes and most uncategorized traffic is totally benign, which would overwhelm analysts if sent directly. Instead, RBA is oriented around tracking this risky activity separately (for users of Splunk Enterprise Security, in the risk framework), and then building a second set of correlation searches that look for users or systems that have high risk, or cross multiple MITRE ATT&CK tactics, etc.

This dashboard will get you started. Select a detection category below that is relevant to your organization (if desired you might select multiple). Once you do, you'll get a list of all of the content that's relevant for you to deploy below. If desired, you can use the Included Apps filter at the top to focus in on just content from Splunk Security Essentials, or if you have it Splunk Enterprise Security Content Update.

Importantly, this dashboard expects that you've configured the Data Inventory configuration, as it will show you only the content you have the data to support. If you haven't, make sure to hit All Content under "Content with Available Data" above.

Data Inventory Not Configured

It appears that no data inventory are fully configured. Configure Data Inventory first and then return to this dashboard.

This panel shows data for instances running Splunk Enterprise 6.4+.

Service Time: The time for the device to execute the requests.

Wait Time: I/O queue + execution time for requests to complete. This reflects the end-to-end time spent on the requests.

Storage I/O Saturation: Percentage of time the CPU was servicing requests. Disk saturation occurs when this value is close to 100%.

Storage I/O Saturation (NFS): Percentage of time network resources were used to serve requests. Only applies to NFS disks.

Learn more about the source of this data.

Average I/O Usage by Mount Point `dmc_timechart_for_iostats` per_second(op_count) as op_count by mount_point

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_top_rest_actions": {
      "type": "splunk.pie",

      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_top_rest_actions"
      },

        "type": "drilldown.setToken",

            "tokenNamespace": "payload",

              "token": "row.action.value",
              "key": "row.action.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",

            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=search `rest_handler_transactions` | search action=$payload:row.action.value|u$&earliest=-24h&latest=now",

          },
          "count %": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName(\"count %\") | formatByType(threeDecimalPrecisionConfig)",
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"count %\") | pick(columnColor)"
          }
        },
        "showInternalFields": false
      },
      "context": {
        "columnColor": [
          "> themes.textColor"
        ],
        "valid_mitre_annotation_color": [{
          "match": 1,
          "value": "#006EAA"
        }],

          },
          "total": {
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"total\") | pick(columnColor)"
          },
          "total %": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName(\"total %\") | formatByType(threeDecimalPrecisionConfig)",
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"total %\") | pick(columnColor)"
          }
        },
        "showInternalFields": false
      },
      "context": {
        "columnColor": [
          "> themes.textColor"
        ],
        "linkColor": [
          "#006EAA"
        ],
        "threeDecimalPrecisionConfig": {
          "number": {
            "precision": 2
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Risk Modifiers By Threat Object"
    },
    "viz_risk_score_by_object": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_risk_score_by_object"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
        "options": {}
      }],
      "options": {
        "drilldown": "row",
        "columnFormat": {
          "risk_score": {
            "rowBackgroundColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"risk_score\") | gradient(gradientConfig)",
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"risk_score\") | gradient(gradientConfig) | maxContrast(contrastConfig)"
          },
          "source_count": {
            "rowBackgroundColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"source_count\") | gradient(gradientConfig)",
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"source_count\") | gradient(gradientConfig) | maxContrast(contrastConfig)"
          },
          "count": {
            "rowBackgroundColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"count\") | gradient(gradientConfig)",
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"count\") | gradient(gradientConfig) | maxContrast(contrastConfig)"
          },
          "risk_object": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName(\"risk_object\") | pick(alignPositionCol)",
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"risk_object\") | pick(linkColor)"
          },
          "risk_object_type": {
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"risk_object_type\") | pick(columnColor)"
          },
          "cim_entity_zone": {
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"cim_entity_zone\") | pick(columnColor)"
          }
        },
        "showInternalFields": false
      },
      "context": {
        "alignPositionCol": [
          "left"
        ],
        "linkColor": [
          "#006EAA"
        ],
        "columnColor": [
          "> themes.textColor"
        ],
        "gradientConfig": {
          "stops": [
            "> minNumber",
            "> maxNumber"
          ],
          "colors": [
            "> themes.defaultBackgroundColor",
            "#d6563c"
          ]
        },
        "minNumber": "> primary | frameBySeriesNames('risk_score', 'source_count', 'count') | min()",
        "maxNumber": "> primary | frameBySeriesNames('risk_score', 'source_count', 'count') | max()",
        "contrastConfig": {
          "colors": [
            "white",
            "black"
          ]
        }
      },
      "title": "Risk Score By Object"
    },
    "viz_most_active_sources": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_most_active_sources"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.source.value",
              "key": "row.source.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"$index$\".\"All_Risk\" | search source=\"$payload:row.source.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "drilldown": "row",
        "columnFormat": {
          "source": {
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"source\") | pick(linkColor)"
          },
          "risk_score": {
            "rowBackgroundColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"risk_score\") | gradient(gradientConfig)",
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"risk_score\") | gradient(gradientConfig) | maxContrast(contrastConfig)"
          },
          "risk_objects": {
            "rowBackgroundColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"risk_objects\") | gradient(gradientConfig)",
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"risk_objects\") | gradient(gradientConfig) | maxContrast(contrastConfig)"
          },
          "normalized_risk_objects": {
            "rowBackgroundColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"normalized_risk_objects\") | gradient(gradientConfig)",
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"normalized_risk_objects\") | gradient(gradientConfig) | maxContrast(contrastConfig)"
          },
          "count": {
            "rowBackgroundColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"count\") | gradient(gradientConfig)",
            "rowColors": "> table | seriesByName(\"count\") | gradient(gradientConfig) | maxContrast(contrastConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "columnColor": [
          "> themes.textColor"
        ],
        "linkColor": [
          "#006EAA"
        ],
        "gradientConfig": {
          "stops": [
            "> minNumber",
            "> maxNumber"
          ],
          "colors": [
            "> themes.defaultBackgroundColor",
            "#d6563c"
          ]
        },
        "minNumber": "> primary | frameBySeriesNames('risk_score', 'risk_objects', 'count') | min()",
        "maxNumber": "> primary | frameBySeriesNames('risk_score', 'risk_objects', 'count') | max()",
        "contrastConfig": {
          "colors": [
            "white",
            "black"
          ]
        }
      },
      "title": "Most Active Sources"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_source": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Source",
      "options": {
        "query": "| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /services/saved/searches search=\"action.risk=1\"",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_risk_object_type": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Risk Object Type",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `risk_object_types`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_risk_modifiers_over_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Risk Modifiers Over Time",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats prestats=true summariesonly=false sum(All_Risk.calculated_risk_score),count from datamodel=$index$.All_Risk where * $ds_input_tokens:result.source_raw$ $risk_object_type_dm$ $risk_object_dm$ by _time span=10m | timechart minspan=10m sum(All_Risk.calculated_risk_score) as risk_score,count"
      }
    },
    "ds_risk_modifiers_by_annotations": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Risk Modifiers By Annotations",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats summariesonly=false count from datamodel=$index$.All_Risk where * $ds_input_tokens:result.source_raw$ $risk_object_type_dm$ $risk_object_dm$ by All_Risk.annotations._all | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Risk\")` | lookup mitre_attack_lookup mitre_technique_id AS annotations._all OUTPUTNEW mitre_technique | eval enriched_annotations = if(isnotnull(mitre_technique), 'annotations._all' + \" - \" + 'mitre_technique' + \" ↗\", 'annotations._all') | stats sum(count) as count by enriched_annotations | eventstats sum(count) as total_count | eval \"count %\" = (count/total_count)*100 | eval _mitre=if(match(enriched_annotations, \"T\\d\\d\\d\\d\"), 1, 0) | table enriched_annotations, count, \"count %\", _mitre"
      }
    },
    "ds_risk_score_by_annotations": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Risk Score By Annotations",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats summariesonly=false sum(All_Risk.calculated_risk_score) as risk_score from datamodel=$index$.All_Risk where * $ds_input_tokens:result.source_raw$ $risk_object_type_dm$ $risk_object_dm$ by All_Risk.annotations._all | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Risk\")` | lookup mitre_attack_lookup mitre_technique_id AS annotations._all OUTPUTNEW mitre_technique | eval enriched_annotations = if(isnotnull(mitre_technique), 'annotations._all' + \" - \" + 'mitre_technique', 'annotations._all') | fields enriched_annotations risk_score"
      }
    },
    "ds_risk_modifiers_by_threat_object": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Risk Modifiers By Threat Object",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from datamodel $index$.All_Risk | where isnotnull(threat_object) AND threat_object!=\"\" | top limit=0 countfield=total threat_object percentfield=\"total %\" | table threat_object total \"total %\""
      }
    },
    "ds_risk_score_by_object": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Risk Score By Object",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats summariesonly=false mode(All_Risk.risk_object) as risk_object, values(All_Risk.cim_entity_zone) as cim_entity_zone, sum(All_Risk.calculated_risk_score) as risk_score,dc(source) as source_count,count from datamodel=$index$.All_Risk where * $ds_input_tokens:result.source_raw$ $risk_object_type_dm$ $risk_object_dm$ by All_Risk.normalized_risk_object,All_Risk.risk_object_type | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Risk\")` | `default_entity_zone` | table risk_object, normalized_risk_object, risk_object_type, cim_entity_zone, risk_score, source_count, count | rename normalized_risk_object as _normalized_risk_object | sort 1000 - risk_score"
      }
    },
    "ds_most_active_sources": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Most Active Sources",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats summariesonly=false sum(All_Risk.calculated_risk_score) as risk_score,dc(All_Risk.risk_object) as risk_objects,dc(All_Risk.normalized_risk_object) as normalized_risk_objects,count from datamodel=$index$.All_Risk where * $ds_input_tokens:result.source_raw$ $risk_object_type_dm$ $risk_object_dm$ by source | sort 1000 - count,risk_score"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "query": "| makeresults count 1\n| eval source_raw=if($source|s$==\"*\" OR $source|s$==\"\", \" \", \"source=\\\"$source$\\\"\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_index": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Index",
      "options": {
        "token": "index",
        "defaultValue": "Risk",
        "items": [{
          "value": "Risk",
          "label": "Risk"
        },{
          "value": "Test_Risk",
          "label": "Test"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.title",
        "label": "primary.title"
      }
    },
    "input_source": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Source",
      "options": {
        "token": "source",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        },{
          "value": "AdHoc Risk Score",
          "label": "AdHoc Risk Modifiers"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.title",
        "label": "primary.title"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_source"
      }
    },
    "input_risk_object_type_raw": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Risk Object Type",
      "options": {
        "token": "risk_object_type_raw",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.risk_object_type",
        "label": "primary.risk_object_type"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_risk_object_type"
      }
    },
    "input_risk_object_raw": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Risk Object",
      "options": {
        "token": "risk_object_raw",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-7d@h,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_keyIndicators",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 150
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_risk_modifiers_over_time",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 450,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 300
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_risk_score_by_annotations",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 450,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 300
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_risk_modifiers_by_threat_object",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 750,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 300
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_risk_score_by_object",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 150,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 300
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_most_active_sources",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 150,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 300
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_risk_modifiers_by_annotations",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 750,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 300
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_index",
      "input_source",
      "input_risk_object_type_raw",
      "input_risk_object_raw",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Risk Analysis"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable": false
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

result.label: SAML Troubleshooting Dashboard
result.title: saml_troubleshooting_dashboard
result.description: Dashboard to help troubleshoot SAML setup issues with Splunk Secure Gateway
result.eai:data:
Dashboard to help troubleshoot SAML setup issues with Splunk Secure Gateway | rest services/ssg/registration/test_jwt dashboard_format=true -24h@h now | makeresults | eval x = "Test JWT Integration" | fields x -24h@h now Are JWT Tokens Enabled |rest services/ssg/registration/tokens_enabled dashboard_format=true | fields tokens_enabled | eval are_tokens_enabled=if( tokens_enabled="1","Yes","No" ) | eval range=if(are_tokens_enabled="Yes", "low", "severe") | table are_tokens_enabled, range -15m now JWT Token Test | fields JWT | eval result=if(isnull(JWT), "Failed", "Success") | eval range=if(result="Success", "low", "severe") | table result, range Token Expiry | rest services/ssg/registration/test_jwt dashboard_format=true | fields token_expiration | eval result=if(isnull(token_expiration), "Error Occured", token_expiration) | eval range=if(result="Error Occured", "severe", "low") | table result, range -24h@h now Error Type | fields error_type, message | eval is_error = if(isnull(error_type), "false", "true") | eval msg = if(is_error=="true", error_type, "No Error") | eval range=if(msg="No Error", "low", "severe") | table msg, range, is_error Error Message | fields error_type, message | eval is_error = if(isnull(message), "false", "true") | eval msg = if(is_error=="true", message, "No Error") | table msg
| makeresults | eval x = "Validate SAML Configuration" | fields x -24h@h now SAML Setup Checks |rest services/ssg/registration/correct_saml_setup dashboard_format=true | fields attributeQueryRequestSigned, attributeQueryResponseSigned, attributeQuerySoapUsername, idpAttributeQueryUrl, scriptPath, scriptTimeout, getUserInfoTtl, useAuthExtForTokenAuthOnly,scriptFunctions, scriptSecureArguments, SAML | eval attributeQueryRequestSigned=if(attributeQueryRequestSigned=0, "false", "true") | eval attributeQueryResponseSigned=if(attributeQueryResponseSigned=0, "false", "true") | eval attributeQuerySoapUsername=if(attributeQuerySoapUsername=0, "false", "true") | eval idpAttributeQueryUrl=if(idpAttributeQueryUrl=0, "false", "true") | eval scriptPath=if(scriptPath=0, "false", "true") | eval scriptTimeout=if(scriptTimeout=0, "false", "true") | eval getUserInfoTtl=if(getUserInfoTtl=0, "false", "true") | eval useAuthExtForTokenAuthOnly=if(useAuthExtForTokenAuthOnly=0, "false", "true") | eval scriptFunctions=if(scriptFunctions=0, "false", "true") | eval scriptSecureArguments=if(scriptSecureArguments=0, "false", "true") | eval SAML=if(SAML=0, "false", "true") -24h@h now
| makeresults | eval x = "SAML Error Logs" | fields x -24h@h now SAML Provider Errors index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd ERROR AuthenticationProviderSAML -24h@h now User Management Errors index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd ERROR UserManagerPro -24h@h now

result.label: Scheduled export is now available for Dashboard Studio
result.title: scheduled_export_dashboard
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" theme="light">
    <label>Scheduled export is now available for Dashboard Studio</label>
    <description></description>
    <definition><![CDATA[
{
	"visualizations": {
		"viz_PEnzuC6O": {
			"type": "splunk.markdown",
			"options": {
				"markdown": "# **Classic dashboards with schedules that you may want to convert to Dashboard Studio**",
				"fontFamily": "Splunk Data Sans",
				"fontSize": "large"
			}
		},
		"viz_xahk2LxS": {
			"type": "splunk.markdown",
			"options": {
				"markdown": "You can convert from Classic to Dashboard Studio with the **Clone in Dashboard Studio** action.\n\nThe conversion process makes a clone of your Classic dashboard and converts the clone, leaving your original dashboard untouched.",
				"fontSize": "large",
				"fontFamily": "Splunk Data Sans"
			}
		},
		"viz_bM8KCb0y": {
			"type": "splunk.table",
			"options": {
				"backgroundColor": "transparent",
				"tableFormat": {
					"rowBackgroundColors": "> table | seriesByIndex(0) | pick(tableAltRowBackgroundColorsByBackgroundColor)",
					"headerBackgroundColor": "> backgroundColor | setColorChannel(tableHeaderBackgroundColorConfig)",
					"rowColors": "> rowBackgroundColors | maxContrast(tableRowColorMaxContrast)",
					"headerColor": "> headerBackgroundColor | maxContrast(tableRowColorMaxContrast)"
				},
				"showInternalFields": false
			},
			"dataSources": {
				"primary": "ds_YwMNtT5r"
			},
			"eventHandlers": [
				{
					"type": "drilldown.customUrl",
					"options": {
						"url": "/app/$row.App.value$/$row.Title.value$",
						"newTab": true
					}
				}
			]
		},
		"viz_AJ3zmcH5": {
			"type": "splunk.markdown",
			"options": {
				"markdown": "Upon conversion, you can see a summary of how many configurations were successfully converted. \n\nThen, you can select **View conversion report** for  more details about what did not convert.",
				"fontSize": "large",
				"fontFamily": "Splunk Data Sans"
			}
		},
		"viz_2EzncWf1": {
			"type": "splunk.markdown",
			"options": {
				"markdown": "The conversion report gives you specific details about the configurations that did not convert. In this example, the \"min value\" for horseshoe meter and the Calendar heat map visualization did not convert. ",
				"fontSize": "large",
				"fontFamily": "Splunk Data Sans"
			}
		},
		"viz_8F1OzLSQ": {
			"type": "splunk.markdown",
			"options": {
				"markdown": "To reopen the conversion report later, select the conversion report icon in the toolbar. ",
				"fontSize": "large",
				"fontFamily": "Splunk Data Sans"
			}
		},
		"viz_MJsFPrKe": {
			"type": "splunk.image",
			"options": {
				"preserveAspectRatio": true,
				"src": "/static/app/search/ootb_dashboard_images/scheduled_export_dashboard/img_step1_clone.png"
			}
		},
		"viz_RSvTUOja": {
			"type": "splunk.image",

				"preserveAspectRatio": true,
				"src": "/static/app/search/ootb_dashboard_images/scheduled_export_dashboard/img_step2_conversion.png"
			}
		},
		"viz_WbJd8SDE": {
			"type": "splunk.markdown",
			"options": {
				"markdown": "# **How to clone a Classic dashboard in Dashboard Studio**",
				"fontFamily": "Splunk Data Sans",
				"fontSize": "custom",
				"customFontSize": 16
			}
		},
		"viz_iaOSkDcp": {
			"type": "splunk.markdown",
			"options": {
				"markdown": "# **Additional resources**",
				"fontFamily": "Splunk Data Sans",
				"fontSize": "custom",
				"customFontSize": 18
			}
		},
		"viz_oJRe4b3S": {
			"type": "splunk.markdown",
			"options": {
				"markdown": "* [Convert a Simple XML dashboard to a Dashboard Studio dashboard](https://docs.splunk.com/Documentation/Splunk/9.1.2/DashStudio/Convert)\n* [Splunk Dashboard Studio Example Hub](https://docs.splunk.com/Documentation/Splunk/9.1.2/DashStudio/ExHub)",
				"fontSize": "extraLarge",

		"viz_PDaQOM1v": {
			"type": "splunk.markdown",

				"fontSize": "extraLarge",

		"viz_hxZuIDZx": {

			}
		},
		"viz_c3aTfPcq": {

		},
		"viz_7NYiaDEI": {
			"type": "splunk.markdown",

				"fontColor": "#ffffff",

			}
		},
		"viz_NBNx6H5U": {
			"type": "splunk.markdown",
			"options": {
				"markdown": "**4**",
				"fontSize": "custom",
				"customFontSize": 32,

Snapshots Scheduler Status by Instance ($total_instance_count$) | rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head splunk_server_group="$group$" /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches preserve_args_case=t noProxy=t search="is_scheduled=1" search="disabled=0" | stats count by splunk_server | join splunk_server type=outer [ | rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head splunk_server_group="$group$" /services/server/status/limits/search-concurrency | fields splunk_server max_hist_scheduled_searches, max_rt_scheduled_searches] | join splunk_server type=outer [ | rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head splunk_server_group="$group$" /services/server/status/resource-usage/splunk-processes | search search_props.role="head" `dmc_match_all_scheduled_search_types` | dedup search_props.sid | stats count(eval('search_props.mode'=="historical batch" OR 'search_props.mode'=="historical")) as count_hist_search, count(eval('search_props.mode'=="RT" OR 'search_props.mode'=="RT indexed")) as count_rt_search by splunk_server ] | join splunk_server type=outer [ | rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head splunk_server_group="$group$" /services/server/info | fields splunk_server, numberOfCores, numberOfVirtualCores] | eval count_hist_search = if(isnull(count_hist_search), 0, count_hist_search) | eval count_rt_search = if(isnull(count_rt_search), 0, count_rt_search) | eval hist_concur_vs_limit = count_hist_search." / ".max_hist_scheduled_searches | eval rt_concur_vs_limit = count_rt_search." / ".max_rt_scheduled_searches | `dmc_get_core_info` | fields splunk_server, core_info, hist_concur_vs_limit, rt_concur_vs_limit, count | rename splunk_server as Instance, core_info AS "CPU Cores (Physical / Virtual)", hist_concur_vs_limit as "Concurrency of Historical Scheduled Report (Running/Limit)", rt_concur_vs_limit as "Concurrency of Real-time Scheduled Report (Running/Limit)", count as "Unique Scheduled Reports" $job.resultCount$ scheduler_activity_instance?form.splunk_server=$row.Instance$

$scheduler_execution_metric$ | rename total as Total, min_count as Minimum, avg_count as Average, median_count as Median, max_count as Maximum $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Concurrency of Scheduled Reports by Instance false Average Median Minimum Maximum 90th Percentile Sampled Median `dmc_set_index_introspection` search_group=dmc_group_search_head search_group="$group$" | stats dc(sid) AS distinct_search_count by _time, host | `dmc_timechart` partial=f limit=20 $agg_report_concurrency_by_instance$(distinct_search_count) AS agg_distinct_search_count by host | eval agg_distinct_search_count = round(agg_distinct_search_count, 0) | rename agg_distinct_search_count as "Concurrent Report Count" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Concurrency of Scheduled Reports Across All Instances false Min, Average, Median, Max min(count), as min_count, avg(count) as avg_count, median(count) as median_count, max(count) as max_count `dmc_set_index_introspection` search_group=dmc_group_search_head search_group="$group$" sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage component=PerProcess data.search_props.role="head" data.search_props.sid::* `dmc_match_all_scheduled_search_types` | `dmc_set_bin` | `dmc_rename_introspection_fields` | stats dc(sid) AS distinct_search_count by _time, host | stats sum(distinct_search_count) as count by _time | `dmc_timechart` partial=f $agg_report_concurrency_all_instance$ | rename min_count as Minimum, avg_count as Average, median_count as Median, max_count as Maximum $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Skip Ratio by Instance `dmc_set_index_internal` search_group=dmc_group_search_head search_group="$group$" sourcetype=scheduler (status="completed" OR status="skipped" OR status="deferred") | stats count(eval(status=="completed" OR status=="skipped")) AS total_exec, count(eval(status=="skipped")) AS skipped_exec by _time, host, app, savedsearch_name, user, savedsearch_id | `dmc_timechart` partial=f limit=20 eval(round(sum(skipped_exec) / sum(total_exec) * 100, 2)) as skip_ratio by host | rename skip_ratio as "Skip Ratio" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Skip Ratio Across All Instances `dmc_set_index_internal` search_group=dmc_group_search_head search_group="$group$" sourcetype=scheduler (status="completed" OR status="skipped" OR status="deferred") | stats sum(total_exec) * 100, 2)) as skip_ratio | rename skip_ratio as "Skip Ratio" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Average Execution Latency by $exec_lat_split_by_label$ false Instance User App host $label$ `dmc_set_index_internal` search_group=dmc_group_search_head search_group="$group$" sourcetype=scheduler status="completed" | eval window_time = if(isnotnull(window_time), window_time, 0) | eval execution_latency = max(dispatch_time - (scheduled_time + window_time), 0) | timechart partial=f limit=20 eval(round(avg(execution_latency), 0)) as latency by $exec_lat_split_by$ $time.earliest$ Select views: All Status Activity Performance

Hardware Information | rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ /services/server/info | eval core_info = if(isnull(numberOfCores), "N/A", numberOfCores)."/".if(isnull(numberOfVirtualCores), "N/A", numberOfVirtualCores) | fields core_info Concurrency of Scheduled Reports (Running/Limit) | rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ /services/server/status/resource-usage/splunk-processes | dedup search_props.sid | search `dmc_match_all_scheduled_search_types` stats count(eval('search_props.mode'=="historical batch" OR 'search_props.mode'=="historical")) as count_hist_scheduled_search, count(eval('search_props.mode'=="RT" OR 'search_props.mode'=="RT indexed")) as count_rt_scheduled_search by splunk_server if(isnotnull('result.count_hist_scheduled_search'), 'result.count_hist_scheduled_search', 0) if(isnotnull('result.count_rt_scheduled_search'), 'result.count_rt_scheduled_search', 0) | rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ /services/server/status/limits/search-concurrency | fields max_hist_scheduled_searches, max_rt_scheduled_searches $result.max_hist_scheduled_searches$ $result.max_rt_scheduled_searches$ eval scheduled_vs_total_hist_search_limit = "$count_hist_scheduled_search$"."/".max_hist_scheduled_searches | fields scheduled_vs_total_hist_search_limit true eval scheduled_vs_total_rt_search_limit = "$count_rt_scheduled_search$"."/".max_rt_scheduled_searches | fields scheduled_vs_total_rt_search_limit true Running Historical Scheduled Reports where 'search_props.mode'=="historical batch" OR 'search_props.mode'=="historical" | fields search_props.name, search_props.app, search_props.user, search_props.type, search_props.mode, search_props.role, mem_used, pct_cpu, elapsed, search_props.sid | eval mem_used = round(mem_used, 0) | eval pct_cpu = round(pct_cpu, 0) | eval elapsed = round(elapsed, 0) | rename search_props.name as "Scheduled Report Name", search_props.app as App, search_props.user as User, search_props.type as Type, search_props.mode as Mode, search_props.role as Role, mem_used as "Memory Used (MB)", pct_cpu as "CPU Usage (%)", elapsed as "Time Spent (sec)", search_props.sid as "SID"
Close this panel Running Real-time Scheduled Reports where 'search_props.mode'=="RT" OR 'search_props.mode'=="RT indexed" | fields search_props.name, search_props.app, search_props.user, search_props.type, search_props.mode, search_props.role, mem_used, pct_cpu, elapsed, search_props.sid | eval mem_used = round(mem_used, 0) | eval pct_cpu = round(pct_cpu, 0) | eval elapsed = round(elapsed, 0) | rename search_props.name as "Scheduled Report Name", search_props.app as App, search_props.user as User, search_props.type as Type, search_props.mode as Mode, search_props.role as Role, mem_used as "Memory Used (MB)", pct_cpu as "CPU Usage (%)", elapsed as "Time Spent (sec)", search_props.sid as "SID"
Close this panel Unique Scheduled Reports stats count true Count of Reports Scheduled | rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ "/servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches/" earliest_time=`time_modifier(-0s@s)` latest_time=`time_modifier(+8d@d)` search="is_scheduled=1" search="disabled=0" | table scheduled_times | eval scheduled_times_count = mvcount(scheduled_times) | stats sum(scheduled_times_count) as count | eval count = `dmc_convert_count_unit(count)` Skip Ratio (Last Hour) `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ sourcetype=scheduler (status="completed" OR status="skipped" OR status="deferred") | eval window_time = if(isnotnull(window_time), window_time, 0) | eval execution_latency = max(dispatch_time - (scheduled_time + window_time), 0) | timechart span=1h partial=f avg(execution_latency) AS avg_exec_latency, count(eval(status=="completed" OR status=="skipped")) AS total_exec, count(eval(status=="skipped")) AS skipped_exec | eval skip_ratio = round(skipped_exec / total_exec * 100, 2) | eval avg_exec_latency = round(avg_exec_latency, 2) -24h@m now fields _time, skip_ratio Average Execution Latency (Last Hour) fields _time, avg_exec_latency

Skip Ratio and Execution Latency: The single values show data in the past full hour. Trends compare to 1 hour before that. Sparklines show data over past 24 hours.

 Inventory of Scheduled Reports ($scheduled_search_count$) | rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ "/servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches/" search="is_scheduled=1" search="disabled=0" | fields title, eai:acl.app, eai:acl.owner, cron_schedule, dispatch.earliest_time, dispatch.latest_time, schedule_window, actions $job.resultCount$ false ALL true stats count by eai:acl.app eai:acl.app eai:acl.app search eai:acl.app=" " false ALL true stats count by eai:acl.owner eai:acl.owner eai:acl.owner search eai:acl.owner=" " $inventory_app_filter$ | $inventory_user_filter$ | eval dispatch.earliest_time = if(isnull('dispatch.earliest_time') OR 'dispatch.earliest_time' == "0" OR 'dispatch.earliest_time'=="", "not set", 'dispatch.earliest_time') | eval dispatch.latest_time = if(isnull('dispatch.latest_time') OR 'dispatch.latest_time' == "", "not set", 'dispatch.latest_time') | eval actions = if(isnull(actions) OR actions == "", "none", actions) | rename title as "Report Name", eai:acl.app as App, eai:acl.owner as User, cron_schedule as "Cron Schedule", dispatch.earliest_time as "Earliest Time", dispatch.latest_time as "Latest Time", schedule_window as "Schedule Window (minutes)", actions as Actions

search_mode $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Aggregate Scheduled Search Runtime false app App User Mode Role Report Name Type Workload Pool true `dmc_set_index_introspection` host=$host$ sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage component=PerProcess data.search_props.sid::* data.search_props.role="head" `dmc_match_all_scheduled_search_types` | `dmc_set_bin` | `dmc_rename_introspection_fields` | stats max(elapsed) as ELAPSED by sid $runtimeSplitBy$ _time | streamstats current=t global=f window=2 earliest(ELAPSED) as prev_ELAPSED latest(ELAPSED) as curr_ELAPSED by sid $runtimeSplitBy$ | eval `dmc_collection_interval` | eval delta_ELAPSED = curr_ELAPSED - prev_ELAPSED | eval runtime = if(delta_ELAPSED = 0, min(curr_ELAPSED, collection_interval), delta_ELAPSED) | `dmc_timechart` sum(runtime) by $runtimeSplitBy$ $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

Mode can be historical, historical batch, RT, or RT indexed.

(scheduled_time + window_time), 0) | stats avg(run_time) as runtime, avg(execution_latency) AS avg_exec_latency, count(eval(status=="completed" OR status=="skipped")) AS total_exec, count(eval(status=="skipped")) AS skipped_exec count(eval(status=="deferred")) AS deferred_exec by app, savedsearch_name, user, savedsearch_id | join savedsearch_id type=outer [ | rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ "/servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches/" earliest_time=`time_modifier(-0s@s)` latest_time=`time_modifier(+8d@d)` search="is_scheduled=1" search="disabled=0" | search NOT (dispatch.earliest_time=rt* OR dispatch.latest_time=rt*) | stats dc(scheduled_times) as count max(scheduled_times) as max_t min(scheduled_times) as min_t by title, eai:acl.app, eai:acl.owner cron_schedule | eval schedule_interval=round((max_t-min_t)/(count-1), 0) | eval savedsearch_id = 'eai:acl.owner'.";".'eai:acl.app'.";".title | fields savedsearch_id, cron_schedule, schedule_interval ] | eval runtime = round(runtime, 0) | eval avg_exec_latency = round(avg_exec_latency, 0) | eval search_workload = round(runtime / schedule_interval * 100, 2)." %" | eval skip_ratio = round(skipped_exec / total_exec * 100, 2)." %" | fields savedsearch_name, app, user, cron_schedule, schedule_interval, runtime, search_workload, total_exec, skipped_exec, skip_ratio, deferred_exec, avg_exec_latency | sort - search_workload | rename savedsearch_name as "Report Name", app as App, user as User, cron_schedule as "Cron Schedule", runtime as "Average Runtime (sec)", total_exec as "Total Executions", skip_ratio as "Skip Ratio", skipped_exec as "Skipped Executions", deferred_exec AS "Deferred Executions", schedule_interval as "Schedule Interval (sec)", search_workload as "Interval Load Factor", avg_exec_latency AS "Average Execution Latency (sec)" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ $row.Report Name$

Interval Load Factor = Average Runtime / Schedule Interval * 100

 Runtime Statistics Drilldown: $runtime_statistics_drilldown$ `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ sourcetype=scheduler (status="completed" OR status="skipped" OR status="deferred") savedsearch_name=$runtime_statistics_drilldown|s$ $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Close this panel Execution Latency Over Time false Report Name Alert Actions App User app false avg Average Minimum Maximum `dmc_set_index_internal` host=$host$ sourcetype=scheduler status="completed" | eval alert_actions = if(isnull(alert_actions) OR alert_actions == "", "none", alert_actions) | eval window_time = if(isnotnull(window_time), window_time, 0) | eval execution_latency = max(dispatch_time - (scheduled_time + window_time), 0) | timechart eval(round($exe_lag_agg$(execution_latency), 0)) as latency by $exe_lag_split_by$ $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

Execution Latency = Dispatch Time - (Scheduled Time + Schedule Window Time)

The execution latency expresses the delay in seconds between the planned dispatch time of a search and its actual dispatch time. It takes into account a schedule window if one is configured for this search. Learn More

(".count.")" | stats values(reason_and_count) AS reasons first(alert_actions) AS alert_actions by savedsearch_name | rename reasons AS "Skip Reason (Skip Count)" alert_actions AS "Alert Actions" savedsearch_name AS "Report Name" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$
