result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_keyIndicators": {
      "type": "custom.keyIndicators",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {},
      "eventHandlers": [],
      "options": {
        "groupName": "threat_activity"
      }
    },
    "viz_threat_activity_over_time": {
      "type": "splunk.line",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_threat_activity_over_time"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Threat_Intelligence\".\"Threat_Activity\" | search",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            },
            "autopause": "$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "searchKey": "threat_collection"
          },
          "handlerName": "searchDrilldownHandler",
          "events": [
            "point.click",
            "legend.click"
          ],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "line"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
          "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
          "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
          "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
          "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
          "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
          "xAxisTitleText": "time",
          "yAxisTitleText": "count",
          "nullValueDisplay": "zero",
          "markerDisplay": "off"
      },
      "title": "Threat Activity Over Time"
    },
    "viz_most_active_threat_collection": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_most_active_threat_collection"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.threat_collection.value",
              "key": "row.threat_collection.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Threat_Intelligence\".\"Threat_Activity\" | search threat_collection=\"$payload:row.threat_collection.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "sparkline": {
            "width": 95
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Most Active Threat Collections"
    },
    "viz_most_active_threat_source": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_most_active_threat_source"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.threat_key.value",
              "key": "row.threat_key.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Threat_Intelligence\".\"Threat_Activity\" | search threat_key=\"$payload:row.threat_key.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {},
      "title": "Most Active Threat Sources"
    },
    "viz_threat_activity_details_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### Threat Activity Details"
      }
    },
    "viz_threat_activity_details": {
      "type": "custom.perPanelFilter",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_threat_activity_details"
      },
      "options": {
        "selectedRows": "$PPF:selected_rows$"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.threat_match_field.value",
              "key": "row.threat_match_field.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.threat_match_value.value",
              "key": "row.threat_match_value.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Threat_Intelligence\".\"Threat_Activity\" | search threat_match_field=\"$payload:row.threat_match_field.value|u$\" threat_match_value=\"$payload:row.threat_match_value.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "title": "Threat Activity Details"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_threat_group_form": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Threat group form",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `threat_groups`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_threat_category_form": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Threat category form",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `threat_categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_threat_activity_over_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Threat activity over time",
      "options": {
        "data": {},
        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Threat_Intelligence.Threat_Activity where * $ds_input_tokens:result.search_token$=$ds_input_tokens:result.search_value|s$ $ds_input_tokens:result.threat_group_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.threat_category_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.ppf$ by _time,Threat_Activity.threat_collection span=10m | timechart count by Threat_Activity.threat_collection | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Threat_Activity\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_most_active_threat_collection": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Most active threat collection",
      "options": {
        "data": {},
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` values(source) as search,values(Threat_Activity.threat_collection_key) as threat_collection_key,count from datamodel=Threat_Intelligence.Threat_Activity where * $ds_input_tokens:result.search_token$=$ds_input_tokens:result.search_value|s$ $ds_input_tokens:result.threat_group_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.threat_category_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.ppf$ by _time,Threat_Activity.threat_collection span=1h | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Threat_Activity\")` | stats values(search) as search,sparkline(sum(count),1h) as sparkline,dc(threat_collection_key) as dc(artifacts),sum(count) as count by threat_collection | rex max_match=10 field=search \"Threat\\s*-\\s*(?<friendly_search>.*)(?:\\s*-\\s*Threat\\s+Gen)\" | rename friendly_search as search | sort - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_most_active_threat_source": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Most active threat source",
      "options": {
        "data": {},
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Threat_Intelligence.Threat_Activity where * $ds_input_tokens:result.search_token$=$ds_input_tokens:result.search_value|s$ $ds_input_tokens:result.threat_group_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.threat_category_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.ppf$ by Threat_Activity.threat_key | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Threat_Activity\")` | `get_threat_attribution(\"threat_key\")` | stats sum(count) as count by threat_key,source_id,source_path,source_type | sort 100 - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_threat_activity_details": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Threat activity details",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` latest(_time) as _time,values(Threat_Activity.orig_sourcetype) as sourcetype,values(Threat_Activity.src) as src,values(Threat_Activity.dest) as dest from datamodel=Threat_Intelligence.Threat_Activity where * $ds_input_tokens:result.search_token$=$ds_input_tokens:result.search_value|s$ $ds_input_tokens:result.threat_group_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.threat_category_dm$ by Threat_Activity.threat_collection,Threat_Activity.threat_match_field,Threat_Activity.threat_match_value,Threat_Activity.threat_key | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Threat_Activity\")` | `get_threat_attribution(\"threat_key\")` | `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_threat_activity\",\"threat_match_field,threat_match_value\")` | rename ppf_cell as \"Per-panel Filter\" | sort - ppf_filter,_time | table \"Per-panel Filter\",_time,threat_match_field,threat_match_value,sourcetype,src,dest,threat_collection,threat_group,threat_category"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval threat_group_dm=if($threat_group_form|s$==\"*\" OR $threat_group_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"[| `filter_by_threat_group(\\\"Threat_Activity.threat_key\\\",\\\"$threat_group_form$\\\")`]\")\n| eval threat_category_dm=if($threat_category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $threat_category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"[| `filter_by_threat_category(\\\"Threat_Activity.threat_key\\\",\\\"$threat_category_form$\\\")`]\")\n| eval search_token=if($search_token|s$==\"\", \" \", \"$search_token$\")\n| eval search_value=$search_value|s$\n| rex field=search_value mode=sed \"s/^(.{150}).*/\\1*/\" | appendcols [| `ppf_subsearch_dm(\"ppf_threat_activity\",\"threat_match_field,threat_match_value\",now(),\"Threat_Activity\")` | rename search as ppfresult]\n| eval ppf=\"NOT \".ppfresult\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "tokens": {
      "PPF": {
        "selected_rows": {
          "value": "{}"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      },
      "title": "Time Range"
    },
    "input_threat_group_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Threat Group",
      "options": {
        "token": "threat_group_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.threat_group",
        "label": "primary.threat_group"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_threat_group_form"
      }
    },
    "input_threat_category_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Threat Category",
      "options": {
        "token": "threat_category_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.threat_category",
        "label": "primary.threat_category"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_threat_category_form"
      }
    },
    "input_search_token": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Search",
      "options": {
        "token": "search_token",
        "defaultValue": "Threat_Activity.threat_match_value",

result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">

<!-- On initial load, 2 dashboards will load
      One is outer-dashboard with inputs mentioned in <definition> tag
      Other is inner-dashboard which would be inside tablayout mentioned in <tabdefinition> tag
 -->

<!-- A. Definition JSON containing global inputs -->
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {},
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_threat_category": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "threat_category",
      "options": {
        "query": "|`threat_categories` | mvexpand threat_category | dedup threat_category | sort + threat_category\n| head \"$threat_artifact$\"==\"threats\""
      }
    },
    "ds_threat_group": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "threat_group",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `threat_groups` | mvexpand threat_group | dedup threat_group | sort + threat_group\n| head \"$threat_artifact$\"==\"threats\""
      }
    },
    "ds_threat_text": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "threat_text",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| head \"$threat_artifact$\"==\"threats\""
      }
    },
    "ds_network_text": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "network_text",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| head \"$threat_artifact$\"==\"network\""
      }
    },
    "ds_file_text": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "file_text",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| head \"$threat_artifact$\"==\"file\""
      }
    },
    "ds_certificate_text": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "certificate_text",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| head \"$threat_artifact$\"==\"certificate\""
      }
    },
    "ds_email_text": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "email_text",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| head \"$threat_artifact$\"==\"email\""
      }
    },
    "ds_registry_text": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "registry_text",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| head \"$threat_artifact$\"==\"registry\""
      }
    },
    "ds_service_text": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "service_text",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| head \"$threat_artifact$\"==\"service\""
      }
    },
    "ds_user_text": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "user_text",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| head \"$threat_artifact$\"==\"user\""
      }
    },
    "ds_process_text": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "process_text",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| head \"$threat_artifact$\"==\"process\""
      }
    },
    "ds_http_type": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Http Type",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=6\n| streamstats count\n| eval http_type_label=case(count=1, \"Referer\", count=2, \"Cookie\", count=3, \"Header\", count=4, \"Data\", count=5, \"URL\", count=6, \"User Agent\" )\n| eval http_type=case(count=1, \"http_referer\", count=2, \"http_cookie\", count=3, \"http_header\", count=4, \"http_data\", count=5, \"http_url\", count=6, \"http_user_agent\" )\n| fields http_type_label,http_type\n| head \"$threat_artifact$\"==\"network\""
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "earliest": "-1s",
            "latest": "now"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_threat_artifact": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Threat Artifact",
      "options": {
        "token": "threat_artifact",
        "defaultValue": "threats",
        "items": [{
          "label": "Threat ID",
          "value": "threats"
        },{
          "label": "Network",
          "value": "network"
        },{
          "label": "File",
          "value": "file"
        },{
          "label": "Registry",
          "value": "registry"
        },{
          "label": "Service",
          "value": "service"
        },{
          "label": "User",
          "value": "user"
        },{
          "label": "Process",
          "value": "process"
        },{
          "label": "Certificate",
          "value": "certificate"
        },{
          "label": "Email",
          "value": "email"
        }]
      }
    },
    "input_threat_category": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Threat Category",
      "options": {
        "token": "threat_category",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "label": "All",
          "value": "*"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.threat_category",
        "label": "primary.threat_category"
      },
      "dataSources": {

      },
      "hideWhenNoData": true

<tabbeddefinition value="Threat Overview"><![CDATA[{

    },
    "viz_endpoint_artifacts": {

\"$user_description$\",\"description=\")`\n| eval user_filter=rtrim(user_name.user_full_name.user_group_name.user_description, \" AND \")\n\n| eval process=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$process$\",\"process=\")`\n| eval process_arguments=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$process_arguments$\",\"process_arguments=\")`\n| eval handle_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$handle_name$\",\"process_handle_name=\")`\n| eval handle_type=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$handle_type$\",\"process_handle_type=\")`\n| eval process_filter=rtrim(process.process_arguments.handle_name.handle_type, \" AND \")\n\n| eval certificate_serial_number=if($threat_artifact|s$==\"certificate\" AND \"$certificate_serial_number$\"!=\"*\" AND \"$certificate_serial_number$\"!=\"\", \"(certificate_serial=\\\"$certificate_serial_number$\\\" OR certificate_serial_clean=\\\"$certificate_serial_number$\\\" OR certificate_serial_dec=\\\"$certificate_serial_number$\\\") AND \", \"\")\n| eval certificate_subject=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_subject$\",\"certificate_subject=\")`\n| eval certificate_issuer=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_issuer$\",\"certificate_issuer=\")`\n| eval certificate_valid_not_after=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_valid_not_after$\",\"certificate_end_time=\")`\n| eval certificate_valid_not_before=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_valid_not_before$\",\"certificate_start_time=\")`\n| eval certificate_filter=rtrim(certificate_serial_number.certificate_subject.certificate_issuer.certificate_valid_not_after.certificate_valid_not_before, \" AND \")\n\n| eval email_address=if($threat_artifact|s$==\"email\" AND \"$email_address$\"!=\"*\" AND \"$email_address$\"!=\"\", \"(src_user=\\\"$email_address$\\\" OR actual_src_user=\\\"$email_address$\\\" OR recipient=\\\"$email_address$\\\" OR actual_recipient=\\\"$email_address$\\\") AND \", \"\")\n| eval email_subject=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"email\", \"$email_subject$\",\"subject=\")`\n| eval email_body=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"email\", \"$email_body$\",\"body=\")`\n| eval email_filter=rtrim(email_address.email_subject.email_body, \" AND \")\n\n| eval max=if(threat_id_filter.network_filter.file_filter.registry_filter.service_filter.user_filter.process_filter.certificate_filter.email_filter=\"\", \"max=`threat_artifacts_max`\", \"\")\n\n| fields threat_id_filter,network_filter,file_filter,registry_filter, service_filter, user_filter, process_filter, certificate_filter, email_filter, max, httptype, httpname\n",

      }
    },
    "ds_ip_intelligence": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "IP Intelligence",
      "options": {
        "query": "| inputlookup append=T email_intel $ds_input_tokens:result.max$ where * $ds_input_tokens:result.network_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.file_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.registry_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.service_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.process_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.certificate_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.email_filter$ | `set_threat_collection_name(\"email_intel\")` | inputlookup append=T certificate_intel $ds_input_tokens:result.max$ where * $ds_input_tokens:result.network_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.file_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.registry_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.service_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.process_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.certificate_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.email_filter$ | `set_threat_collection_name(\"certificate_intel\")` | fillnull value=\"\" certificate_serial | mvexpand certificate_serial | `get_certificate_serial` | eventstats values(certificate_serial) as certificate_serial,values(certificate_serial_clean) as certificate_serial_clean,values(certificate_serial_dec) as certificate_serial_dec by _key | dedup _key,threat_collection | inputlookup append=T http_intel $ds_input_tokens:result.max$ where * $ds_input_tokens:result.network_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.file_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.registry_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.service_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.process_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.certificate_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.email_filter$ | `set_threat_collection_name(\"http_intel\")` | inputlookup append=T ip_intel $ds_input_tokens:result.max$ where * $ds_input_tokens:result.network_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.file_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.registry_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.service_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.user_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.process_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.certificate_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.email_filter$ | fillnull value=0 updated,disabled | `set_threat_collection_name(\"ip_intel\")` | `get_threat_attribution(threat_key)` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.threat_id_filter$ | eval ip=coalesce(embedded_ip,ip), domain=coalesce(embedded_domain,domain), file_hash=coalesce(certificate_file_hash,file_hash), src_user=coalesce(certificate_subject_email,src_user), actual_src_user=coalesce(certificate_issuer_email,actual_src_user) | where isnotnull(ip) | fillnull value=\"\" threat_group, threat_category, malware_alias, source_id, source_path | stats values(domain) as domain, values(threat_collection) as threat_collection, values(organization_id) as organization_id, values(organization_name) as organization_name, values(address) as address, values(city) as city, values(state_prov) as state_prov, values(postal_code) as postal_code, values(country) as country, values(threat_group) as threat_group, values(threat_category) as threat_category, values(source_id) as source_id by ip | iplocation ip | eval city=case(isnotnull(city),city,isnotnull(City),City,1=1,null()), country=case(isnotnull(country),country,isnotnull(Country),Country,1=1,null()) | rename Region as region | fields - City,Country | sort + ip"
      }
    },

http_intel $ds_input_tokens:result.max$ where * $ds_input_tokens:result.network_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.file_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.registry_filter$ `set_threat_collection_name(\"http_intel\")` | inputlookup append=T ip_intel $ds_input_tokens:result.max$ where * $ds_input_tokens:result.network_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.file_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.certificate_filter$ $ds_input_tokens:result.email_filter$ | fillnull value=0 updated,disabled | `set_threat_collection_name(\"ip_intel\")` | `get_threat_attribution(threat_key)` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.threat_id_filter$ | eval ip=coalesce(embedded_ip,ip), domain=coalesce(embedded_domain,domain), file_hash=coalesce(certificate_file_hash,file_hash), src_user=coalesce(certificate_subject_email,src_user), actual_src_user=coalesce(certificate_issuer_email,actual_src_user) | where isnotnull(domain) | fillnull value=\"\" threat_group, threat_category, malware_alias, source_id, source_path | stats values(ip) as ip, values(threat_collection) as threat_collection, values(threat_group) as       "options": {

threat_group=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"threats\", \"$threat_group$\",\"threat_group=\")`\n| eval malware_alias=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"threats\", \"$malware_alias$\",\"malware_alias=\")`\n| eval threat_source_id=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"threats\", \"$threat_source_id$\",\"source_id=\")`\n| eval threat_source_path=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"threats\", \"$threat_source_path$\",\"source_path=\")`\n| eval threat_id_filter=rtrim(threat_category.threat_group.malware_alias.threat_source_id. threat_source_path, \" AND \")\n\n| eval ip=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"network\", \"$ip$\",\"ip=\")`\n| eval domain=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"network\", \"$domain$\",\"domain=\")`\n| eval httptype=\"$http_type$\"\n| eval httpname=case(httptype==\"http_referer\", \"http_referrer\", httptype==\"http_cookie\", \"cookie\", httptype==\"http_header\", \"header\", httptype==\"http_data\", \"data\", httptype==\"http_url\", \"url\", httptype==\"http_user_agent\", \"http_user_agent\")\n| eval http=if(\"$threat_artifact$\"==\"network\" AND \"$http_type$\"!=\"*\" AND \"$http_type$\"!=\"\" AND \"$http_value$\"!=\"*\" AND \"$http_value$\"!=\"\", \"(\".httpname.\"=\\\"$http_value$\\\")\", \"\")\n| eval network_filter=rtrim(ip.domain.http, \" AND \")\n\n| eval file_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"file\", \"$file_name$\",\"file_name=\")`\n| eval file_extension=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"file\", \"$file_extension$\",\"file_extension=\")`\n| eval file_path=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"file\", \"$file_path$\",\"file_path=\")`\n| eval file_hash=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"file\", \"$file_hash$\",\"file_hash=\")`\n| eval file_filter=rtrim(file_name.file_extension.file_path.file_hash, \" AND \")\n\n| eval registry_hive=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", registry_key_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"registry\", \"$registry_key_name$\",\"registry_key_name=\")`\n| eval registry_value_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"registry\", \"$registry_value_name$\",\"registry_value_name=\")`\n| eval registry_value_type=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"registry\", \"$registry_value_type$\",\"registry_value_type=\")`\n| eval registry_filter=rtrim(registry_hive.registry_path.registry_key_name.registry_value_name.registry_value_type.registry_value_text, \" AND \")\n\n| eval service_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"service\", \"$service_name$\",\"service=\")`\n| eval service_descriptive_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"service\", \"$service_descriptive_name$\",\"descriptive_name=\")`\n| eval service_description=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"service\", \"$service_description$\",\"description=\")`\n| eval service_type=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"service\", \"$service_type$\",\"service_type=\")`\n| eval service_filter=rtrim(service_name.service_descriptive_name.service_description.service_type, \" AND \")\n\n| eval user_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"user\", \"$user_name$\",\"user=\")`\n| eval user_full_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"user\", \"$user_full_name$\",\"full_name=\")`\n| eval user_group_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"user\", \"$user_group_name$\",\"group_name=\")`\n| eval user_description=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"user\", \"$user_description$\",\"description=\")`\n| eval user_filter=rtrim(user_name.user_full_name.user_group_name.user_description, \" AND \")\n\n| eval process=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$process$\",\"process=\")`\n| eval process_arguments=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$process_arguments$\",\"process_arguments=\")`\n| eval handle_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$handle_name$\",\"process_handle_name=\")`\n| eval handle_type=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$handle_type$\",\"process_handle_type=\")`\n| eval process_filter=rtrim(process.process_arguments.handle_name.handle_type, \" AND \")\n\n| eval certificate_serial_number=if($threat_artifact|s$==\"certificate\" AND \"$certificate_serial_number$\"!=\"*\" AND \"$certificate_serial_number$\"!=\"\", \"(certificate_serial=\\\"$certificate_serial_number$\\\" OR certificate_serial_clean=\\\"$certificate_serial_number$\\\" OR certificate_serial_dec=\\\"$certificate_serial_number$\\\") AND \", \"\")\n| eval certificate_subject=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_subject$\",\"certificate_subject=\")`\n| eval certificate_issuer=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_issuer$\",\"certificate_issuer=\")`\n| eval certificate_valid_not_after=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_valid_not_after$\",\"certificate_end_time=\")`\n| eval certificate_valid_not_before=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_valid_not_before$\",\"certificate_start_time=\")`\n| eval service_filter=rtrim(service_name.service_descriptive_name.service_description.service_type, \" AND \")\n\n| eval user_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"user\", user_group_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"user\", \"$user_group_name$\",\"group_name=\")`\n| eval user_description=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"user\", \"\")\n| eval certificate_subject=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_subject$\",\"certificate_subject=\")`\n| eval certificate_issuer=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_issuer$\",\"certificate_issuer=\")`\n| eval certificate_valid_not_after=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_valid_not_after$\",\"certificate_end_time=\")`\n| eval certificate_valid_not_before=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_valid_not_before$\",\"certificate_start_time=\")`\n| eval certificate_filter=rtrim(certificate_serial_number.certificate_subject.certificate_issuer.certificate_valid_not_after.certificate_valid_not_before, \" AND \")\n\n| eval \"$process_arguments$\",\"process_arguments=\")`\n| eval handle_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$handle_name$\",\"process_handle_name=\")`\n| eval handle_type=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$handle_type$\",\"process_handle_type=\")`\n| eval process_filter=rtrim(process.process_arguments.handle_name.handle_type, \" AND \")\n\n| eval certificate_serial_number=if($threat_artifact|s$==\"certificate\" AND \"$certificate_serial_number$\"!=\"*\" AND \"$certificate_serial_number$\"!=\"\", \"(certificate_serial=\\\"$certificate_serial_number$\\\" OR certificate_serial_clean=\\\"$certificate_serial_number$\\\" OR certificate_serial_dec=\\\"$certificate_serial_number$\\\") AND \", \"\")\n| eval certificate_subject=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_subject$\",\"certificate_subject=\")`\n| eval certificate_issuer=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_issuer$\",\"certificate_issuer=\")`\n| eval certificate_valid_not_after=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_valid_not_after$\",\"certificate_end_time=\")`\n| eval certificate_valid_not_before=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_valid_not_before$\",\"certificate_start_time=\")`\n| eval certificate_filter=rtrim(certificate_serial_number.certificate_subject.certificate_issuer.certificate_valid_not_after.certificate_valid_not_before, \" AND \")\n\n| eval email_address=if($threat_artifact|s$==\"email\" AND \"$email_address$\"!=\"*\" AND \"$email_address$\"!=\"\", \"(src_user=\\\"$email_address$\\\" OR actual_src_user=\\\"$email_address$\\\" OR recipient=\\\"$email_address$\\\" OR actual_recipient=\\\"$email_address$\\\") AND \", \"\")\n| eval email_subject=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"email\", \"$email_subject$\",\"subject=\")`\n| eval email_body=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"email\", \"$email_body$\",\"body=\")`\n| eval email_filter=rtrim(email_address.email_subject.email_body, \" AND \")\n\n| eval max=if(threat_id_filter.network_filter.file_filter.registry_filter.service_filter.user_filter.process_filter.certificate_filter.email_filter=\"\", \"max=`threat_artifacts_max`\", \"\")\n\n| fields threat_id_filter,network_filter,file_filter,registry_filter, service_filter, user_filter, process_filter, certificate_filter, email_filter, max, httptype, httpname\n",
        "enableSmartSources": true

<tabbeddefinition value="Email"><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_email_intelligence": {
      "type": "splunk.table",

      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval threat_category=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"threats\", \"$threat_category$\",\"threat_category=\")`\n| eval threat_group=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"threats\", \"$threat_group$\",\"threat_group=\")`\n| eval malware_alias=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"threats\", \"$malware_alias$\",\"malware_alias=\")`\n| eval threat_source_id=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"threats\", \"$threat_source_id$\",\"source_id=\")`\n| eval threat_source_path=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"threats\", \"$threat_source_path$\",\"source_path=\")`\n| eval threat_id_filter=rtrim(threat_category.threat_group.malware_alias.threat_source_id. threat_source_path, \" AND \")\n\n| eval ip=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"network\", \"$ip$\",\"ip=\")`\n| eval domain=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"network\", \"$domain$\",\"domain=\")`\n| eval httptype=\"$http_type$\"\n| eval httpname=case(httptype==\"http_referer\", \"http_referrer\", httptype==\"http_cookie\", \"cookie\", httptype==\"http_header\", \"header\", httptype==\"http_data\", \"data\", httptype==\"http_url\", \"url\", httptype==\"http_user_agent\", \"http_user_agent\")\n| eval http=if(\"$threat_artifact$\"==\"network\" AND \"$http_type$\"!=\"*\" AND \"$http_type$\"!=\"\" AND \"$http_value$\"!=\"*\" AND \"$http_value$\"!=\"\", \"(\".httpname.\"=\\\"$http_value$\\\")\", \"\")\n| eval network_filter=rtrim(ip.domain.http, \" AND \")\n\n| eval file_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"file\", \"$file_name$\",\"file_name=\")`\n| eval file_extension=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"file\", \"$file_extension$\",\"file_extension=\")`\n| eval file_path=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"file\", \"$file_path$\",\"file_path=\")`\n| eval file_hash=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"file\", \"$file_hash$\",\"file_hash=\")`\n| eval file_filter=rtrim(file_name.file_extension.file_path.file_hash, \" AND \")\n\n| eval registry_hive=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"registry\", \"$registry_hive$\",\"registry_hive=\")`\n| eval registry_path=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"registry\", \"$registry_path$\",\"registry_path=\")`\n| eval registry_key_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"registry\", \"$registry_key_name$\",\"registry_key_name=\")`\n| eval registry_value_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"registry\", \"$registry_value_name$\",\"registry_value_name=\")`\n| eval registry_value_type=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"registry\", \"$registry_value_type$\",\"registry_value_type=\")`\n| eval registry_value_text=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"registry\", \"$registry_value_text$\",\"registry_value_text=\")`\n| eval registry_filter=rtrim(registry_hive.registry_path.registry_key_name.registry_value_name.registry_value_type.registry_value_text, \" AND \")\n\n| eval service_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"service\", \"$service_name$\",\"service=\")`\n| eval service_descriptive_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"service\", \"$service_descriptive_name$\",\"descriptive_name=\")`\n| eval service_description=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"service\", \"$service_description$\",\"description=\")`\n| eval service_type=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"service\", \"$service_type$\",\"service_type=\")`\n| eval service_filter=rtrim(service_name.service_descriptive_name.service_description.service_type, \" AND \")\n\n| eval user_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"user\", \"$user_name$\",\"user=\")`\n| eval user_full_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"user\", \"$user_full_name$\",\"full_name=\")`\n| eval user_group_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"user\", \"$user_group_name$\",\"group_name=\")`\n| eval user_description=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"user\", \"$user_description$\",\"description=\")`\n| eval user_filter=rtrim(user_name.user_full_name.user_group_name.user_description, \" AND \")\n\n| eval process=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$process$\",\"process=\")`\n| eval process_arguments=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$process_arguments$\",\"process_arguments=\")`\n| eval handle_name=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$handle_name$\",\"process_handle_name=\")`\n| eval handle_type=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"process\", \"$handle_type$\",\"process_handle_type=\")`\n| eval process_filter=rtrim(process.process_arguments.handle_name.handle_type, \" AND \")\n\n| eval certificate_serial_number=if($threat_artifact|s$==\"certificate\" AND \"$certificate_serial_number$\"!=\"*\" AND \"$certificate_serial_number$\"!=\"\", \"(certificate_serial=\\\"$certificate_serial_number$\\\" OR certificate_serial_clean=\\\"$certificate_serial_number$\\\" OR certificate_serial_dec=\\\"$certificate_serial_number$\\\") AND \", \"\")\n| eval certificate_subject=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_subject$\",\"certificate_subject=\")`\n| eval certificate_issuer=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_issuer$\",\"certificate_issuer=\")`\n| eval certificate_valid_not_after=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_valid_not_after$\",\"certificate_end_time=\")`\n| eval certificate_valid_not_before=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"certificate\", \"$certificate_valid_not_before$\",\"certificate_start_time=\")`\n| eval certificate_filter=rtrim(certificate_serial_number.certificate_subject.certificate_issuer.certificate_valid_not_after.certificate_valid_not_before, \" AND \")\n\n| eval email_address=if($threat_artifact|s$==\"email\" AND \"$email_address$\"!=\"*\" AND \"$email_address$\"!=\"\", \"(src_user=\\\"$email_address$\\\" OR actual_src_user=\\\"$email_address$\\\" OR recipient=\\\"$email_address$\\\" OR actual_recipient=\\\"$email_address$\\\") AND \", \"\")\n| eval email_subject=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"email\", \"$email_subject$\",\"subject=\")`\n| eval email_body=`get_threat_artifact_token(\"$threat_artifact$\", \"email\", \"$email_body$\",\"body=\")`\n| eval email_filter=rtrim(email_address.email_subject.email_body, \" AND \")\n\n| eval max=if(threat_id_filter.network_filter.file_filter.registry_filter.service_filter.user_filter.process_filter.certificate_filter.email_filter=\"\", \"max=`threat_artifacts_max`\", \"\")\n\n| fields threat_id_filter,network_filter,file_filter,registry_filter, service_filter, user_filter, process_filter, certificate_filter, email_filter, max, httptype, httpname\n",
        "enableSmartSources": true

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_intelligence_audit_table": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_intelligence_audit_table"
      },
      "title": "Intelligence Downloads",
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName(\"_time\") | formatByType(_timeColumnFormatEditorConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "_timeColumnFormatEditorConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
        {
          "type": "drilldown.setToken",
          "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [
              {
                "token": "click.name",
                "key": "name"
              },
              {
                "token": "click.value",
                "key": "value"
              }
            ]
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=%7C%20rest%20splunk_server%3Dlocal%20count%3D0%20%2Fservices%2Fdata%2Finputs%2Fthreatlist%20%7C%20search%20$ds_input_tokens:result.disabled_raw$%20$ds_input_tokens:result.location$%20%7C%20rename%20title%20as%20stanza%20%7C%20table%20stanza%2Cdisabled%2Ctype%2Cdescription%2Curl%2Cweight%20%7C%20join%20type%3Douter%20stanza%20%5B%7C%20rest%20splunk_server%3Dlocal%20count%3D0%20%2Fservices%2Fadmin%2Finputstatus%2FModularInputs%253Amodular%2520input%2520commands%20%7C%20transpose%20%7C%20rex%20field%3Dcolumn%20%22%5C%28threatlist%3A%5C%2F%5C%2F%28%3F<stanza>%5B%5E%5C%29%5D%2B%29%22%20%7C%20search%20stanza%3D%2A%20%7C%20eval%20_time%3Dstrptime%28%27row%201%27%2C%22%25Y-%25m-%25dT%25H%3A%25M%3A%25S%25z%22%29%20%7C%20eval%20exit_status%3Dif%28column%20LIKE%20%22%25exit%20status%20description%22%2Creplace%28%27row%201%27%2C%22exited%5Cs%2Bwith%5Cs%2Bcode%5Cs%2B%28%5Cd%2B%29%22%2C%22%5C1%22%29%2Cnull%28%29%29%20%7C%20eventstats%20first%28exit_status%29%20as%20exit_status%20by%20stanza%20%7C%20stats%20first%28exit_status%29%20as%20exit_status%2Cmin%28_time%29%20as%20firstTime%2Cmax%28_time%29%20as%20lastTime%20by%20stanza%20%7C%20eval%20run_duration%3Dround%28lastTime-firstTime%2C1%29%5D%20%7C%20join%20type%3Douter%20stanza%20%5Bsearch%20index%3D_internal%20sourcetype%3Dthreatintel%3Adownload%20file%3D%22threatlist.py%3Adownload_%2A%22%20earliest%3D-24h%40h%20latest%3Dnow%20%7C%20stats%20latest%28status%29%20as%20download_status%20by%20stanza%5D%20%7C%20rename%20lastTime%20as%20_time%20%7C%20search%20$payload:click.name$%3D%22$payload:click.value$%22",
            "newTab": true
          }
        }
      ]
    },
    "viz_intelligence_audit_events": {
      "type": "splunk.events",
      "title": "Intelligence Audit Events",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_intelligence_audit_events",
        "fieldsummary": "ds_intelligence_audit_events_fieldsummary"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
        {
          "type": "drilldown.setToken",
          "options": {
              "tokenNamespace": "payload",
              "tokens": [
                  {
                      "token": "tag_value",
                      "key": "value"
                  },
                  {
                      "token": "field",
                      "key": "name"
                  }
              ]
          }
        },
        {
            "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
            "options": {
                "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| search eventtype=threatintel_internal_logs $ds_input_tokens:result.level_form_token$ $ds_input_tokens:result.sourcetype_form_token$ $ds_input_tokens:result.source_id_token$ | head 1000 | search \"tag::$payload:field$\"=$payload:tag_value$",
                "newTab": true,
                "events": [
                    "tag.click"
                ]
            }
        },
        {
          "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
          "options": {
            "params": {
              "search": "eventtype=threatintel_internal_logs $ds_input_tokens:result.level_form_token$ $ds_input_tokens:result.sourcetype_form_token$ $ds_input_tokens:result.source_id_token$ | head 1000",
              "timerange": {
                "earliest": "$tia.earliest$",
                "latest": "$tia.latest$"
              }
            },
            "handlerName": "eventViewerDrilldownHandler",
            "newTab": true,
            "vizType": "events"
          }
        }
      ],
      "options": {
        "footerFields": [
          "host",
          "source",
          "sourcetype"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_time_range": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "options": {
        "token": "tia",
        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      },
      "title": "Time Range"
    },
    "input_download_disbaled": {
      "options": {
        "items": [
          {
            "label": "All",
            "value": "*"
          },
          {
            "label": "Enabled",
            "value": "disabled=0"
          },
          {
            "label": "Disabled",
            "value": "disabled=1"
          }
        ],
        "defaultValue": "disabled=0",
        "token": "disabled"
      },
      "title": "Download Enabled/Disabled",
      "type": "input.dropdown"
    },
    "input_download_location": {
      "options": {
        "items": [
          {
            "label": "All",
            "value": "*"
          },
          {
            "label": "Local",
            "value": "url=lookup*"
          },
          {
            "label": "Remote",
            "value": "url!=lookup*"
          }
        ],
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "token": "location"
      },
      "title": "Download Location",
      "type": "input.dropdown"
    },
    "input_sourcetype": {
      "options": {
        "items": [
          {
            "label": "All",
            "value": "*"
          },
          {
            "label": "threatintel:download",
            "value": "threatintel:download"
          },
          {
            "label": "threatintel:rest_handler",
            "value": "threatintel:rest_handler"
          },
          {
            "label": "threatintel:threatlist_rest_handler",
            "value": "threatintel:threatlist_rest_handler"
          },
          {
            "label": "threatintel:threatmatch",
            "value": "threatintel:threatmatch"
          }
        ],
        "defaultValue": [
          "*"
        ],
        "token": "sourcetype_form"
      },
      "title": "Sourcetype",
      "type": "input.multiselect"
    },
    "input_level": {
      "options": {
        "items": [
          {
            "label": "All",
            "value": "*"
          },
          {
            "label": "DEBUG",
            "value": "DEBUG"
          },
          {
            "label": "INFO",
            "value": "INFO"
          },
          {
            "label": "WARN",
            "value": "WARN"
          },
          {
            "label": "ERROR",
            "value": "ERROR"
          },
          {
            "label": "CRITICAL",
            "value": "CRITICAL"
          },
          {
            "label": "FATAL",
            "value": "FATAL"
          }
        ],
        "defaultValue": [
          "*"
        ],
        "token": "level_form"
      },
      "title": "Level",
      "type": "input.multiselect"
    },
    "input_intelligence_source": {
      "options": {
        "items": [
          {
            "label": "All",
            "value": "*"
          }
        ],
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "token": "source_id"
      },
      "title": "Intelligence Source",
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_input_intelligence_source"
      }
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_intelligence_audit_table": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "DS Intelligence Audit Table",
      "options": {
        "query": "| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /services/data/inputs/threatlist | search $ds_input_tokens:result.disabled_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.location$ | rename title as stanza | table stanza,disabled,type,description,url,weight | join type=outer stanza [| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /services/admin/inputstatus/ModularInputs%3Amodular%20input%20commands | transpose | rex field=column \"\\(threatlist:\\/\\/(?<stanza>[^\\)]+)\" | search stanza=* | eval _time=strptime('row 1',\"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%z\") | eval exit_status=if(column LIKE \"%exit status description\",replace('row 1',\"exited\\s+with\\s+code\\s+(\\d+)\",\"\\1\"),null()) | eventstats first(exit_status) as exit_status by stanza | stats first(exit_status) as exit_status,min(_time) as firstTime,max(_time) as lastTime by stanza | eval run_duration=round(lastTime-firstTime,1)] | join type=outer stanza [search index=_internal sourcetype=threatintel:download file=\"threatlist.py:download_*\" earliest=-24h@h latest=now | stats latest(status) as download_status by stanza] | rename lastTime as _time | table _time,stanza,disabled,type,url,weight,exit_status,download_status,run_duration",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-24h@h",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_input_intelligence_source": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "DS Input Intelligence Source",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `threat_sources`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval disabled_raw=if($disabled|s$==\"*\" OR $disabled|s$==\"\", \" \", \"$disabled$\")\n| eval location=if($location|s$==\"*\" OR $location|s$==\"\", \" \", \"$location$\")\n| eval sourcetype_form_input=\"$sourcetype_form$\"\n| eval list=split(sourcetype_form_input,\",\")\n| eval filterlist=mvfilter(!list IN (\"*\"))\n| eval fields=\"\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\"sourcetype=\\\"\" . filterlist . \"\\\"\"), \" OR \").\"\"\n| eval sourcetype_form_token=case(sourcetype_form_input==\"*\",\"\", true(), fields)\n| eval level_form_input=\"$level_form$\"\n| eval list=split(level_form_input,\",\")\n| eval filterlist=mvfilter(!list IN (\"*\"))\n| eval fields=\"\".mvjoin(mvmap(filterlist,\" \" . filterlist . \"\"), \" OR \").\"\"\n| eval level_form_token=case(level_form_input==\"*\",\" \", true(), fields)\n| eval source_id_token=if($source_id|s$==\"*\" OR $source_id|s$==\"\", \" \", \"$source_id$\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_intelligence_audit_events": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "DS Intelligence Audit Events",
      "options": {
        "query": "| search eventtype=threatintel_internal_logs $ds_input_tokens:result.level_form_token$ $ds_input_tokens:result.sourcetype_form_token$ $ds_input_tokens:result.source_id_token$ | head 1000",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "$tia.earliest$",
          "latest": "$tia.latest$"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_intelligence_audit_events_fieldsummary": {
      "type": "ds.chain",
      "name": "Threat Intelligence Audit events fieldsummary",
      "options": {
        "query": "fieldsummary maxvals=10",
        "extend": "ds_intelligence_audit_events"
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      },
      "ds.chain": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {
      "width": 1440,
      "height": 960
    },
    "structure": [
      {
        "item": "input_download_disbaled",
        "type": "input",
        "position": {
          "x": 0,

          "w": 150,

        }

      {

        }
      },
      {

        }

      {

      {

result.label: time_center_data
result.title: time_center_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_time_synchronization_failures": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_time_synchronization_failures"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Performance\".\"Timesync\" | search action=\"failure\" dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Time Synchronization Failures"
    },
    "viz_systems_not_time_syncing": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_systems_not_time_syncing"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Performance\".\"Timesync\" | search dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {},
      "title": "Systems Not Time Syncing"
    },
    "viz_indexing_time_delay": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_indexing_time_delay"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.host.value",
              "key": "row.host.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=orig_host=\"$payload:row.host.value|u$\" `index_time_delta`&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "min_diff(minutes)": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName(\"min_diff(minutes)\") | formatByType(numberPrecisionConfig)"
          },
          "avg_diff(minutes)": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName(\"avg_diff(minutes)\") | formatByType(numberPrecisionConfig)"
          },
          "max_diff(minutes)": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName(\"max_diff(minutes)\") | formatByType(numberPrecisionConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "numberPrecisionConfig": {
          "number": {
            "precision": 1
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Indexing Time Delay"
    },
    "viz_time_service_start_mode_anomalies": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_time_service_start_mode_anomalies"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.service.value",
              "key": "row.service.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Endpoint\".\"Services\" | search dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\" service=\"$payload:row.service.value|u$\" | head 2&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Time Service Start Mode Anomalies"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_category": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Category",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_time_synchronization_failures": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Time Synchronization Failures",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,latest(All_Performance.dest_should_timesync) as dest_should_timesync,count from datamodel=Performance.All_Performance where nodename=All_Performance.OS.Timesync All_Performance.OS.Timesync.action=failure $ds_input_tokens:result.should_timesync_perf_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.system_perf_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_perf_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_perf_dm$ by All_Performance.dest | head 100 | eval action=\"failure\" | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Performance\")` | fields _time,action,dest,dest_should_timesync,count"
      }
    },
    "ds_systems_not_time_syncing": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Systems Not Time Syncing",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` min(_time) as firstTime,max(_time) as lastTime,latest(All_Performance.dest_should_timesync) as dest_should_timesync from datamodel=Performance.All_Performance where nodename=All_Performance.OS.Timesync All_Performance.OS.Timesync.action=success $ds_input_tokens:result.should_timesync_perf_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.system_perf_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_perf_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_perf_dm$ by All_Performance.dest | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Performance\")` | `timeDiff(lastTime)` | search timeDiff>86400 | sort 100 + lastTime | `uitime(firstTime)` | `uitime(lastTime)` | fields firstTime,lastTime,dest,dest_should_timesync"
      }
    },
    "ds_indexing_time_delay": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Indexing Time Delay",
      "options": {
        "query": "$ds_input_tokens:result.should_timesync_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.system_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ `index_time_delta` | stats min(min_timeDiff) as min_timeDiff,max(max_timeDiff) as max_timeDiff,sum(sum_timeDiff) as sum_timeDiff,sum(count) as count by host | `get_asset(host)` | eval \"min_diff(minutes)\"=round(min_timeDiff/60,1) | eval \"max_diff(minutes)\"=round(max_timeDiff/60,1) | eval \"avg_diff(minutes)\"=round(sum_timeDiff/(count*60),1) | sort 100 + avg_diff(minutes) | fields host,host_should_timesync,min_diff(minutes),avg_diff(minutes),max_diff(minutes)"
      }
    },
    "ds_time_service_start_mode_anomalies": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Time Service Start Mode Anomalies",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,latest(Services.start_mode) as start_mode,latest(Services.status) as status,latest(Services.dest_should_timesync) as dest_should_timesync from datamodel=Endpoint.Services where (Services.tag=time Services.tag=synchronize) $ds_input_tokens:result.should_timesync_services_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.system_services_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_services_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_services_dm$ by Services.dest,Services.service | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Services\")` | search start_mode!=auto | sort 100 + start_mode | fields _time,dest,dest_should_timesync,service,start_mode,status"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval should_timesync=if($should_timesync|s$==\"*\" OR $should_timesync|s$==\"\", \" \", $should_timesync|s$)\n| eval system=if($system|s$==\"*\" OR $system|s$==\"\", \" \", $system|s$)\n| eval bunit=if($bunit|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit|s$==\"\", \" \", $bunit|s$)\n| eval category=if($category|s$==\"*\" OR $category|s$==\"\", \" \", $category|s$)\n| eval should_timesync_raw=if(should_timesync==\" \", \" \", \"orig_host_should_timesync=\\\"\".should_timesync.\"\\\"\")\n| eval should_timesync_perf_dm=if(should_timesync==\" \", \" \", \"All_Performance.dest_should_timesync=\\\"\".should_timesync.\"\\\"\")\n| eval should_timesync_services_dm=if(should_timesync==\" \", \" \", \"Services.dest_should_timesync=\\\"\".should_timesync.\"\\\"\")\n| eval system_raw=if(system==\" \", \" \", \"orig_host=\\\"\".system.\"\\\"\")\n| eval system_perf_dm=if(system==\" \", \" \", \"All_Performance.dest=\\\"\".system.\"\\\"\")\n| eval system_services_dm=if(system==\" \", \" \", \"Services.dest=\\\"\".system.\"\\\"\")\n| eval bunit_raw=if(bunit==\" \", \" \", \"orig_host_bunit=\\\"\".bunit.\"\\\"\")\n| eval bunit_perf_dm=if(bunit==\" \", \" \", \"All_Performance.dest_bunit=\\\"\".bunit.\"\\\"\")\n| eval bunit_services_dm=if(bunit==\" \", \" \", \"Services.dest_bunit=\\\"\".bunit.\"\\\"\")\n| eval category_raw=if(category==\" \", \" \", \"orig_host_category=\\\"\".category.\"\\\"\")\n| eval category_perf_dm=if(category==\" \", \" \", \"All_Performance.dest_category=\\\"\".category.\"\\\"\")\n| eval category_services_dm=if(category==\" \", \" \", \"Services.dest_category=\\\"\".category.\"\\\"\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      },
      "splunk.table": {
        "context": {
          "timeConfig": {
            "time": {
              "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_should_timesync": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Show only systems that should timesync",
      "options": {
        "token": "should_timesync",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        },{
          "value": "true",
          "label": "True"
        },{
          "value": "false",
          "label": "False"
        }]
      }
    },
    "input_system": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "System",
      "options": {
        "token": "system",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_bunit": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "token": "bunit",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_category": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Category",
      "options": {
        "token": "category",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.category",
        "label": "primary.category"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_category"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-30d@d,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_time_synchronization_failures",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_systems_not_time_syncing",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_indexing_time_delay",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_time_service_start_mode_anomalies",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_should_timesync",
      "input_system",
      "input_bunit",
      "input_category",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Time Center"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_traffic_over_time_by_action": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Traffic Over Time By Action",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by _time,All_Traffic.action span=10m | timechart minspan=10m count by All_Traffic.action | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Traffic\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_traffic_over_time_by_protocol": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Traffic Over Time By Protocol",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by _time,All_Traffic.transport span=10m | timechart minspan=10m useother=`useother` count by All_Traffic.transport | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Traffic\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_top_sources": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Sources",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by _time,All_Traffic.src span=1h | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Traffic\")` | stats sparkline(sum(count),1h) as sparkline,sum(count) as count by src | sort 100 - count"
      }
    },
    "ds_scanning_activity_many_systems": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Scanning Activity Many Systems",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` dc(All_Traffic.dest) as dest_count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by All_Traffic.src | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Traffic\")` | sort 10 - dest_count"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval action_dm=if($action|s$==\"*\" OR $action|s$==\"\", \" \", \"All_Traffic.action=\\\"$action$\\\"\")\n| eval category_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Traffic.src_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Traffic.src_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_action": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Action",
      "options": {
        "token": "action",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.action",
        "label": "primary.action"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_action"
      }
    },
    "input_bunit_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "token": "bunit_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_category_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Category",
      "options": {
        "token": "category_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.category",
        "label": "primary.category"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_category_form"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_keyIndicators",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,

      }

      "item": "viz_traffic_over_time_by_action",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,

        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_traffic_over_time_by_protocol",
      "type": "block",

        "x": 600,
