result.label: traffic_search_data
result.title: traffic_search_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_traffic_search_table": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_traffic_search_table"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.src.value",
              "key": "row.src.value"
            },{
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            },{
              "token": "row.transport.value",
              "key": "row.transport.value"
            },{
              "token": "row.dest_port.value",
              "key": "row.dest_port.value"
            }
          ]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Network_Traffic\".\"All_Traffic\" | search src=\"$payload:row.src.value|u$\" dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\" transport=\"$payload:row.transport.value|u$\" dest_port=\"$payload:row.dest_port.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "columnFormat": {
          "dest": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('dest') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "src": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('src') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "action": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('action') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "transport": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('transport') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)",
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "alignPositionCol": [ "left" ],
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    },
    "viz_traffic_search_event": {
      "type": "splunk.events",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_traffic_search_event",
        "fieldsummary": "ds_traffic_search_event_fieldsummary"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
      {
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [
                {
                    "token": "tag_value",
                    "key": "value"
                },
                {
                    "token": "field",
                    "key": "name"
                }
            ]
        }
      },
      {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
              "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Network_Traffic\".\"All_Traffic\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.transport_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_port_raw$ | head 100 | search \"tag::$payload:field$\"=$payload:tag_value$",
              "newTab": true,
              "events": [
                  "tag.click"
              ]
          }
      },
      {
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Network_Traffic\".\"All_Traffic\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.transport_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_port_raw$ | head 100",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "eventViewerDrilldownHandler",
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "events"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "footerFields": [
          "dvc",
          "action",
          "src",
          "src_ip",
          "src_mac",
          "src_translated_ip",
          "src_port",
          "dest",
          "dest_ip",
          "dest_mac",
          "dest_translated_ip",
          "transport",
          "dest_port"
        ],
        "highlightValuesByField": {
          "dvc": "$dest$",
          "action": "$action$",
          "src": "$src_form$",
          "src_ip": "$src_form$",
          "src_mac": "$src_form$",
          "src_translated_ip": "$src_form$",
          "src_port": "$src_port$",
          "dest": "$dest_form$",
          "dest_ip": "$dest_form$",
          "dest_mac": "$dest_form$",
          "dest_translated_ip": "$dest_form$",
          "transport": "$transport$",
          "dest_port": "$dest_port$" 
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_action": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Action",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_traffic_actions`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_transport": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Transport",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_transport_protocols`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_traffic_search_table": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Traffic search table",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,values(All_Traffic.action) as action,values(All_Traffic.src_port) as src_port,count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where * $ds_input_tokens:result.action_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.transport_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_port_dm$ by All_Traffic.src,All_Traffic.dest,All_Traffic.transport,All_Traffic.dest_port | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Traffic\")` | sort - count | fields _time,action,src,src_port,dest,transport,dest_port,count"
      }
    },
    "ds_traffic_search_event": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Traffic search event",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from datamodel:\"Network_Traffic\".\"All_Traffic\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.action_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.transport_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_port_raw$ | head 100"
      }
    },
    "ds_traffic_search_event_fieldsummary": {
      "type": "ds.chain",
      "name": "Traffic search event fieldsummary",
      "options": {
        "query": "fieldsummary maxvals=10",
        "extend": "ds_traffic_search_event"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval action_raw=if($action|s$==\"*\" OR $action|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(action=\\\"$action$\\\")\")\n| eval action_dm=if($action|s$==\"*\" OR $action|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Traffic.action=\\\"$action$\\\")\")\n| eval src_raw=if($src_form|s$==\"*\" OR $src_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(src=\\\"$src_form$\\\" OR src_ip=\\\"$src_form$\\\" OR src_mac=\\\"$src_form$\\\" OR src_translated_ip=\\\"$src_form$\\\")\")\n| eval src_dm=if($src_form|s$==\"*\" OR $src_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Traffic.src=\\\"$src_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.src_ip=\\\"$src_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.src_mac=\\\"$src_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.src_translated_ip=\\\"$src_form$\\\")\")\n| eval transport_raw=if($transport|s$==\"*\" OR $transport|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(transport=\\\"$transport$\\\")\")\n| eval transport_dm=if($transport|s$==\"*\" OR $transport|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Traffic.transport=\\\"$transport$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_port_raw=if($dest_port|s$==\"*\" OR $dest_port|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest_port=\\\"$dest_port$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_port_dm=if($dest_port|s$==\"*\" OR $dest_port|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Traffic.dest_port=\\\"$dest_port$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_raw=if($dest_form|s$==\"*\" OR $dest_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest=\\\"$dest_form$\\\" OR dest_ip=\\\"$dest_form$\\\" OR dest_mac=\\\"$dest_form$\\\" OR dest_translated_ip=\\\"$dest_form$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_dm=if($dest_form|s$==\"*\" OR $dest_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(All_Traffic.dest=\\\"$dest_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.dest_ip=\\\"$dest_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.dest_mac=\\\"$dest_form$\\\" OR All_Traffic.dest_translated_ip=\\\"$dest_form$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "ds.chain": {
      "options": {
        "queryParameters": {
          "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
          "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_action": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Action",
      "options": {
        "token": "action",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.action",
        "label": "primary.action"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_action"
      }
    },
    "input_src_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Source",

        "defaultValue": "*"

    },
    "input_dest_form": {

      }
    },
    "input_transport": {

      "title": "Transport Protocol",
      "options": {
        "token": "transport",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.transport",
        "label": "primary.transport"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_transport"
      }
    },
    "input_dest_port": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Destination Port",
      "options": {
        "token": "dest_port",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-60m@m,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_traffic_search_table",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 285
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_traffic_search_event",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 285,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 500
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_action",
      "input_src_form",
      "input_dest_form",
      "input_transport",
      "input_dest_port",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Traffic Search"
}]]></definition>

<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {

      "name": "Traffic Size Details",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as lastTime,min(All_Traffic.bytes) as min_bytes,avg(All_Traffic.bytes) as mean_bytes,max(All_Traffic.bytes) as max_bytes,dc(All_Traffic.dest) as dc(dest),count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where $ds_input_tokens:result.Z_dm$ by All_Traffic.src | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Traffic\")` | appendcols [inputlookup append=T start=0 max=1 traffic_bytes_tracker | rename mean_bytes as tracker_mean | fields tracker_mean,stdev] | filldown tracker_mean,stdev | eval Z=round(((mean_bytes-tracker_mean)/stdev),2) | `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_traffic_size\",\"src\")` | rename ppf_cell as \"Per-panel Filter\" | eval bytes=if(min_bytes==mean_bytes AND mean_bytes==max_bytes,floor(min_bytes),\"min: \".floor(min_bytes).\"|avg: \".floor(mean_bytes).\"|max: \".floor(max_bytes)) | `makemv(bytes)` | sort - ppf_filter,Z | `uitime(lastTime)` | table \"Per-panel Filter\",src,bytes,dc(dest),count,Z,lastTime"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval Z_raw=if($Z_form|s$==\"*\" OR $Z_form|s$==\"\", \"bytes>0\", \"[| inputlookup append=T traffic_bytes_tracker | search Z=$Z_form$ | fields search]\")\n| eval Z_dm=if($Z_form|s$==\"*\" OR $Z_form|s$==\"\", \"All_Traffic.bytes>0\", \"[| inputlookup append=T traffic_bytes_tracker | search Z=$Z_form$ | fields search]\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "tokens": {
      "PPF": {

          "value": "{}"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_Z_form": {

      "title": "Standard Deviation Index",
      "options": {
        "token": "Z_form",
        "defaultValue": "2",
        "items": [{

        }]

      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {

}]]></definition>

result.label: UBA Use Case
result.title: UBA_Use_Case
result.eai:data:
About Splunk User Behavior Analytics


You're exploring an example that is best accomplished with Splunk's User Behavior Analytics (UBA).

UBA is Splunk's security product designed to find anomalies and threats involving user, application, and device behavior, using unsupervised machine learning. UBA discovers anomalies anomalies from the data sources you likely already have in Splunk, and stitches them together into threats. It also provides risk scoring so that analysts can quickly understand which threats to investigate first. A rich visual environment allows analysts and threat hunters to pivot through and investigate the anomalous behavior. Other important UBA features include:

  • A data science foundation including Hadoop, Spark, and GraphDB to support enterprise-level environments;
  • Multi-dimensional behavior baselining to identify true outliers;
  • Custom threat generation, and an API to allow your data scientists to create their own models;
  • A robust tracking mechanism for assets and identities;
  • Support for user monitoring and on-the-fly watch lists; and
  • Bi-directional with Splunk ES to drill further into the data from user behavior threats and anomalies.

    • The Security Examples marked as Try UBAwithin Security Essentials are "out-of-the-box" anomaly detections within UBA, as shown in the screencaps that you can select below. Find out more about Splunk UBA here.

    Your Use Case

    Details for your Use Case

    Screenshots for your Use Case

         Related Splunk Content
         Enrichment Advanced stage4 true true

    Example Stage 4 UBA Anomaly:

    Multiple Logins


    Example Stage 6 UBA Anomaly:

    Suspicious Domain Communication


    Geographically Improbable Accesses (Superman Problem)

    The superman problem is one of the first use cases most UEBA solutions take on -- detecting account compromise by looking for sequential logins from distant parts of the world, where it is in improbable someone might travel (such as a login from North Korea 5 minutes or 5 seconds after a login San Francisco).

    This use case is so common, that you can actually solve it in several places within Splunk. It is provided as a native anomaly in Splunk UBA, you can download a community supported app called SA-geodistance. However, if you don't have UBA deployed yet, and you don't want to try to configure a community supported app to work for you, Splunk ES has this out of the box! Under Security Intelligence -> User Intelligence -> Access Anomalies, you can find a series of report of use, including the Geographically Improbable Accesses report. To automatically be alerted, or automatically integrate this into your Anomaly Aggregation solution of choice (Splunk UBA, ES Risk, etc.), ES also has a correlation rule out of the box to do this detection.

    Screenshot(s)

    Anomalous New Listening Port

    Unusual new listening ports is a sign of potential malware persistence in your environment. Building out this search, with the potential cardinality of every unique port on every system in your environment can be a trial. Fortunately, Splunk ES ships this search out of the box!

    Just as with many anomalies, it may be benign -- the installation of some new software that opens new listening ports -- so it is important to correlate this event with other anomalous events in your environment though an aggregation layer, such as Splunk UBA (or as a starting point, Splunk ES's Risk Framework).

    Screenshot(s)

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{

            {
              "token": "row.service.value",

          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Endpoint\".\"Services\" | search dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\" service=\"$payload:row.service.value|u$\" | head 2&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause|u$",

        "query": "| `categories`",

    "ds_top_systems_needing_updates": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Systems Needing Updates",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` latest(Updates.status) as status from datamodel=Updates.Updates where * $ds_input_tokens:result.dsu_updates_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_updates_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_updates_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_updates_dm$ by Updates.dest,Updates.signature_id,Updates.vendor_product | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Updates\")` | search status=available | stats count by dest | sort 10 - count"
      }

    "ds_top_updates_needed": {

      }
    },
    "ds_systems_not_updating_greater_than_30_days": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Systems Not Updating - Greater Than 30 Days",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` min(_time) as _time,latest(Updates.dest_should_update) as dest_should_update from datamodel=Updates.Updates where earliest=-1y@d latest=+0s Updates.status=installed $ds_input_tokens:result.dsu_updates_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_updates_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_updates_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_updates_dm$ by Updates.dest,Updates.signature_id,Updates.vendor_product | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Updates\")` | stats max(_time) as lastTime,latest(dest_should_update) as dest_should_update by dest | eval dayDiff=round((now()-lastTime)/86400,1) | search dayDiff>30 | sort + lastTime | `uitime(lastTime)`"
      }
    },
    "ds_update_service_start_mode_anomalies": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Update Service Start Mode Anomalies",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` latest(Services.start_mode) as start_mode,latest(Services.status) as status from datamodel=Endpoint.Services where * Services.tag=update $ds_input_tokens:result.dsu_services_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_services_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_services_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_services_dm$ by Services.dest,Services.service | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Services\")` | search start_mode!=auto | sort 100 + start_mode | fields dest,service,start_mode,status"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval dest_should_update=if($dest_should_update|s$==\"*\" OR $dest_should_update|s$==\"\", \" \", $dest_should_update|s$)\n| eval dest=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", $dest|s$)\n| eval bunit=if($bunit|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit|s$==\"\", \" \", $bunit|s$)\n| eval category=if($category|s$==\"*\" OR $category|s$==\"\", \" \", $category|s$)\n| eval dsu_updates_dm=if(dest_should_update==\" \", \" \", \"Updates.dest_should_update=\\\"\".dest_should_update.\"\\\"\")\n| eval dsu_services_dm=if(dest_should_update==\" \", \" \", \"Services.dest_should_update=\\\"\".dest_should_update.\"\\\"\")\n| eval dest_updates_dm=if(dest==\" \", \" \", \"Updates.dest=\\\"\".dest.\"\\\"\")\n| eval dest_services_dm=if(dest==\" \", \" \", \"Services.dest=\\\"\".dest.\"\\\"\")\n| eval bunit_updates_dm=if(bunit==\" \", \" \", \"Updates.dest_bunit=\\\"\".bunit.\"\\\"\")\n| eval bunit_services_dm=if(bunit==\" \", \" \", \"(Services.dest_bunit=\\\"\".bunit.\"\\\" OR Services.user_bunit=\\\"\".bunit.\"\\\")\")\n| eval category_updates_dm=if(category==\" \", \" \", \"Updates.dest_category=\\\"\".category.\"\\\"\")\n| eval category_services_dm=if(category==\" \", \" \", \"(Services.dest_category=\\\"\".category.\"\\\" OR Services.user_category=\\\"\".category.\"\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }

  },
  "inputs": {

result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_update_search_table": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_update_search_table"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
          "type": "drilldown.setToken",
          "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
                "token": "row.dest_should_update.value",
                "key": "row.dest_should_update.value"
              },
              {
                "token": "row.status.value",
                "key": "row.status.value"
              },
              {
                "token": "row.signature_id.value",
                "key": "row.signature_id.value"
              },
              {
                "token": "row.signature.value",
                "key": "row.signature.value"
              },
              {
                "token": "row.dest.value",
                "key": "row.dest.value"
              }
            ]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Updates\".\"Updates\" | search dest_should_update=\"$payload:row.dest_should_update.value|u$\" status=\"$payload:row.status.value|u$\" signature_id=\"$payload:row.signature_id.value|u$\" signature=\"$payload:row.signature.value|u$\" dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true,
            "vizType": "table"
          }
        }
      ],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "columnFormat": {
          "dest": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('dest') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "status": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('status') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "dest_should_update": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('dest_should_update') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)",
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "alignPositionCol": [ "left" ],
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    },
    "viz_update_search_event": {
      "type": "splunk.events",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_update_search_event",
        "fieldsummary": "ds_update_search_event_fieldsummary"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
      {
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [
                {
                    "token": "tag_value",
                    "key": "value"
                },
                {
                    "token": "field",
                    "key": "name"
                }
            ]
        }
      },
      {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
              "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Updates\".\"Updates\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.dsu_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.signature_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ | search $ds_input_tokens:result.status_raw$ | head 100 | search \"tag::$payload:field$\"=$payload:tag_value$",
              "newTab": true,
              "events": [
                  "tag.click"
              ]
          }
      },
      {
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Updates\".\"Updates\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.dsu_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.signature_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ | search $ds_input_tokens:result.status_raw$ | head 100",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "eventViewerDrilldownHandler",
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "events"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "rowNumbers": false,
        "type": "list",
        "list.wrap": true,
        "footerFields": [
          "dest",
          "signature",
          "status",
          "signature_id",
          "dest_should_update"
        ],
        "highlightValuesByField": {
          "dest": "$dest$",
          "signature": "$signature_form$",
          "status": "$status$",
          "signature_id": "$signature_form$",
          "dest_should_update": "$dest_should_update$"
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_status": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Status",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_update_statii`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_update_search_table": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Update search table",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,latest(Updates.status) as status,latest(Updates.dest_should_update) as dest_should_update from datamodel=Updates.Updates where * $ds_input_tokens:result.dsu_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.signature_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_dm$ by Updates.dest,Updates.signature_id,Updates.vendor_product | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Updates\")` | `get_update_signature` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.status_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.signature_raw$ | sort - _time,dest,signature | fields _time,status,signature_id,signature,dest,dest_should_update"
      }
    },
    "ds_update_search_event": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Update search event",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from datamodel:\"Updates\".\"Updates\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.dsu_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.signature_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ | search $ds_input_tokens:result.status_raw$ | head 100"
      }
    },
    "ds_update_search_event_fieldsummary": {
      "type": "ds.chain",
      "name": "Update search event fieldsummary",
      "options": {
        "query": "fieldsummary maxvals=10",
        "extend": "ds_update_search_event"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval dsu_raw=if($dest_should_update|s$==\"*\" OR $dest_should_update|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest_should_update=\\\"$dest_should_update$\\\")\")\n| eval dsu_dm=if($dest_should_update|s$==\"*\" OR $dest_should_update|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Updates.dest_should_update=\\\"$dest_should_update$\\\")\")\n| eval status_raw=if($status|s$==\"*\" OR $status|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(status=\\\"$status$\\\")\")\n| eval signature_raw=if($signature_form|s$==\"*\" OR $signature_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(signature_id=\\\"$signature_form$\\\" OR signature=\\\"$signature_form$\\\")\")\n| eval signature_dm=if($signature_form|s$==\"*\" OR $signature_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Updates.signature_id=\\\"$signature_form$\\\" OR Updates.signature=\\\"$signature_form$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_raw=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_dm=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Updates.dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "ds.chain": {
      "options": {
        "queryParameters": {
          "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
          "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_systems_by_update_status": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Systems by update status",
      "options": {
        "token": "dest_should_update",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [
          {
            "value": "*",
            "label": "All Systems"
          },
          {
            "value": "true",
            "label": "Systems Should Update"
          },
          {
            "value": "false",
            "label": "Systems Should Not Update"
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    "input_update_status": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Update Status",
      "options": {
        "token": "status",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [
          {
            "value": "*",
            "label": "All"
          }
        ]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.status",
        "label": "primary.status"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_status"
      }
    },
    "input_signature": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Signature",
      "options": {
        "token": "signature_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_dest": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Destination",
      "options": {
        "token": "dest",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-60m,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_update_search_table",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 285
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_update_search_event",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 285,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 500
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_systems_by_update_status",
      "input_update_status",
      "input_signature",
      "input_dest",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Update Search"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_keyIndicators": {
      "type": "custom.keyIndicators",

    "viz_url_length_anomalies_over_time": {

      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_url_length_anomalies_over_time"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Web\".\"Web\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.Z_raw$",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            },
            "autopause": "$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "searchKey": "http_method"
          },
          "handlerName": "searchDrilldownHandler",
          "events": [
            "point.click",
            "legend.click"
          ],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "line"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "xAxisTitleText": "time",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "nullValueDisplay": "zero"
      },
      "title": "URL Length Anomalies Over Time"
    },
    "viz_url_length_details_markdown": {
      "type": "splunk.markdown",
      "options": {
        "markdown": "#### URL Length Details"
      }
    },
    "viz_url_length_details": {
      "type": "custom.perPanelFilter",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_url_length_details"
      },
      "options": {
        "selectedRows": "$PPF:selected_rows$"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Web\".\"Web\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.Z_raw$",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            },
            "autopause": "$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "searchKey": "url"
          },
          "handlerName": "urlLengthAnalysisDrilldownHandler",
          "events": [ "cell.click" ],
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "table"
        }
      }],
      "title": "URL Length Details"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_Z_form": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Standard Deviation Index",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `standard_deviations`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_url_length_anomalies_over_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "URL Length Anomalies Over Time",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` latest(Web.http_method) as http_method,count from datamodel=Web.Web where Web.url!=\"unknown\" $ds_input_tokens:result.Z_dm$ by _time,Web.url span=10m | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")` | `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_url_length\",\"url\")` | timechart minspan=10m sum(count) as count by http_method"
      }
    },
    "ds_url_length_details": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "URL Length Details",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as lastTime,latest(Web.url_length) as length,dc(Web.src) as dc(src),dc(Web.dest) as dc(dest),count from datamodel=Web.Web where Web.url!=\"unknown\" $ds_input_tokens:result.Z_dm$ by Web.url | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")` | appendcols[| inputlookup append=T start=0 max=1 url_length_tracker | fields mean_length,stdev] | filldown mean_length,stdev | `get_stdev_index(length)` | `round(Z)`| `per_panel_filter(\"ppf_url_length\",\"url\")` | rename ppf_cell as \"Per-panel Filter\" | sort - ppf_filter,Z | `uitime(lastTime)` | table \"Per-panel Filter\",url,length,dc(src),dc(dest),count,Z,lastTime"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval Z_raw=if($Z_form|s$==\"*\" OR $Z_form|s$==\"\", \"url_length>0\", \"[| inputlookup append=T url_length_tracker | search Z=$Z_form$ | fields search]\")\n| eval Z_dm=if($Z_form|s$==\"*\" OR $Z_form|s$==\"\", \"Web.url_length>0\", \"[| inputlookup append=T url_length_tracker | search Z=$Z_form$ | fields search]\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "tokens": {
      "PPF": {
        "selected_rows": {
          "value": "{}"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_Z_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Standard Deviation Index",
      "options": {
        "token": "Z_form",
        "defaultValue": "2",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.stdev",
        "label": "primary.stdev_label"
      },
      "dataSources": {

      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      }
    },
    "input_ppf_button": {
      "type": "input.perPanelFilterButton",
      "options": {
        "selectedRows": "$PPF:selected_rows$",
        "ppfOptions": {
          "namespace": "DA-ESS-NetworkProtection",

          "fields": [ "url" ],

        },
        "searchManagersToReload": [

        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_keyIndicators",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 150
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_url_length_anomalies_over_time",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,

        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_url_length_details_markdown",

      "name": "Non-corporate Email Activity",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` sum(All_Email.size) as  size, values(All_Email.recipient) as recipient from datamodel=Email.All_Email  where All_Email.src_user=$ds_input_tokens:result.user$ $ds_input_tokens:result.email_src_user_bunit$ NOT `cim_corporate_email_domain_search(\"All_Email.recipient\")` by All_Email.src_user | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Email\")` | `get_identity4events(src_user)` | rename src_user_watchlist as watchlist | search $ds_input_tokens:result.watchlist_raw$ | fields src_user,  src_user_first, src_user_last, src_user_bunit, src_user_email, size, watchlist | sort 100 - size "
      }
    },
    "ds_watchlisted_site_activity": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Watchlisted Site Activity",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count, first(Web.url) as url, values(Web.src) as src  from datamodel=Web.Web where Web.user=$ds_input_tokens:result.user$ $ds_input_tokens:result.web_user_bunit$  Web.tag=\"web_watchlist\" by Web.user | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")` | `get_identity4events(user)` | rename user_watchlist as watchlist | search $ds_input_tokens:result.watchlist_raw$ | fields user, user_first, user_last, user_bunit, user_email, url, count, watchlist |  sort 100 -count "
      }
    },
    "ds_remote_access": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Remote Access",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where Authentication.user=$ds_input_tokens:result.user$ $ds_input_tokens:result.remote_user_bunit$ by Authentication.src,Authentication.user | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Authentication\")`| `get_identity4events(user)` | rename user_watchlist as watchlist | search $ds_input_tokens:result.watchlist_raw$ | `get_asset(src)` | iplocation src | eval session_city=if(isnull(src_city), City,src_city) | eval session_country=if(isnull(src_country), Country,src_country) |  where isnotnull(session_city) AND isnotnull(user_work_city) AND (lower(user_work_city)!=lower(session_city) OR lower(user_work_country)!=lower(session_country)) | fields user, src, session_city, session_country, user_work_city, user_work_country | sort 100 -count "
      }
    },
    "ds_ticket_activity": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Ticket Activity",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` count, values(All_Ticket_Management.description) as description, values(All_Ticket_Management.priority) as priority, values(All_Ticket_Management.severity) as severity from datamodel=Ticket_Management.All_Ticket_Management where  All_Ticket_Management.src_user=$ds_input_tokens:result.user$ $ds_input_tokens:result.ticket_src_user_bunit$ by All_Ticket_Management.src_user | `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Ticket_Management\")` | `get_identity4events(src_user)` | rename src_user_watchlist as watchlist | search $ds_input_tokens:result.watchlist_raw$ | table src_user, src_user_bunit, count, description, priority, severity, watchlist | sort 100 -count"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval user=if($user|s$==\"*\" OR $user|s$==\"\", \"\\\"*\\\"\", \"\\\"$user$\\\"\")\n| eval watchlist_raw=if($watchlist|s$==\"*\" OR $watchlist|s$==\"\", \" \", \"watchlist=\\\"$watchlist$\\\"\")\n| eval user_bunit=if($bunit|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit|s$==\"\", \" \", \"user_bunit=\\\"$bunit$\\\"\")\n| eval web_user_bunit=if($bunit|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit|s$==\"\", \" \", \"Web.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit$\\\"\")\n| eval email_src_user_bunit=if($bunit|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit|s$==\"\", \" \", \"All_Email.src_user_bunit=\\\"$bunit$\\\"\")\n| eval remote_user_bunit=if($bunit|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit|s$==\"\", \" \", \"Authentication.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit$\\\"\")\n| eval ticket_src_user_bunit=if($bunit|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit|s$==\"\", \" \", \"All_Ticket_Management.src_user_bunit=\\\"$bunit$\\\"\")",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_user": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "User",
      "options": {
        "token": "user",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_bunit": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "token": "bunit",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_watchlist": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Watchlisted Users",
      "options": {
        "token": "watchlist",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        },{
          "value": "true",
          "label": "True"
        },{
          "value": "false",
          "label": "False"
        }]
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-24h@h,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_keyIndicators",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 150
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_users_by_risk_scores",

        "x": 0,
        "y": 150,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_non_corporate_web_uploads",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 150,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_non_corporate_email_activity",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 400,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_watchlisted_site_activity",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 400,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_remote_access",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 650,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_ticket_activity",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 650,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_user",

    ]
  },
  "description": "",

}]]></definition>

false | `dmc_get_groups_containing_role(dmc_group_indexer)` | where search_group!="dmc_group_indexer" label search_group All Indexers * false true title title | rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_indexer splunk_server_group="$group$" /services/data/index-volumes | `dmc_exclude_volumes` | fields title | dedup title

Select views: All Snapshot Historical

Snapshots Volume Structure Overview stats dc(splunk_server) as Indexers stats sum(volumeSizeGB) as totalVolumeSizeGB | eval totalVolumeSizeGB = round(totalVolumeSizeGB, 2)." GB" stats avg(volumeSizeGB) as avgVolumeSizeGB | eval avgVolumeSizeGB = round(avgVolumeSizeGB, 2)." GB" Instances ($instanceCount$) fields splunk_server, diskUsageGB, maxSizeGB, volume_path | rename splunk_server as "Instance", diskUsageGB as "Volume Usage (GB)", maxSizeGB as "Volume Capacity (GB)", volume_path as "Volume Path" /app/splunk_monitoring_console/volume_detail_instance?form.single_volume_name=$volume$&form.splunk_server=$row.Instance$

Volume Usage: The first value is the current size of the volume. The second value is the volume capacity, as specified by the maxVolumeDataSizeMB attribute in indexes.conf.

Note: if the volume is "unlimited", it is not possible to determine the disk usage for the volume.

Historical Charts -15d@d now $VolumeUsageChartTitle$ Volume Size (GB) false Max Average Median Minimum Maximum 90th Percentile Sampled $label$ index=_introspection sourcetype=splunk_disk_objects component=Volumes data.name=$volume$ search_group=dmc_group_indexer search_group="$group$" | `dmc_set_bin_for_disk_usage` | stats latest(data.total_size) as totalSize by host _time | `dmc_timechart_for_disk_usage` $funcDiskSizeUsage$(eval(totalSize /1024)) as "Volume Size" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Instances by $PercentVolumeUsageChartTitle$ Volume Usage (%) false Avg Average Median Minimum Maximum 90th Percentile Sampled $label$
index=_introspection sourcetype=splunk_disk_objects component=Volumes data.name=$volume$ search_group=dmc_group_indexer search_group="$group$" | eval pctDiskUsage = 'data.total_size' / 'data.max_size' | bin _time minspan=10min | stats $funcDiskPercUsage$(pctDiskUsage) as pctDiskUsage by host _time | rangemap field=pctDiskUsage "0-25%"=0-0.25 "25-50%"=0.2501-0.5 "50-75%"=0.5001-0.75 "75-100%"=0.7501-1 default=abnormal | `dmc_timechart_for_disk_usage` partial=f dc(host) as host by range | fields _time, "0-25%", "25-50%", "50-75%", "75-100%" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ index=_introspection sourcetype=splunk_disk_objects component=Volumes data.name=$volume$ search_group=dmc_group_indexer search_group="$group$" | eval pctDiskUsage = 'data.total_size' / 'data.max_size' | bin _time minspan=10min | stats $funcDiskPercUsage$(pctDiskUsage) as pctDiskUsage by host _time | rangemap field=pctDiskUsage "0-25%"=0-0.25 "25-50%"=0.2501-0.5 "50-75%"=0.5001-0.75 "75-100%"=0.7501-1 default=abnormal | `dmc_timechart_for_disk_usage` partial=f dc(host) as host by range | fields _time, "0-25%", "25-50%", "50-75%", "75-100%" $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

* Note: An indexer on which the maximum data size of the volume is infinite will not be represented here.

result.eai:data:
| rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ /services/data/index-volumes | fields title, total_size, max_size, volume_path | `dmc_exclude_volumes` | rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ /services/data/indexes-extended $datatype$ | join type=outer title [ | rest splunk_server=$splunk_server$ /services/data/indexes $datatype$] | `dmc_exclude_indexes` | rex field=homePath "volume:(?<home_vol_name>[^/\\\]*)(?:/|\\\)" | rex field=coldPath "volume:(?<cold_vol_name>[^/\\\]*)(?:/|\\\)"
Event Indexes Only All Index Types * false | `dmc_get_groups_containing_role(dmc_group_indexer)` | search search_group!="dmc_group_*" label search_group All Indexers dmc_group_indexer false | `dmc_get_instance_info($dmc_group$)` | where search_group="dmc_group_indexer" true $row.host$ false true title title stats count by title

The "All Index Types" option is not compatible with indexers running Splunk Enterprise 6.6 or earlier, where only event indexes exist.

Select views: All Snapshot Historical

Snapshots Overview fields title, home_vol_name, cold_vol_name | where home_vol_name == "$volume_name$" OR cold_vol_name == "$volume_name$" | stats dc(title) as count fields title, bucket_dirs.home.hot_bucket_count, bucket_dirs.home.warm_bucket_count, bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_count, home_vol_name, cold_vol_name | where home_vol_name == "$volume_name$" OR cold_vol_name == "$volume_name$" | eval bucket_dirs.home.hot_bucket_count = if(isnotnull('bucket_dirs.home.hot_bucket_count'), 'bucket_dirs.home.hot_bucket_count', 0) | eval bucket_dirs.home.warm_bucket_count = if(isnotnull('bucket_dirs.home.warm_bucket_count'), 'bucket_dirs.home.warm_bucket_count', 0) | eval bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_count = if(isnotnull('bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_count'), 'bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_count', 0) | eval bucket_count = case( home_vol_name == cold_vol_name, 'bucket_dirs.home.hot_bucket_count' + 'bucket_dirs.home.warm_bucket_count' + 'bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_count', home_vol_name == "$volume_name$", 'bucket_dirs.home.hot_bucket_count' + 'bucket_dirs.home.warm_bucket_count', cold_vol_name == "$volume_name$", 'bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_count') | stats sum(bucket_count) as bucket_count | eval bucket_count = toString(bucket_count, "commas") Events fields title, bucket_dirs.home.event_count, bucket_dirs.cold.event_count, home_vol_name, cold_vol_name | where home_vol_name == "$volume_name$" OR cold_vol_name == "$volume_name$" | eval bucket_dirs.home.event_count = if(isnotnull('bucket_dirs.home.event_count'), 'bucket_dirs.home.event_count', 0) | eval bucket_dirs.cold.event_count = if(isnotnull('bucket_dirs.cold.event_count'), 'bucket_dirs.cold.event_count', 0) | eval event_count = case( home_vol_name == cold_vol_name, 'bucket_dirs.home.event_count' + 'bucket_dirs.cold.event_count', home_vol_name == "$volume_name$", 'bucket_dirs.home.event_count', cold_vol_name == "$volume_name$", 'bucket_dirs.cold.event_count') | stats sum(event_count) as count | eval count = toString(count, "commas") fields title, bucket_dirs.home.event_min_time, bucket_dirs.cold.event_min_time, home_vol_name, cold_vol_name | where home_vol_name == "$volume_name$" OR cold_vol_name == "$volume_name$" | eval min_time = case( home_vol_name == cold_vol_name, min('bucket_dirs.home.event_min_time', 'bucket_dirs.cold.event_min_time'), home_vol_name == "$volume_name$", 'bucket_dirs.home.event_min_time', cold_vol_name == "$volume_name$", 'bucket_dirs.cold.event_min_time') | stats min(min_time) as min_time | `dmc_time_format(min_time)` fields title, bucket_dirs.home.event_max_time, bucket_dirs.cold.event_max_time, home_vol_name, cold_vol_name | where home_vol_name == "$volume_name$" OR cold_vol_name == "$volume_name$" | eval max_time = case( home_vol_name == cold_vol_name, max('bucket_dirs.home.event_max_time', 'bucket_dirs.cold.event_max_time'), home_vol_name == "$volume_name$", 'bucket_dirs.home.event_max_time', cold_vol_name == "$volume_name$", 'bucket_dirs.cold.event_max_time') | stats max(max_time) as max_time | `dmc_time_format(max_time)` Volume Usage where title == "$volume_name$" | eval total_size_gb = if(isnull(total_size), "-", round(total_size / 1024, 2)) | eval max_size_gb = if(isnull(max_size) OR max_size = "infinite", "unlimited", round(max_size / 1024, 2)) | eval disk_usage_gb = total_size_gb." / ".max_size_gb | fields title, disk_usage_gb, max_size_gb, volume_path | rename title as Volume, disk_usage_gb as "Volume Usage (GB)", max_size_gb as "Volume Capacity (GB)", volume_path as "Volume Path"

Volume Usage: The first value is the current size of the volume. The second value is the volume capacity, as specified by the maxVolumeDataSizeMB attribute in indexes.conf.

Note: if the volume is "unlimited", it is not possible to determine the disk usage for the volume.

Index Directories Using This Volume eval cold_bucket_size = if(isnotnull('bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_size'), 'bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_size', 'bucket_dirs.cold.size') | fields title, bucket_dirs.home.event_min_time, bucket_dirs.cold.event_min_time, cold_bucket_size, total_size, home_vol_name, cold_vol_name | rename cold_bucket_size AS cold_size | eval cold_size = if(isnull(cold_size), 0, cold_size) | eval home_size = total_size - cold_size | eval cold_size = round(cold_size / 1024, 2) | eval home_size = round(home_size / 1024, 2) | eval dir = "home,cold" | makemv dir delim="," | mvexpand dir | eval dir_size = case(dir == "home", home_size, dir == "cold", cold_size) | eval vol_name = case(dir == "home", home_vol_name, dir == "cold", cold_vol_name) | eval data_age_home_day = if(dir == "home", round((now() - 'bucket_dirs.home.event_min_time') / 86400, 0), NULL) | eval data_age_cold_day = if(dir == "cold", round((now() - 'bucket_dirs.cold.event_min_time') / 86400, 0), NULL) | eval data_age_day = case(dir == "home", data_age_home_day, dir == "cold", data_age_cold_day) | eval data_age_day = if(isnull(data_age_day), "n/a", data_age_day) | where vol_name == "$volume_name$" | fields title dir dir_size data_age_day vol_name | where isnotnull(vol_name) | eval index_dir_name = title.":".dir | fields index_dir_name dir_size data_age_day | sort - dir_size | rename index_dir_name as "Index:Directory" dir_size AS "Disk Usage (GB)" data_age_day as "Data Age (Days)"
Volume Usage By Index Directory eval cold_bucket_size = if(isnotnull('bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_size'), 'bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_size', 'bucket_dirs.cold.size') | fields title, cold_bucket_size, total_size, home_vol_name, cold_vol_name | rename cold_bucket_size AS cold_size | eval cold_size = if(isnull(cold_size), 0, cold_size) | eval home_size = total_size - cold_size | eval cold_size = round(cold_size / 1024, 2) | eval home_size = round(home_size / 1024, 2) | eval dir = "home,cold" | makemv dir delim="," | mvexpand dir | eval dir_size = case(dir == "home", home_size, dir == "cold", cold_size) | eval vol_name = case(dir == "home", home_vol_name, dir == "cold", cold_vol_name) | where vol_name == "$volume_name$" | fields title dir dir_size vol_name | where isnotnull(vol_name) AND isnotnull(dir_size) AND dir_size > 0 | eval index_dir_name = title.":".dir | where vol_name == "$volume_name$" | stats sum(dir_size) AS dir_size by index_dir_name

Volume Usage (GB)

 Data Age By Index Directory fields title, bucket_dirs.home.event_min_time, bucket_dirs.cold.event_min_time, home_vol_name, cold_vol_name, datatype | eval dir = "home,cold" | makemv dir delim="," | mvexpand dir | eval indexwithtype=title.":".datatype, title = case(dir == "home", title.":home", dir == "cold", title.":cold") | eval data_age_home_day = if(dir == "home", round((now() - 'bucket_dirs.home.event_min_time') / 86400, 0), NULL) | eval data_age_cold_day = if(dir == "cold", round((now() - 'bucket_dirs.cold.event_min_time') / 86400, 0), NULL) | eval data_age_day = case(dir == "home", data_age_home_day, dir == "cold", data_age_cold_day) | eval vol_name = case(dir == "home", home_vol_name, dir == "cold", cold_vol_name) | where vol_name == "$volume_name$" | sort - data_age_day | fields title, data_age_home_day, data_age_cold_day, indexwithtype | where NOT (isnull(data_age_home_day) AND isnull(data_age_cold_day)) | rename title as Index, data_age_home_day as "home data age (days)", data_age_cold_day as "cold data age (days)" index_detail_instance?form.datatype=$datatype$&form.splunk_server=$splunk_server$&form.single_index_name=$row.indexwithtype$

Tip: you can adjust the height of the bar chart when there are many bars.

 Historical Charts -15d@d now Volume Size Over Time false latest Latest Average Minimum Maximum show hide volume_capacity index=_introspection host=$host$ sourcetype=splunk_disk_objects component=Volumes data.name="$volume_name$" | eval data.total_size = round('data.total_size' / 1024, 2) | eval data.total_capacity = round('data.max_size' / 1024, 2) | `dmc_timechart_for_disk_usage` partial=false $funcVolume$(data.total_size) as volume_usage, latest(data.total_capacity) as volume_capacity | fields _time, volume_usage $capacityOverlay$ $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {

      "type": "custom.keyIndicators",

          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/vuln_search?form.severity=$payload:name|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,
        "legendTruncation": "ellipsisMiddle",
        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "xAxisTitleText": "severity",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "legendDisplay": "bottom",
        "seriesColorsByField": {
          "critical": "0xD25B3B",
          "high": "0xFF8800",
          "medium": "0xF0BE1B",
          "low": "0x98BF3B",
          "informational": "0x5378AD",
          "unknown": "0x999999"
        }
      },
      "title": "Vulnerabilities By Severity"
    },
    "viz_new_vulnerabilities": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_new_vulnerabilities"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.signature.value",
              "key": "row.signature.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/vuln_search?form.signature=$payload:row.signature.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {},
      "title": "New Vulnerabilities"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_severity": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Severity",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_vuln_severities`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_category_form": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Category",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_top_vulnerabilities": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Vulnerabilities",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` dc(Vulnerabilities.dest) as dest_count from datamodel=Vulnerabilities.Vulnerabilities where * $ds_input_tokens:result.severity_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by Vulnerabilities.signature | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Vulnerabilities\")` | sort 10 - dest_count"
      }
    },
    "ds_most_vulnerable_hosts": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Most Vulnerable Hosts",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` dc(Vulnerabilities.signature) as vuln_count from datamodel=Vulnerabilities.Vulnerabilities where * $ds_input_tokens:result.severity_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by Vulnerabilities.severity,Vulnerabilities.dest | chart useother=`useother` first(vuln_count) over Vulnerabilities.dest by Vulnerabilities.severity | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Vulnerabilities\")` | eval total=case(critical>0 AND high>0,critical+high,critical>0,critical,high>0,high,1==1,0) | eval subTotal=case(medium>0 AND low>0,medium+low,medium>0,medium,low>0,low,1==1,0) | eval subSubTotal=case(informational>0 AND unknown>0,informational+unknown,informational>0,informational,unknown>0,unknown,1==1,0) | sort 10 - total,subTotal,subSubTotal | fields - total,subTotal,subSubTotal | table dest,critical,high,medium,low,informational,unknown"
      }
    },
    "ds_vulnerabilities_by_severity": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Vulnerabilities By Severity",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` dc(Vulnerabilities.signature) as vuln_count from datamodel=Vulnerabilities.Vulnerabilities where * $ds_input_tokens:result.severity_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by Vulnerabilities.severity,Vulnerabilities.dest | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Vulnerabilities\")` | stats sum(vuln_count) as count by severity | `stats2chart(severity)` | table count, critical, high, medium, low, informational, unknown"
      }
    },
    "ds_new_vulnerabilities": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "New Vulnerabilities",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `vuln_signature_reference(firstTime)` | `uitime(firstTime)` | sort 100 - firstTime | `makemv(cve)` | fields firstTime,signature,cve,vendor_product"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval severity_dm=if($severity|s$==\"*\" OR $severity|s$==\"\", \" \", \"Vulnerabilities.severity=\\\"$severity$\\\"\")\n| eval bunit_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Vulnerabilities.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Vulnerabilities.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Vulnerabilities.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Vulnerabilities.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_severity": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Severity",
      "options": {
        "token": "severity",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.severity",
        "label": "primary.severity"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_severity"
      }
    },
    "input_bunit_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "token": "bunit_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_category_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Category",
      "options": {
        "token": "category_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.category",
        "label": "primary.category"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_category_form"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-90d@d,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_keyIndicators",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 150
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_top_vulnerabilities",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 150,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_most_vulnerable_hosts",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 150,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_vulnerabilities_by_severity",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 400,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 315
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_new_vulnerabilities",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 600,
        "y": 400,
        "w": 600,
        "h": 315
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_severity",
      "input_bunit_form",
      "input_category_form",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Vulnerability Center"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_scan_activity_over_time": {
      "type": "splunk.line",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_scan_activity_over_time"

            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",

        ],
        "newTab": true,
        "vizType": "line"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "yAxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "y2AxisAbbreviation": "off",
        "showRoundedY2AxisLabels": false,

        "showY2MajorGridLines": true,
        "markerDisplay": "off",
        "xAxisTitleText": "time",
        "yAxisTitleText": "count",
        "nullValueDisplay": "zero"
      },
      "context": {},
      "title": "Scan Activity Over Time"
    },
    "viz_vulnerabilities_by_age": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_vulnerabilities_by_age"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.signature.value",
              "key": "row.signature.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/vuln_search?form.signature=$payload:row.signature.value|u$&form.dest=$payload:row.dest.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "table": "> primary | frameBySeriesNames(\"firstTime\",\"lastTime\",\"signature\",\"dest\",\"Age (days)\")",
        "columnFormat": {
          "Age (days)": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName(\"Age (days)\") | formatByType(numberPrecisionConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "numberPrecisionConfig": {
          "number": {
            "precision": 1
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Vulnerabilities By Age"
    },
    "viz_delinquent_scanning": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_delinquent_scanning"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/vuln_search?form.dest=$payload:row.dest.value|u$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest|u$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "columnFormat": {
          "dayDiff": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName(\"dayDiff\") | formatByType(numberPrecisionConfig)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "numberPrecisionConfig": {
          "number": {
            "precision": 1
          }
        }
      },
      "title": "Delinquent Scanning"
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_category_form": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Category Form",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `categories`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_scan_activity_over_time": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Scan Activity Over Time",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` dc(Vulnerabilities.dest) from datamodel=Vulnerabilities.Vulnerabilities where * $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by _time span=1d | timechart minspan=1d dc(Vulnerabilities.dest) as \"dc(dest)\""
      }
    },
    "ds_vulnerabilities_by_age": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Vulnerabilities By Age",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `vulnerability_tracker(firstTime)` | search $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ | eventstats max(lastTime) as lastScanTime by dest | where lastTime==lastScanTime AND firstTime!=lastTime | eval timeDiff=lastTime-firstTime | sort 100 - timeDiff,lastTime | eval \"Age (days)\"=round(timeDiff/86400,1) | `uitime(firstTime)` | `uitime(lastTime)` | fields firstTime,lastTime,signature,dest,\"Age (days)\""
      }
    },
    "ds_delinquent_scanning": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Delinquent Scanning",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` min(_time) as firstTime,max(_time) as lastTime from datamodel=Vulnerabilities.Vulnerabilities where * $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by Vulnerabilities.dest | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Vulnerabilities\")` | `dayDiff(lastTime)` | eval dayDiff=round(dayDiff,1) | `uitime(firstTime)` | `uitime(lastTime)` | sort 100 + lastTime"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval category_raw=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval category_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Vulnerabilities.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_raw=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Vulnerabilities.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_bunit_form": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Business Unit",
      "options": {
        "token": "bunit_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_category_form": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Category",
      "options": {
        "token": "category_form",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.category",
        "label": "primary.category"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_category_form"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-365d@d,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_scan_activity_over_time",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_vulnerabilities_by_age",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 250,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_delinquent_scanning",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 500,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 250
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_bunit_form",
      "input_category_form",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Vulnerability Operations"
}]]></definition>
