result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_vuln_search_table": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_vuln_search_table"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.signature.value",
              "key": "row.signature.value"
            },{
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            }]
        }},
        {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
            "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Vulnerabilities\".\"Vulnerabilities\" | search signature=\"$payload:row.signature.value|u$\" dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
            "newTab": true
        }}
      ],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "columnFormat": {
          "_time": {
            "width": 170,
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)",
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "category": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('category') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "severity": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('severity') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "signature": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('signature') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "cve": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('cve') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "dest": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('dest') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "alignPositionCol": [ "left" ],
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
              "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    },
    "viz_vuln_search_event": {
      "type": "splunk.events",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_vuln_search_events",
        "fieldsummary": "ds_vuln_search_events_fieldsummary"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
      {
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [
                {
                    "token": "tag_value",
                    "key": "value"
                },
                {
                    "token": "field",
                    "key": "name"
                }
            ]
        }
      },
      {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
              "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Vulnerabilities\".\"Vulnerabilities\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.severity_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.signature_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.reference_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ | head 100 | search \"tag::$payload:field$\"=$payload:tag_value$",
              "newTab": true,
              "events": [
                  "tag.click"
              ]
          }
      },
      {
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Vulnerabilities\".\"Vulnerabilities\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.severity_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.signature_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.reference_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ | head 100",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "eventViewerDrilldownHandler",
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "events"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "footerFields": [
          "dvc",
          "category",
          "severity",
          "signature",
          "bugtraq",
          "cert",
          "cve",
          "msft",
          "mskb",
          "xref",
          "os",
          "dest"
        ],
        "highlightValuesByField": {
          "category": "$category$",
          "severity": "$severity$",
          "signature": "$signature$",
          "bugtraq": "$reference_form$",
          "cert": "$reference_form$",
          "cve": "$reference_form$",
          "dest": "$dest$"
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_severity": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Severity",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `cim_vuln_severities`",
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "-1s",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    },
    "ds_vuln_search_table": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Vuln Search table",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,values(Vulnerabilities.category) as category,values(Vulnerabilities.severity) as severity,values(Vulnerabilities.cve) as cve,count from datamodel=Vulnerabilities.Vulnerabilities where * $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.severity_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.signature_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.reference_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_dm$ by Vulnerabilities.signature,Vulnerabilities.dest | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Vulnerabilities\")` | sort - count | fields _time,category,severity,signature,cve,dest,count"
      }
    },
    "ds_vuln_search_events": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Vuln Search events",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from datamodel:\"Vulnerabilities\".\"Vulnerabilities\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.category_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.severity_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.signature_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.reference_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ | head 100"
      }
    },
    "ds_vuln_search_events_fieldsummary": {
      "type": "ds.chain",
      "name": "Vuln Search events fieldsummary",
      "options": {
        "query": "fieldsummary maxvals=10",
        "extend": "ds_vuln_search_events"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval category_raw=if($category|s$==\"*\" OR $category|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(category=\\\"$category$\\\")\")\n| eval category_dm=if($category|s$==\"*\" OR $category|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Vulnerabilities.category=\\\"$category$\\\")\")\n| eval severity_raw=if($severity|s$==\"*\" OR $severity|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(severity=\\\"$severity$\\\")\")\n| eval severity_dm=if($severity|s$==\"*\" OR $severity|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Vulnerabilities.severity=\\\"$severity$\\\")\")\n| eval signature_raw=if($signature|s$==\"*\" OR $signature|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(signature=\\\"$signature$\\\")\")\n| eval signature_dm=if($signature|s$==\"*\" OR $signature|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Vulnerabilities.signature=\\\"$signature$\\\")\")\n| eval reference_raw=if($reference_form|s$==\"*\" OR $reference_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(bugtraq=\\\"$reference_form$\\\" OR cert=\\\"$reference_form$\\\" OR cve=\\\"$reference_form$\\\" OR msft=\\\"$reference_form$\\\" OR mskb=\\\"$reference_form$\\\" OR xref=\\\"$reference_form$\\\")\")\n| eval reference_dm=if($reference_form|s$==\"*\" OR $reference_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Vulnerabilities.bugtraq=\\\"$reference_form$\\\" OR Vulnerabilities.cert=\\\"$reference_form$\\\" OR Vulnerabilities.cve=\\\"$reference_form$\\\" OR Vulnerabilities.msft=\\\"$reference_form$\\\" OR Vulnerabilities.mskb=\\\"$reference_form$\\\" OR Vulnerabilities.xref=\\\"$reference_form$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_raw=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_dm=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Vulnerabilities.dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      },
      "ds.chain": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_category": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Vuln. Category",
      "options": {
        "token": "category",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_severity": {
      "type": "input.dropdown",
      "title": "Severity",
      "options": {
        "token": "severity",
        "defaultValue": "*",
        "items": [{
          "value": "*",
          "label": "All"
        }]
      },
      "encoding": {
        "value": "primary.severity",
        "label": "primary.severity"
      },
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_severity"
      }
    },
    "input_signature": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Signature",
      "options": {
        "token": "signature",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_reference": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Reference (bugtraq, cert, cve, etc.)",
      "options": {
        "token": "reference_form",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_destination": {
      "type": "input.text",
      "title": "Destination",
      "options": {
        "token": "dest",
        "defaultValue": "*"
      }
    },
    "input_global_time": {
      "type": "input.timerange",
      "title": "Time Range",
      "options": {
        "token": "global_time",
        "defaultValue": "-30d@d,now"
      }
    }
  },
  "layout": {
    "type": "grid",
    "options": {},
    "structure": [{
      "item": "viz_vuln_search_table",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 0,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 345
      }
    },{
      "item": "viz_vuln_search_event",
      "type": "block",
      "position": {
        "x": 0,
        "y": 345,
        "w": 1200,
        "h": 500
      }
    }],
    "globalInputs": [
      "input_category",
      "input_severity",
      "input_signature",
      "input_reference",
      "input_destination",
      "input_global_time"
    ]
  },
  "description": "",
  "title": "Vulnerability Search"
}]]></definition>
<meta><![CDATA[{
  "isEditable":true
}]]></meta>
</dashboard>

<definition><![CDATA[{

            "newTab": true

      ],
      "options": {

        "columnFormat": {

          }

  "dataSources": {

        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Web.Web where * $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by _time,Web.http_method span=10m | timechart minspan=10m useother=`useother` count by Web.http_method | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_events_over_time_by_status": {

      "name": "Events Over Time By Status",

        "query": "| `tstats` count from datamodel=Web.Web where * $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by _time,Web.status span=10m | timechart minspan=10m useother=`useother` count by Web.status | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")`"
      }
    },
    "ds_top_sources": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Sources",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` dc(Web.dest),count from datamodel=Web.Web where earliest=\"$global_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$global_time.latest$\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by Web.src  | eval group=\"current\" | `tstats` append=true dc(Web.dest),count from datamodel=Web.Web where $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ [| `make_previous_time_range(\"$global_time.earliest$\",\"$global_time.latest$\")`] by Web.src | fillnull value=\"historical\" group | stats dc(Web.dest) as dc_dest,count by Web.src,group | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")` | eval dc_dest=if(group=\"historical\",0,dc_dest) | eval current_count=if(group=\"current\",count,0) | eval historical_count=if(group=\"historical\",count,0) | stats max(dc_dest) as dc(dest),sum(current_count) as current_count,sum(historical_count) as historical_count by src| `get_delta` | rename delta as delta_count | eval count=current_count | eval abs(delta_count)=abs(delta_count) | sort 100 -abs(delta_count)"
      }
    },
    "ds_top_destinations": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Top Destinations",
      "options": {
        "query": "| `tstats` dc(Web.src),count from datamodel=Web.Web where earliest=\"$global_time.earliest$\" latest=\"$global_time.latest$\" $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ by Web.dest  | eval group=\"current\" | `tstats` append=true dc(Web.src),count from datamodel=Web.Web where $ds_input_tokens:result.bunit_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.category_dm$ [| `make_previous_time_range(\"$global_time.earliest$\",\"$global_time.latest$\")`] by Web.dest | fillnull value=\"historical\" group | stats dc(Web.src) as dc_src,count by Web.dest,group | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")` | eval dc_src=if(group=\"historical\",0,dc_src) | eval current_count=if(group=\"current\",count,0) | eval historical_count=if(group=\"historical\",count,0) | stats max(dc_src) as dc(src),sum(current_count) as current_count,sum(historical_count) as historical_count by dest| `get_delta` | rename delta as delta_count | eval count=current_count | eval abs(delta_count)=abs(delta_count) | sort 100 -abs(delta_count)"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",

      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval category_dm=if($category_form|s$==\"*\" OR $category_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Web.src_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Web.dest_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\" OR Web.user_category=\\\"$category_form$\\\")\")\n| eval bunit_dm=if($bunit_form|s$==\"*\" OR $bunit_form|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Web.src_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Web.dest_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\" OR Web.user_bunit=\\\"$bunit_form$\\\")\")",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }

  "defaults": {

result.label: web_search_data
result.title: web_search_data
result.eai:data:
<dashboard version="2" isDashboard="false" app="ess">
<definition><![CDATA[{
  "visualizations": {
    "viz_web_search_table": {
      "type": "splunk.table",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_web_search_table"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [{
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [{
              "token": "row.src.value",
              "key": "row.src.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.dest.value",
              "key": "row.dest.value"
            },
            {
              "token": "row.url.value",
              "key": "row.url.value"
            }
         ]
      }},
      {
        "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
        "options": {
          "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Web\".\"Web\" | search src=\"$payload:row.src.value|u$\" dest=\"$payload:row.dest.value|u$\" url=\"$payload:row.url.value|u$\"&earliest=$global_time.earliest|u$&latest=$global_time.latest|u$&auto_pause=$ds_input_tokens:result.auto_pause$",
          "newTab": true
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "columnFormat": {
          "dest": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('dest') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "src": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('src') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "status": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('status') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "http_method": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('http_method') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "url": {
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('url') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          },
          "_time": {
            "data": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | formatByType(timeConfig)",
            "align": "> table | seriesByName('_time') | pick(alignPositionCol)"
          }
        }
      },
      "context": {
        "alignPositionCol": [ "left" ],
        "timeConfig": {
          "time": {
            "format": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
          }
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    },
    "viz_web_search_event": {
      "type": "splunk.events",
      "description": "",
      "dataSources": {
        "primary": "ds_web_search_event",
        "fieldsummary": "ds_web_search_event_fieldsummary"
      },
      "eventHandlers": [
      {
        "type": "drilldown.setToken",
        "options": {
            "tokenNamespace": "payload",
            "tokens": [
                {
                    "token": "tag_value",
                    "key": "value"
                },
                {
                    "token": "field",
                    "key": "name"
                }
            ]
        }
      },
      {
          "type": "drilldown.customUrl",
          "options": {
              "url": "/app/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/search?q=| from datamodel:\"Web\".\"Web\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.http_method_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.url_raw$ | head 100 | search \"tag::$payload:field$\"=$payload:tag_value$",
              "newTab": true,
              "events": [
                  "tag.click"
              ]
          }
      },
      {
        "type": "drilldown.declarativeHandler",
        "options": {
          "params": {
            "search": "| from datamodel:\"Web\".\"Web\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.http_method_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.url_raw$ | head 100",
            "timerange": {
              "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$",
              "latest": "$global_time.latest$"
            }
          },
          "handlerName": "eventViewerDrilldownHandler",
          "newTab": true,
          "vizType": "events"
        }
      }],
      "options": {
        "count": 5,
        "footerFields": [
          "dest",
          "category",
          "http_method",
          "http_referrer",
          "http_user_agent",
          "src",
          "status",
          "url"
        ],
        "highlightValuesByField": {
          "dest": "$dest$",
          "http_method": "$http_method$",
          "src": "$src$",
          "status": "$status$",
          "url": "$url$"
        }
      },
      "title": ""
    }
  },
  "dataSources": {
    "ds_web_search_table": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Web search table",
      "options": {
        "query": "| tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,values(Web.http_method) as http_method,values(Web.status) as status,count from datamodel=Web.Web where * $ds_input_tokens:result.http_method_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_dm$ $ds_input_tokens:result.url_dm$ by Web.src,Web.dest,Web.url | `drop_dm_object_name(\"Web\")` | sort - count | fields _time,http_method,status,src,dest,url,count"
      }
    },
    "ds_web_search_event": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "Web search event",
      "options": {
        "query": "| from datamodel:\"Web\".\"Web\" | search $ds_input_tokens:result.http_method_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.status_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.src_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.dest_raw$ $ds_input_tokens:result.url_raw$ | head 100"
      }
    },
    "ds_web_search_event_fieldsummary": {
      "type": "ds.chain",
      "name": "Web search event fieldsummary",
      "options": {
        "query": "fieldsummary maxvals=10",
        "extend": "ds_web_search_event"
      }
    },
    "ds_input_tokens": {
      "type": "ds.search",
      "name": "ds_input_tokens",
      "options": {
        "query": "| makeresults count=1\n| eval http_method_raw=if($http_method|s$==\"*\" OR $http_method|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(http_method=\\\"$http_method$\\\")\")\n| eval http_method_dm=if($http_method|s$==\"*\" OR $http_method|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Web.http_method=\\\"$http_method$\\\")\")\n| eval status_raw=if($status|s$==\"*\" OR $status|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(status=\\\"$status$\\\")\")\n| eval status_dm=if($status|s$==\"*\" OR $status|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Web.status=\\\"$status$\\\")\")\n| eval src_raw=if($src|s$==\"*\" OR $src|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(src=\\\"$src$\\\")\")\n| eval src_dm=if($src|s$==\"*\" OR $src|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Web.src=\\\"$src$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_raw=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\")\n| eval dest_dm=if($dest|s$==\"*\" OR $dest|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Web.dest=\\\"$dest$\\\")\")\n| eval url_raw=if($url|s$==\"*\" OR $url|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(url=\\\"$url$\\\")\")\n| eval url_dm=if($url|s$==\"*\" OR $url|s$==\"\", \" \", \"(Web.url=\\\"$url$\\\")\")\n| appendcols [|rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/nobody/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/admin/macros/autopause | fields definition]\n| eval auto_pause=if(definition>0, definition, 0)",
        "enableSmartSources": true,
        "queryParameters": {
          "earliest": "0",
          "latest": "now"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "defaults": {
    "visualizations": {
      "global": {
        "showProgressBar": true
      }
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "ds.search": {
        "options": {
          "queryParameters": {
            "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
            "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "ds.chain": {
      "options": {
        "queryParameters": {
          "latest": "$global_time.latest$",
          "earliest": "$global_time.earliest$"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "inputs": {
    "input_http_method": {
      "type": "input.text",

result.label: Workload Management Overview
result.title: workload_management
result.eai:data:
Workload Management Status | inputlookup dmc_assets | rename serverName AS splunk_server | where (match(search_group, "dmc_group_")) | `dmc_set_group_label_and_sort(search_group)` | stats values(label) AS roles by splunk_server | makemv roles | join type=outer splunk_server [rest splunk_server=* /services/server/info | fields splunk_server, os_name, os_version] | eval OS = 'os_name'." ".'os_version' | join type=outer splunk_server [rest splunk_server=* /services/workloads/status/workload-management-status | fields splunk_server, general.isSupported, general.enabled, general.error_message] | eval Status = case('general.isSupported' = 0 OR isnull('general.isSupported'), "Unsupported", 'general.isSupported' = 1, "Supported")." / ".case('general.enabled' = 0, "Disabled", 'general.enabled' = 1, "Enabled", isnull('general.enabled'), "N/A") | fields splunk_server, roles, OS, Status, general.error_message | rename splunk_server AS "Instance", roles AS Roles, general.error_message AS "Error Messages"
Workload Pool Configuration | inputlookup dmc_assets | rename serverName AS splunk_server | where (match(search_group, "dmc_group_")) | `dmc_set_group_label_and_sort(search_group)` | stats values(label) AS roles by splunk_server | makemv roles | join type=outer splunk_server [rest splunk_server=* /services/workloads/pools | eval default_pool=if(category=="search" and default_category_pool=="1",(if(isNull('title'), "Not Configured", 'title')),NULL) | eval ingest_pool=if(category=="ingest" and default_category_pool=="1",(if(isNull('title'), "Not Configured", 'title')),NULL) | stats values(eval(if(title!="general",title,NULL))) as pools values(default_pool) AS default_pool values(ingest_pool) AS ingest_pool by splunk_server] | fields splunk_server, roles, default_pool, ingest_pool, pools | rename splunk_server AS "Instance", roles AS Roles, default_pool AS "Default Search Pool", ingest_pool AS "Default Ingest Pool" pools AS "All Pools"
Historical Charts -4h@m now Search Heads Indexers All dmc_group_search_head Deployment-Wide $CPUFunctionLabel$ CPU Usage by Workload Pool false Median Average Median Minimum Maximum 90th Percentile Sampled $label$ `dmc_set_index_introspection` search_group="$role$" sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage component=PerProcess | `dmc_rename_introspection_fields` | `dmc_set_bin` | stats sum(pct_cpu) as pct_cpu by host, workload_pool, _time | `dmc_timechart` $CPUFunction$(pct_cpu) as pct_cpu by workload_pool $time.earliest$ $time.latest$ Deployment-Wide $MemFuncLabel$ Physical Memory Usage by Workload Pool false Median Average Median Minimum Maximum 90th Percentile Sampled $label$ `dmc_set_index_introspection` search_group="$role$" sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage component=PerProcess | `dmc_rename_introspection_fields` | `dmc_set_bin` | stats sum(mem_used) as mem_used by host, workload_pool _time | `dmc_timechart` $MemFunc$(mem_used) as mem_used by workload_pool $time.earliest$ $time.latest$

"abort")) AS abort by search_id | join type=outer search_id [ search `dmc_set_index_introspection` search_group=$role$ search_group=$dmc_group$ host=$host$ sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage
